name: Ice
rules_text:
House Stark character only.
Challenges: While attached character is participating in a challenge, kneel and discard Ice from play (cannot be saved) to choose and kill another participating character.
flavor_text: "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword." - Lord Eddard Stark

name: Nymeria
rules_text:
House Stark character only.
Response: Kneel Nymeria to save attached character from being killed.
If attached character is Arya Stark, she also gets +1 STR and gains stealth.
flavor_text: Arya had named her after the warrior queen of Rhoyne...

name: Summer
rules_text:
House Stark character only.
Attached character gets +2 STR and gains a Military icon. If attached character is Bran Stark, he gains stealth.

name: Ser Rodrik Cassel
rules_text:
Ser Rodrik Cassel does not kneel to defend.
Ser Rodrik Cassel gets +2 STR while defending.

name: Eddard Stark
rules_text:
Stalwart. Renown. Deadly.
Eddard Stark claims 1 power when he comes into play.
flavor_text: "Our way is the older way. The blood of the First Men still flows in the veins of the Starks, and we hold to the belief that the man who passes the sentence should swing the sword."

name: Catelyn Stark
rules_text: Response: After Catelyn Stark is declared as a defender, choose a participating character. For the duration of the challenge, that character does not count its STR.
flavor_text: "But if we are winning, why am I so afraid?"

name: Arya Stark
rules_text: Any phase: Kneel 1 influence to choose a character with stealth or renown. Until the end of the phase, that character loses those keywords, and Arya Stark gains any keyword that was lost in this way.

name: Robb Stark
rules_text: Response: after you win a Military challenge in which Robb Stark participates, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing player.
flavor_text: "I have won every battle, but I feel as though I am losing the war."

name: Sansa Stark
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Response: After a player plays an attachment on Sansa Stark, that player may draw a card.
flavor_text: "Sansa was a lady at three, always so courteous and eager to please. She loved nothing so well as tales of knightly valor" - Lady Catelyn Stark

name: Greatjon Umber
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Greatjon Umber to have him participate in the current Military or Power challenge as either the attacker or as the defender.
flavor_text: The Greatjon became Robb's right hand, his staunchest champion.

name: Shaggydog
rules_text:
Deadly. No attachments.
While you control at least 1 House Stark Lord character, Shaggydog gets +3 STR and is immune to events.
flavor_text: The darkness sprang at him, snarling.

name: Hodor
rules_text:
Deadly. No attachments.
Hodor cannot be declared as an attacker. Hodor cannot be bypassed with stealth.
flavor_text: "Hodor!"

name: Bran Stark
rules_text: Plot: Kneel Bran Stark to choose and reveal a new plot card. (Limit 3 times per round.)
flavor_text: "I don't want to be broken. I want to be a knight."

name: Grey Wind
rules_text:
Deadly. No attachments.
If Robb Stark is in play, lower the cost to play Grey Wind by 2.

name: Lady
rules_text:
No attachments.
Sansa Stark gets +1 STR and gains renown.
If Sansa Stark is in play, lower the cost to play Lady by 2.

name: War Host of the North
rules_text: No attachments.
flavor_text: Robb rode at the front of the column, beneath the flapping white banner of Winterfell. Each day he would ask one of his lords to join him, so they might confer as they marched...

name: Winterfell Honor Guard
rules_text:
House Stark only. No attachments.
Challenges: You may put Winterfell Honor Guard into play from your hand, under the control of any opponent. After that opponent wins a challenge in which Winterfell Honor Guard participated, take control of Winterfell Honor Guard.

name: Knight of the Tumblestone
flavor_text: His breastplate was scratched and dented from battle, his blue-and-red cloak stained by blood and smoke.

name: Direwolf Pup
rules_text: House Stark only. No attachments.

name: Kennel Master
rules_text:
Kennel Master gets +1 STR for each Direwolf in play.
While you control 3 or more Direwolf cards, Kennel Master gains: "Response: Save Kennel Master from being killed or discarded, and return him to his owner's hand."

name: House Tully Recruiter
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel to lower the cost of the next House Stark character you play this phase by 1.
flavor_text: Family. Duty. Honor.

name: Trident Reinforcements
rules_text: Dominance: Return Trident Reinforcements from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.
flavor_text: "The red stallion was always a welcome sight in Riverrun." - Catelyn Stark

name: Winterfell Reserves
rules_text: Response: After Winterfell Reserves is declared as a defender, pay 1 gold to put the top card of a player's discard pile on top of his or her deck.

name: Winterfell Kennels
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Winterfell Kennels and pay 1 gold to search your deck for a Direwolf card, reveal that card to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Winterfell Castle
rules_text:
No attachments.
Each of your House Stark characters gets +1 STR.
flavor_text: "The winters are hard, but the Starks will endure. We always have." - Lord Eddard Stark

rules_text:
Limited.

rules_text: Attached character gets +2 STR and gains stealth.
flavor_text: "Where's a gutterrat like Lumpyhead get him a sword?" - Lommy

name: Gilded Plate
rules_text: Response: Pay 1 gold and discard Gilded Plate from play (cannot be saved) to save attached character from being killed or discarded.

name: Joffrey Baratheon
rules_text: Response: After a Lord or Lady character is killed, Joffrey Baratheon claims 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)
flavor_text: "Fear is better than love."

name: Ser Jaime Lannister
rules_text:
Infamy. Deadly.
Ser Jaime Lannister does not kneel to attack or defend during a Military challenge.
flavor_text: "Kingslayer," he pronounced carefully. "And such a king he was! To Aerys Targaryen... and to the sword that opened his throat. A golden sword, don't you know. Those are the Lannister colors, red and gold."

name: Tyrion Lannister
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge or a challenge in which Tyrion Lannister participated, pay 1 gold to draw a card.

name: Cersei Lannister
rules_text: Dominance: Kneel Cersei Lannister and pay 2 gold to choose a character. Kneel that character if it is standing. That character does not stand during the standing phase this round.

name: Tywin Lannister
rules_text: At the beginning of the marshalling phase, take 2 gold from the treasury and place it on Tywin Lannister. You may spend gold tokens on Tywin Lannister as if they are in your gold pool.

name: Ser Ilyn Payne
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel Ser Ilyn Payne to choose and kill a character with STR 2 or lower.
flavor_text: Lords and knights moved aside as he stepped through, tall and fleshless, a skeleton in iron mail, the King's Justice.

name: The Hound
rules_text: If The Hound is killed, place him in your discard pile instead of your dead pile. At the beginning of the dominance phase, discard the top card from your deck or discard the Hound from play (cannot be saved).
flavor_text: "I'm no knight. I spit on them and their vows."

name: Chella, Daughter of Cheyk
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After you win a challenge in which at least 1 Clansman character participated, pay X gold to choose and return a location to its owner's hand, where X is the printed gold cost of that location.

name: Bronn
rules_text:
Deadly. No attachments.
Any Phase: Pay 2 gold to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, if that character would be killed and Bronn is kneeling, stand Bronn instead of killing that character.

name: Grand Maester Pycelle
rules_text: Response: After an opponent's effect reveals one or more cards, reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand (limit 3 per phase).
flavor_text: Pycelle is a toad. But better a Lannister toad than a Tyrell toad, no?
faqs: Grand Maester Pycelle cannot trigger his effect in response to the effect of another copy of Grand Maester Pycelle.

name: Raff the Sweetling
rules_text: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to look at the top card of an opponent's deck. Then put that card either on the top or bottom of his or her deck.
flavor_text: The boy's mother started screaming and Raff the Sweetling killed her as well.

name: Ser Jacelyn Bywater
rules_text:
Immune to character abilities.
Response: After Ser Jacelyn Bywater is killed, each opponent must choose and discard a card at random from his or her hand, if able.

name: Enemy Informer
rules_text: Response: After you play Enemy Informer from your hand, choose and kneel a character.
flavor_text: "Is everyone someone's informer in this cursed city?" - Eddard Stark

name: Qyburn's Informers
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which Qyburn's Informers participated, draw 2 cards.

name: Cersei's Attendant
rules_text: Response: After Cersei Lannister or Cersei's Attendant is killed, choose and kneel a character.
flavor_text: Serving men cleared away the swan, hardly touched. Cersei beckoned for the sweet.

name: Lurkers at Harrenhal
rules_text: Stealth. Deadly. No attachments.
flavor_text: Arya looked at Vargo Hoat again. How many monsters does Lord Tywin have?

name: Lannisport Steward
rules_text: [+2 Income]

name: Lannisport Weaponsmith
rules_text: [+1 Income]

House Lannister only. No attachments.

name: Lannisport
rules_text: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge, pay 1 gold to claim 1 power for your House (limit once per challenge).

name: Lannisport Brothel
rules_text: Response: After a knelt character stands during the standing phase, kneel Lannisport Brothel to kneel that character.

name: Golden Tooth Mines
rules_text: Each time you reveal a plot card, draw a card.
flavor_text: "I shall have to borrow money. No doubt the Lannisters will be accommodating. We owe Lord Tywin some three million dragons at present, what matter another hundred thousand?"

Limited.

rules_text:
Attached character gets +2 STR while it has a Power icon.
Attached character gets -2 STR while it does not have a Power icon.
flavor_text: "Half my knights are afraid to even say her name, did you know?" - Lord Stannis Baratheon

name: Motley
rules_text:
Attach to an opponent's character.
Attached character's controller must give you 1 gold token from his or her gold pool each time he or she wishes to declare attached character as an attacker or defender, or trigger attached character's ability.

name: Lightbringer
rules_text:
Vigilant. House Baratheon character only.
Response: Kneel Lightbringer to save attached character from being killed.

name: Stinking Drunk
rules_text: Attached character gets -4 STR while participating in a challenge.
flavor_text: "I hated watching Robert stumble to your bed every night, always wondering if this night he'd decide to claim his rights as husband." - Ser Jamie Lannister

name: Selyse Baratheon
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose a unique character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an Intrigue icon.
flavor_text: "You'd have to be a fool to want to bed Selyse Florent." - Littlefinger

name: Robert Baratheon
rules_text:
Renown.
When Robert Baratheon claims power for renown, he claims an additional power.
flavor_text: "Robert could piss in a cup and men would call it wine." - Lord Stannis Baratheon

name: Stannis Baratheon
rules_text:
Renown.
While Stannis Baratheon is attacking and the defending player controls no Lord characters, that player cannot declare defenders.

name: Renly Baratheon
rules_text:
Immune to opponent's character abilities.
Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to stand Renly Baratheon.

name: Melisandre
rules_text:
Renown.
While Melisandre is standing, Asshai characters get +1 STR. Power on opponents' characters does not count towards their total power.
flavor_text: It's as they say. This is his true queen, not the one he left at Eastwatch.

name: Ser Davos Seaworth
rules_text: Response: Save Ser Davos Seaworth from being killed, then pay 1 gold or return him to his owner's hand.
flavor_text: "He makes me wish I had more smugglers in my service" - Lord Stannis Baratheon

name: Brienne of Tarth
rules_text: Renown. Immune to opponent's character abilities.

name: Maester Cressen
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel Maester Cressen to choose and discard a Condition attachment from play.
flavor_text: When a maester donned his collar, he put aside the hope of children, yet Cressen had oft felt a father nontheless. Robert, Stannis, Renly: three sons he had raised after the angry sea claimed Lord Steffon.

name: Ser Axell Florent
rules_text: Response: After you win a Power challenge by 4 or more total STR, stand Ser Axell Florent.
flavor_text: The Florents of Brightwater Keep are sworn bannermen to Highgarden, and followed the Tyrells in declaring for King Renly.

name: Edric Storm
rules_text:
Stealth.
Limited Response: After you win a Power challenge as the attacker by 4 or more total STR, discard Edric Storm from play (cannot be saved) to initiate an additional Power challenge this phase. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

name: Devan Seaworth
rules_text: While any character you control has 1 or more power, Devan Seaworth gains stealth.
flavor_text: The boy wore a cream-colored doublet with a fiery heart sewn on the breast.

name: Knight of the Rainwood
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Knight of the Rainwood cannot be discarded from play.

name: Stannis's Northern Cavalry
rules_text:
Deadly. No attachments.
Stannis's Northern Cavalry cannot be killed or discarded from play during a phase in which its STR has been raised or lowered.

rules_text:
House Baratheon only. No attachments.

name: Old Red Priest
rules_text: After Old Red Priest is killed, choose and kneel a standing location you control, if able.
flavor_text: That can't be Thoros of Myr

name: Army of the Faithful
rules_text:
Renown. No attachments.
Lower the cost to play Army of the Faithful by 1 for each Asshai character you control.

name: Renly's Courtier
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Renly's Courtier to choose a non-unique character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as though its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

name: Bastard of Robert
rules_text: Stealth. No attachments.
flavor_text: What had John Arryn wanted with a king's bastard, and why was it worth his life?

name: House Tyrell Guard
rules_text: Response: After one of your House Baratheon characters is killed, put House Tyrell Guard into play from your hand.
flavor_text: "Tyrell swords will make me king." - Lord Renly Baratheon

name: Host of Storm's End
rules_text: No attachments.
flavor_text: The horse lines stretched out over leagues. A forest had surely been felled to make the tall staffs that held the banners.

name: Rhaegal
rules_text:
Stealth. No attachments.
Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to search your deck for a duplicate of Rhaegal and attach it to him. Then shuffle your deck.
faqs:
If I search for Riders of the Red Fork with Rhaegal (Core Set T109) can I attach the Riders of the Red Fork to Rhaegal as a duplicate?
Yes. Rhaegal's ability allows for the search of a duplicate, and the Riders of the Red Fork's ability allows them to be searched for as that duplicate. When Rhaegal's ability resolves it attaches the Riders of the Red Fork to itself as a legal duplicate.

name: Rhaegal
rules_text:

faqs:
If I search for Riders of the Red Fork with Rhaegal (Core Set T109) can I attach the Riders of the Red Fork to Rhaegal as a duplicate?
Yes. Rhaegal's ability allows for the search of a duplicate, and the Riders of the Red Fork's ability allows them to be searched for as that duplicate. When Rhaegal's ability resolves it attaches the Riders of the Red Fork to itself as a legal duplicate.

flavor_text: From her Dany recieved only a warning. "Beware."

name: Xaro Xoan Daxos
rules_text: After you play Xaro Xoan Daxos from your hand, choose and return a character you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: She hoped that Xaro Xoan Daxos was not an enemy...

name: Jhogo
rules_text:
Stealth.
While Jhogo has a Weapon attachment, he gets +2 STR.
flavor_text: ...Jhogo's whip coiled around his neck and cut off his shout.

name: Brown Ben Plumm
flavor_text:
"Well," said Brown Ben Plumm, "there was some old Plumm in the Sunset Kingdoms who wed a dragon princess. My grandmama told me the tale. He lived in King Aegon's day."
"Which King Aegon?" Dany asked. "Five Aegon's have ruled in Westeros."

rules_text:
House Targaryen only. No attachments.

House Targaryen only.

Response: After a card is placed in an opponent's dead pile, return The Titan's Bastard to its owner's hand.

flavor_text: The girl brushed her hair until it shone like molten silver, while the old woman annointed her with spiceflower perfume of the Dothraki plains.

flavor_text: The maester poured a slow trickle down his throat. Tyrion swallowed, scarcely tasting. Too late, he realized the liquid was milk of the poppy. By the time the maester removed teh funnel from his mouth, he was already spiraling back to sleep.

name: Ser Barristan Selmy
rules_text:
Renown. No attachments except Weapon.
After Ser Barristan Selmy enters play, all players shuffle their discard piles back into their decks.

name: Knight of Flowers
rules_text:
No attachments.
At the beginning of the dominance phase, Knight of Flowers claims 1 power if he is standing.

name: Crossroads
rules_text:
[+1 Income]
[+1 Influence]

name: Street of Sisters
rules_text:
Limit 1 per deck.
Marshalling: Kneel Street of Sisters to lower the cost of the next character with a Power icon you play this phase by 1.

name: Bodyguard
rules_text:
Lord or Lady character only.
Limit 1 per character.
Response: Discard Bodyguard from play (cannot be saved) to save attached character from being killed or discarded from play.

name: Maester Aemon
rules_text: Response: Kneel Maester Aemon to save a Night's Watch character from being killed.
flavor_text: "I am a maester chained and sworn. My order serves, Jon. We give counsel, not commands."

name: Magister Illyrio
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Magister Illyrio to choose an opponent and name a challenge type. That opponent must pay you 1 gold from his or her gold pool each time he or she initiates a challenge of this type.
faqs: Magister Illyrio's effect expires at the end of the phase.

name: Crossroads
rules_text:
[+1 Income]
[+1 Influence]

name: Crossroads
rules_text:
[+1 Income]
[+1 Influence]

name: Distraction
rules_text: Marshalling: Choose a character with a Military icon. Kneel that character.
flavor_text: "The Blackfish led the van, cutting down our sentries and clearing away the palisades for the main assault. By the time our men knew what was happening, men were pouring over the ditch banks..."

name: Winter is Coming
rules_text:
Challenges: Raise the Claim value on each House Stark player's revealed plot card by 1 for the duration of the challenge.
Limit 1 per round.
flavor_text: "The cold winds are rising. The Wall must be held." - Ser Allister Thorne

name: Kings in the North
rules_text: Response: Play after you win dominance. Kneel 2 of your House Stark characters to have them claim 1 power each.
flavor_text: "All sorts of people are calling themselves kings these days." - Lord Tyrion Lannister

name: Lethal Counterattack
rules_text:
Challenges: During a Military challenge, kneel 2 of your House Stark characters to kill all attacking characters.
Limit 1 per challenge.

name: Bran the Builder's Legacy
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Dominance: Pay 3 gold to search your deck for a location card with printed cost 2 or lower, and put that card into play. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Guilty!
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Dominance: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Noble character to choose and kill a non-House Stark character.

name: I Never Bet Against My Family
rules_text: Challenges: Pay X gold and kneel a House Lannister character to lower an opponent's claim by X (to a minimum of 0) for the duration of the challenge.
flavor_text: "Whatever you may believe of me, Lady Stark, I promise you this - I never bet against my family." - Lord Tyrion Lannister

name: The Lion's Will
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Any Phase: Pay 2 gold to choose a character. Kneel that character.

name: Insidious Ways
rules_text: Challenges: Choose an attacking House Lannister character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, draw 2 cards.

name: Call Their Bluff
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Dominance: Pay 2 gold to name a card. Each opponent then reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name.

name: I'm You Writ Small
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Challenges: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains deadly. Then, attach I'm You Writ Small to a House Lannister character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text "Attached character gets +2 STR").

name: A Lannister Pays His Debts
rules_text: Response: After you lose a challenge, kneel one of your House Lannister characters to choose and kill a participating character controlled by the winning opponent.

name: You've Killed the Wrong Dwarf!
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Any phase: Choose and kneel a non-Noble character. Then, that character claims 1 power.
flavor_text: The head he pulled out was grey-green, and covered with maggots.

name: Muster
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel one of your Knight characters to search your deck for a Knight character, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Prosperity and Plenty
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to take an attachment from your discard pile and attach it to a character you control. If the attachment cannot be legally attached, it is discarded.

name: Lords of the Narrow Sea
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Any Phase: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Noble character to force an opponent to reveal a new plot card. If the newly revealed plot card has a lower income than yours, claim 1 power for your House.
flavor_text: "Grant us wind to fill our sails, and your king could sit upon his Iron Throne by evenfall on the morrow." - Salladhor Saan

name: Retreat
rules_text: Response: After one of your unique characters is killed, return that character to your hand instead of placing it in your dead pile.
flavor_text: Lady Lysa's face was flushed with fury. "The gods have seen fit to proclaim him innocent, child. We have no choice but to free him."

name: Support of the Kingdom
rules_text: Response: After you win a Power challenge, choose any gold or influence producing location controlled by an opponent, and take control of that location.

name: Dance With Dragons
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to search your deck for a Dragon card, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: For the first time in hundreds of years, the night came alive with the music of dragons.

name: Forever Burning
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Deathbound.
Any Phase: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR.
Dominance: Kneel 1 influence or pay 2 gold to return Forever Burning from your dead pile to your hand.

name: Seductive Promise
rules_text:
Response: After you win a Power challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose a non-unique character controlled by the losing opponent. Take control of that character.
Limit 1 per phase.

name: Westeros Bleeds
rules_text: Dominance: Kneel 4 influence to discard all characters from play.
flavor_text: When the old king was still alive, he'd not have stood for this. "King Robert?" Arya asked, forgetting herself. "King Aerys, gods grace him," the old man said.

name: Distinct Mastery
rules_text: Any Phase: Choose and stand a Holy, Learned, Noble, or War character.

name: Shae
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Shae to choose and kneel a character controlled by a player with more power than you.
flavor_text: "My giant of Lannister."

name: Distinct Mastery
rules_text: Any Phase: Choose and stand a Holy, Learned, Noble, or War character.

name: Lady Daenerys's Chambers
rules_text: Response: After you play a House Targaryen character, return an attachment with printed cost equal to or lower than that character from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Summoning Season
rules_text: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then, you and that opponent must each search your decks for a character, reveal it, and put it into your hands. Then, shuffle your decks.
faqs:
When I reveal Summoning Season who chooses to search and reveal their character first?
Whenever an effect requires multiple players to choose targets or reveal cards simultaneously the controller of the effect always resolves the entire effect first and the other players resolve the effect in a clockwise order.

name: Mutual Cause
rules_text: When revealed, if you have more than one opponent, choose an opponent. You and that opponent cannot declare Power challenges against one another this round.

name: Uneasy Truce
rules_text: In order to initiate a Military challenge, an attacker must give the defender 2 gold tokens from his or her gold pool.

name: Rains of Autumn
rules_text: Characters, locations, and attachments do not provide income bonuses this round.

name: Good for the Gander
rules_text: When revealed, copy the "when revealed" ability of an opponent's revealed plot card.

name: Tourney for the Hand
rules_text: Each of your Knight characters gets +1 STR and is immune to opponent's character abilities.

name: Fleeing to the Wall
rules_text: When revealed, each player chooses up to 3 locations. All locations not chosen are discarded from play (cannot be saved) (cannot be canceled).

name: Drunken Allegations
rules_text: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then, you and that opponent must each choose and kneel a standing character.

name: Mutual Blackmail
rules_text: When revealed, if you have more than one opponent, choose an opponent. You and that opponent cannot declare Intrigue challenges against one another this round.

name: Planning Ahead
rules_text: Skip the taxation phase this round.

name: Wildfire Assault
rules_text: When revealed, each player chooses up to 3 of his or her characters. All characters not chosen are killed (cannot be saved).

name: Hear Me Roar
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Characters without an Intrigue icon get -1 STR.

name: Blockade
rules_text: The income on each opponent's revealed plot card is reduced to 0.

name: The Power of Blood
rules_text:
You may have up to 2 copies of The Power of Blood in your plot deck.
[Noble] characters cannot be killed.

name: Building Season
rules_text: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then, you and that opponent must each search your decks for a location, reveal it, and put it into your hands. Then, shuffle your decks.

name: Mutual Enemies
rules_text: When revealed, if you have more than one opponent, choose an opponent. You and that opponent cannot declare Military challenges against one another this round.

name: Holding the Trident
rules_text: While you control fewer characters than any opponent, each character you control gets +2 STR.

name: Calm Over Westeros
rules_text: In order to play an event card, a player must give an opponent one gold token from his or her gold pool.

name: Snowed Under
rules_text: At the beginning of the standing phase, choose one kneeling character or location controlled by each player. Return all chosen cards to their owner's hands.

name: The Power of Arms
rules_text:
You may have up to 2 copies of The Power of Arms in your plot deck.
[War] characters you control get +2 STR.

name: Valar Morghulis
rules_text:
Limit 1 per plot deck.
When revealed, kill all characters in play.

name: Condemned by the Realm
rules_text: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then, that opponent must choose and kill a character he or she does not control, if able.

name: Counting Favors
rules_text: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then, you and that opponent each draw three cards.

name: Power and Wealth
rules_text: Each character you control gets +1 STR for each attachment on it.

name: Mad King's Legacy
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
When revealed, choose and discard an attachment from play, if able.

name: Rule by Decree
rules_text: Cannot be cancelled. When revealed, the player with the most cards in hand chooses and discards cards from his hand until he has 4 cards in hand.

name: Noose and Swordpoint
rules_text: Characters with STR 2 or lower cannot stand during the standing phase.

name: Herding the Masses
rules_text: Non-unique characters cannot be declared as defenders.

name: Balon Greyjoy
rules_text: Renown.If Balon Greyjoy is the only King character in play, characters with lower STR than his cannot be declared as defenders while he is attacking.

name: Asha Greyjoy
rules_text: Renown.Asha Greyjoy cannot be saved.
flavor_text: ...lean and long legged, with black hair cut short, wind chafed skin, strong sure hands, a dirk at her belt.

name: Theon Greyjoy
rules_text: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to choose and kneel a location (limit once per round).
flavor_text: Theon vowed to himself, I must never go far from the sea again.

name: Euron Crow's Eye
rules_text:
Immune to events.
While Euron Crow's Eye is standing, House Greyjoy characters you control gain stealth.
flavor_text:
Only one living kraken has never known defeat.
Only one has never bent his knee.

name: Victarion Greyjoy
rules_text:
Intimidate.
Response: After you reveal a plot card, Victarion Greyjoy claims 1 power if you control a Warship location. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Aeron Damphair
rules_text:
Stealth.
If Aeron Damphair would be killed, instead search your deck for a non-unique Holy character with cost 3 or lower, put it into play, shuffle your deck and put Aeron Damphair on the bottom of your deck.

name: Maester Wendamyr
rules_text: Response: Kneel Maester Wendamyr to save a House Greyjoy character from being killed or discarded. Then, you may kneel 2 influence or kneel a Learned character to stand that character.
flavor_text: "Too long have the Ironborn listened to you chain-neck maesters." - Aeron Damphair

name: Wex Pyke
rules_text: While Wex Pyke is attacking, characters without crests cannot be declared as defenders.
flavor_text: Most squires have loose tongues, but Wex had been born dumb...

name: Sea Raiders
rules_text: Limited. No attachments.
flavor_text: "You are to harry the Stony Shore, raiding the fishing villages and sinking any ships you chance to meet." - Lord Balon Greyjoy

name: Stowaway
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Stowaway and discard the top card of your deck to choose an Ironborn character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an Intrigue icon.

name: Priest of the Drowned God
rules_text: Challenges: Discard the top card of your deck to give a Holy character +1 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Drumbeater
rules_text: Challenges: During a challenge in which you are the attacker, kneel Drumbeater to have that challenge considered unopposed if you win by 4 or more total STR.

name: Drowned Disciple
rules_text:
Stealth.
If Drowned Disciple would be killed, instead put it on the bottom of your deck. Then, each opponent discards the top 3 cards of his or her deck.

name: Dagmer Cleftjaw
rules_text:
Deadly.
Each Warship location you control counts as 2 STR during the dominance phase.

name: Ten Towers Honor Guard
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only. No attachments.
Challenges: You may put Ten Towers Honor Guard into play from your hand, under the control of any opponent. After that opponent wins a challenge in which Ten Towers Honor Guard participated, take control of Ten Towers Honor Guard.

name: Scurvy Cutthroat
rules_text: Response: After an opponent plays an attachment card, discard Scurvy Cutthroat from play (cannot be saved) to discard that attachment from play.

name: Assault of the Kraken
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, you may initiate an additional challenge of the same type this phase (this additional challenge must be the next challenge you initiate). If that additional challenge is opposed, neither player wins the challenge.

name: Kingsmoot
rules_text: Response: After you win dominance, kneel 2 standing Ironborn characters to choose and stand a House Greyjoy Lord or Lady character. Then, that character claims 2 power and you draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: "It is time we returned to the Old Way." - Aeron Damphair

name: Seasick
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: Cancel a triggered effect unless its controller kneels 1 influence.
flavor_text: His whiskers had become hopelessly befouled for the third time while he leaned over the rail and retched into the swirling winds.

name: Risen from the Sea
rules_text: Response: Save a House Greyjoy character from being killed. Then attach this card to the saved character (counts as a Condition attachment with the text 'Attached character gets +1 STR.')
flavor_text: What is dead may never die, but rises again, harder and stronger. - Greyjoy proverb

name: Support of Harlaw
rules_text:
House Greyjoy character only.
Attached character gains stealth.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, stand attached character.

name: Veteran Marauder
rules_text:
Attached character gains Stealth.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge in which attached character participated, attach Veteran Marauder to an opponent's location. Treat that location as if its printed text box were blank while Veteran Marauder is attached.

name: Iron Island Fiefdoms
rules_text:
Limited.
Marshalling: Kneel Iron Island Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next House Greyjoy card you play this phase by 1.
[+1 Influence]

name: Aeron's Chambers
rules_text:
You may choose to play Aeron's Chambers as an attachment to your House card.
[+1 Income]
[+1 Influence]

name: Sunset Sea
rules_text:
Marshalling: Discard Sunset Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next House Lannister or House Greyjoy character you play this phase by 2.
[+1 Influence]

name: Bloody Keep
rules_text:
Limited.
Marshalling: Kneel to lower the cost of the next House Greyjoy character you play this phase by 2.

name: The Iron Mines
rules_text: Response: Kneel and discard from play (cannot be saved) to save a character from being killed.
flavor_text: In those days, the ironborn did not work mines; that was labor for the captives brought back from the hostings.

name: Longship Iron Victory
rules_text:
At the end of the Marshalling phase, kneel each Warship location you control if you do not control a House Greyjoy character.
Challenges: Kneel Longship Iron Victory to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, draw a card.

name: Scouting Vessel
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Scouting Vessel to choose a defending character. For the duration of the challenge, that character does not count its STR.

name: Bay of Ice
rules_text:
After a player wins initiative, that player kneels all cards named Bay of Ice, then draws a card.
[+1 Initiative]

name: Gatehouse
rules_text:
Limited.
[+1 Income]

name: Kingdom of Shadows
rules_text:
After a player wins an Intrigue challenge, that player kneels all copies of Kingdom of Shadows to choose and stand a card with the S crest.
[+1 Income]

name: Robb Stark
rules_text:
Renown.
If Robb Stark is the only King character in play, he gains: "Any Phase: Kneel Robb Stark to reduce the cost of the next House Stark army you play this phase to 0."

name: Joffrey Baratheon
rules_text:
If Joffrey Baratheon is the only King character in play, he gets +1 STR for each gold token on him.
Response: After an opponent pays gold to marshall a character, put that gold on Joffrey Baratheon. (Limit once per round.)

name: Robert Baratheon
rules_text:
Renown.
If Robert Baratheon is the only King character in play, he gains: "Any Phase: Kneel Robert Baratheon to play an "Any Phase" event card from your discard pile as if you just played it from your hand. Then, shuffle that event card back into your deck."

name: Viserys Targaryen
rules_text: If Viserys Targaryen is the only King character in play, he gains: "Each attachment on Viserys Targaryen reduces the amount of power you need to win the game by 1 (to a minimum of 5)."

name: Myrcella Lannister
rules_text: If Myrcella Lannister is the only Queen character in play, she gains: "Any Phase: Kneel Myrcella Lannister to choose a Knight character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an Intrigue icon and stealth."

name: The Price of War
rules_text: Response: After you win a Military challenge in which you control at least 1 attacking War character, choose and discard from play up to 2 non-limited locations controlled by the losing opponent. (Limit 1 per round.)

name: Confession
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Holy character to look at an opponent's hand. Then, discard 1 non-limited card from that hand.

name: Seafarer's Bow
rules_text:
Challenges: Kneel attached character to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. (Limit once per phase.)
Challenges: Kneel Seafarer's Bow to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Assertion of Might
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel 4 influence or kneel a War character to claim 3 power for your House. (Limit 1 per phase.)

name: Shivering Sea
rules_text: Marshalling: Discard Shivering Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next neutral character you play this phase by 1.

name: Shadowcat
rules_text: Stealth. No attachments.

name: Silent Sisters
rules_text: Silent Sisters gets +1 STR for each character in your dead pile.

name: Randyll Tarly
rules_text: War characters you control get +1 STR.
flavor_text: "It is customary to take a finger from a thief, but a man who steals from a sept is stealing from the gods."

name: Jack of all Trades
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to give Jack of All Trades (choose one) a War , a Noble , a Learned , or a Holy crest until the end of the phase.

name: Godswood Attendant
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge in which Godswood Attendant participated, look at the top card of any player's deck. Then, you may discard that card or put it back on top of its owner's deck.

name: After the Mummer's Ford
rules_text: Each player may initiate an additional Military challenge this round.

name: Siege of Riverrun
rules_text: You cannot declare Intrigue challenges.

name: The Breaking of Oaths
rules_text: Each player may initiate an additional Intrigue challenge this round.

name: The Promise of Victory
rules_text: After you win an Intrigue challenge, you may put all cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck and replace them with an equal number of cards from the top of your deck.

name: Stay of Execution
rules_text: If a King or Queen character would be killed, instead return it to its owner's hand.

name: An Empty Throne
rules_text: Each player may initiate an additional Power challenge this round.

name: Rise of the Kraken
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
You claim an additional power for winning unopposed challenges.

name: The Red Viper
rules_text:
Renown. Immune to events and character abilities.
The Red Viper does not kneel to attack an opponent who controls more characters than you.

name: Arianne Martell
rules_text:
Stealth.
While Arianne Martell is attacking, raise the Claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.
flavor_text: "Martell brings some formidable companions, it would seem."

name: Doran Martell
rules_text: If a player loses a challenge as the attacker, that player must fulfill the claim of that challenge, using the Claim value on the defending player's plot card.
faqs: When an attacker is fulfilling the claim of a lost [Power] challenge because of Doran Martell's effect, the attacker must move the power from his or her House card to the defending player's House card.

name: Darkstar
rules_text:
House Martell only. Vengeful. Renown.
If Darkstar would be discarded from your hand or deck, put him into play instead.

name: Areo Hotah
rules_text: Response: After you lose a challenge by 4 or more total STR, kneel Areo Hotah to choose and kill 1 character.
flavor_text: "I am sorry, little princess."

name: Sarella Sand
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After you lose a challenge in which Sarella Sand participated as an attacker, kneel 1 influence to choose and stand 1 participating character.

name: Ellaria Sand
rules_text:
Vengeful.
Response: After you lose a challenge, move 1 power from any character to Ellaria Sand.
flavor_text: "And this is Ellaria Sand, mine own paramour." - Oberyn Martell

name: Harmen Uller
rules_text:
Renown.
While you have 7 or more cards in your hand, Harmen Uller does not kneel to attack.
flavor_text: Half of the Ullers are half-mad, so the saying went, and the other half are worse.

name: Ser Arys Oakheart
rules_text:
Renown. No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After Ser Aerys Oakheart comes into play, choose and discard 1 Ally or Mercenary character from play.

name: House Messenger
rules_text: After you play House Messenger from your hand, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck to all players. Then, put 1 of those cards into your hand, and the other on the bottom of your deck.

name: House Dayne Knight
flavor_text: "They whispered of Ser Arthur Dayne, the Sword of the Morning, deadliest of the seven knights of Aery's Kingsguard.

name: Paramour
rules_text: [+1 Influence]
flavor_text: She is not truly beautiful, she thought, but something about her draws the eye.

name: Lord Edric's Knight
rules_text: Stealth.
flavor_text: The salty Dornishmen were lithe and dark, with smooth olive skin and long black hair streaming in the wind.

name: House Dayne Skirmisher
rules_text:
No attachments.
Any Phase: Kill House Dayne Skirmisher (cannot be saved) to draw 1 card. Then, each opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand.

name: Orphan of the Greenblood
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard Orphan of the Greenblood from play (cannot be saved) to choose 1 character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a Military, an Intrigue, and a Power icon.

name: The Viper's Bannermen
rules_text:
Stealth. Deadly. No attachments.
Response: After The Viper's Bannermen comes into play or leaves play, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, then put them into your hand.

name: House Dayne Reserves
rules_text:
House Martell only. No attachments.
If House Dayne Reserves is discarded from your hand for the claim of an Intrigue challenge, put it into play instead of your discard pile.
Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to return House Dayne Reserves to its owner's hand.

name: Taste for Blood
rules_text:
Attached character gets +1 STR.
Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, attached character claims 1 power.
flavor_text: All men share a taste for blood...

name: Locked Away
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to have attached character lose 1 icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Blood for Blood
rules_text: Response: After 1 of your House Martell characters is killed, choose and kill 1 character with equal or lower STR. (Limit 1 per phase.)
flavor_text:
"You are going to fight that?" Ellaria Sand said in a hushed voice.
"I am going to kill that." her lover replied...

name: He Calls It Thinking
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: Cancel the effects of a response without an influence cost. Then, attach He Calls It Thinking to a House Martell character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text "Attached character gets +2 STR.").

name: The Prince's Wrath
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose 1 character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a Military, an Intrigue, and a Power icon.

name: Someone Always Tells
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you lose dominance, kneel 2 influence to return all standing characters to their owner's hands.

name: Scheming on the Sand
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Plot: Kneel 5 influence or 2 Noble characters to choose and reveal a new plot card. (If it is Summer, you may play Scheming on the Sand during the Challenge phase.)

name: Red Vengeance
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, kneel 2 influence to cancel the claim effect of that challenge. Then, choose an opponent to satisfy the claim of that challenge as if he or she had lost the challenge as the defender.
faqs:
How does Red Vengeance work during a power challenge?
The opponent chosen to satisfy the claim of a Power challenge moves power from his or her House card to the attacking player's House card. In some instances, this could amount to a single player moving power from his or her House card back to his or her House card.

name: Dornish Fiefdoms
rules_text:
Limited.
Marshalling: Kneel Dornish Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next House Martell card you play this phase by 1.
[+1 Influence]

name: Lord Doran's Chambers
rules_text:
You may choose to play Lord Doran's Chambers as an attachment to your House card.
[+1 Income]
[+1 Influence]

name: Summer Sea
rules_text:
Marshalling: Discard Summer Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next House Targaryen or House Martell character you play this phase by 2.
[+1 Influence]

name: Palace Fountains
rules_text:
Limited.
Marshalling: Kneel Palace Fountains to reduce the cost of the next House Martell card you play this phase by 1.

name: Water Garden
rules_text:
Limited.
[+1 Income]

name: Dorne
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel Dorne to choose 1 Trait. Until the end of the phase, reduce the gold cost for you to marshall cards with that Trait by 1.

name: The Old Palace
rules_text: Characters without an Intrigue icon cannot declare stealth.
flavor_text: ...the Old Palace and its shadow city were full of eyes.

name: The Spear Tower
rules_text: Characters without a Military icon get -1 STR.
flavor_text: A hundred and a half feet tall and crowned with a spear of gilded steel...

name: Tower of the Sun

rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.

Stealth.

Attach to your House card.

No attachments.

Deadly.

Card designed by the 2008 AGoT Melee World Champion, Tzu-Mainn Chen.

What happens if I play Frozen Solid on my opponent’s Pyromancer’s Cache?
Since the text “Attach to a location you control” on Pyromancer’s Cache is now blank, Pyromancer’s Cache is now illegally attached to a location and is therefore discarded (see FAQ section 3.20).

faqs:
Does Burning Bridges prevent a duplicate from being used to save a character?
Burning Bridges reads, "Players cannot trigger abilities on character, location, and attachment cards in play." It is referring to triggered abilities printed on the cards. Because the saves granted by duplicates is a "gained" ability rather than a printed one Burning Bridges does not have any effect on them

name: The Art of Seduction

faqs:
What happens if I reveal The Art of Seduction outside of the standard "each player chooses and reveals plot cards" framework action window?
The Art of Seduction can only choose an opponent who is revealing a plot that is not titled "The Art of Seduction" as part of the same framework action by which you are revealing The Art of Seduction. If no opponent meets this criteria, the "when revealed" effect on The Art of Seduction does nothing. Note that a when revealed plot effect that reveals a new plot card (such as Betrayal at the Wall) would still be considered a part of the same framework action window and works with The Art of Seduction. Any effect that reveals a new plot outside of this framework, however, would not work with The Art of Seduction.

rules_text: Challenges: Kneel 8 influence and remove Drowned Prophet from the game (cannot be saved) to end the challenges phase.
flavor_text: The first three men had offered their lives to the Drowned god fearlessly

name: Salt Wife
rules_text: Response: Kneel 2 influence to save an Ironborn character from being killed. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor_text: "If you were my salt wife, you'd do as I command" - Theon Greyjoy

name: Dragon Thief
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Ambush.
Response: After Dragon Thief comes into play, choose and discard a non-unique attachment from play.

name: Dragon Bite
rules_text: Attached character is killed any time it is participating in a challenge in which a Dragon character is participating.
flavor_text: Bones they were, broken and blackened. The longer ones had been cracked open for their marrow.

name: Field Spikes
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Field Spikes to choose an attacking character with STR 2 or lower. Its controller chooses either to remove that character from the challenge, or to kill that character after the challenge resolves.

name: Bringers of Law
rules_text:
Bringers of Law cannot be declared as an attacker.
Response: After an opponent initiates a challenge against you, stand Bringers of Law.

name: Feral Pack
rules_text:
No attachments.
While every character you control has the House Stark affiliation, Feral Pack gains: 'All Direwolf characters gain deadly, and all non-Direwolf characters lose deadly.'

name: First Mate
rules_text: Limited Response: After you win a Military or Power challenge in which First Mate is participating, put a Warship location from your hand or discard pile into play. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

name: Jaqen H'ghar
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard 1 power from your House to give Jaqen H'ghar a keyword of your choice until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: "A man sees. A man hears. A man knows."
faqs:
Which keywords may I select for Jaqen H'ghar to gain when using his ability?
Jaqen H'ghar's effect allows him to gain any unqualified keyword, that is, keywords that do not require additional text or qualifications beyond the name of the keyword in order to explain their full function. Unqualified keywords include, but are not limited to, keywords such as Stealth, Renown, Deadly, No Attachments, Stalwart, Vigilant, Joust, and Melee. Keywords such as "Immune to X" and "No attachments except X" are examples of qualified keywords outside the scope of Jaqen H'ghar's effect. Effects such as "cannot be killed" and "cannot be discarded" are not keywords.
This entry applies only to which keywords may be named and gained by Jaqen H'ghar's effect: specifically his controller cannot name any additional qualification(s) when gaining a keyword. Cards that copy or steal keywords from other cards in play may successfully interact with both qualified and unqualified keywords.

name: To Be a Wolf
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Play only if you have at least 1 Military Battle plot card in your used pile.
Challenges: Stand a [Stark] character you control to have an opponent name a card type. Search your deck for a card of a different type, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

name: To Be a Lion
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Play only if you have at least 1 Intrigue Gambit plot card in your used pile.
Response: After you win an [Intrigue] challenge, stand a [Lannister] character you control to choose and kneel a character without an [Intrigue] icon.

name: To Be a Stag
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Play only if you have at least 1 Power Struggle plot card in your used pile.
Challenges: Stand a [Baratheon] character you control to return a [Baratheon] character with a lower printed STR from your discard pile to your hand.

name: To Be a Kraken
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Play only if you have at least 1 Military Battle plot card in your used pile.
Response: Stand a [Greyjoy] character you control to cancel a triggered effect.

name: To Be a Dragon
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Play only if you have at least 1 Power Struggle plot card in your used pile. Challenges: Stand a House Targaryen character you control to put a House Targaryen character with a printed cost of 3 or lower into play from your dead pile.

name: Too Proud to Bow
rules_text: Dominance: Kneel X influence to discard all neutral characters from play. X is the number of neutral characters in play.
flavor_text: "Our knees do not bend so easily." - Ser Arthur Dayne

name: To Be a Viper

House Martell only.
Play only if you have at least 1 Intrigue Gambit plot card in your used pile. Response: After you lose a challenge, stand a House Martell character you control to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a Military , an Intrigue , and a Power icon.

name: Wolf Herald
rules_text: Response: After you play Wolf Herald from your hand, search your deck for a House Stark character, reveal it, and shuffle your deck. Then, put the revealed card on top of your deck.

name: Lion Herald
rules_text: Response: After you play Lion Herald from your hand, search your deck for a House Lannister character, reveal it, and shuffle your deck. Then, put the revealed card on top of your deck.

name: Fiery Followers
rules_text: Vigilant. No attachments except Boon.
flavor_text: "I know little and care less of gods, but the red priestess has power." - Stannis Baratheon

name: Herald of the Stag
rules_text: Response: After you play Herald of the Stag from your hand, search your deck for a House Baratheon character, reveal it, and shuffle your deck. Then, put the revealed card on top of your deck.

name: Herald of the Sea
rules_text: Response: After you play Herald of the Sea from your hand, search your deck for a House Greyjoy character, reveal it, and shuffle your deck. Then, put the revealed card on top of your deck.

name: Herald of the East
rules_text: Response: After you play Herald of the East from your hand, search your deck for a House Targaryen character, reveal it, and shuffle your deck. Then, put the revealed card on top of your deck.

name: Herald of the Sun
rules_text: Response: After you play Herald of the Sun from your hand, search your deck for a House Martell character, reveal it, and shuffle your deck. Then, put the revealed card on top of your deck.

name: Royal Guard
rules_text: Stalwart. Vigilant.
flavor_text: "... there were always dangers when men were in their cups, and a king should never be unguarded..." - Catelyn Stark

name: Dragon Chaser
rules_text: Ambush. Intimidate.
flavor_text: "Our decks will stink of pigs and chickens on the voyage east, but we'll return with dragons." - Euron Crow's Eye

name: Vendor of Venoms
rules_text:
Infamy. Vengeful.
Vendor of Venoms cannot be discarded from play while it has 2 or more power on it.
flavor_text: "He is dying of the venom, but slowly, and in exquisite agony." - Qyburn

name: Dacey Mormont

name: Salladhor Saan
rules_text:
Stealth.

name: Arstan Whitebeard
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
If you control Ser Barristan Selmy, discard Arstan Whitebeard from play (cannot be saved).
During the epic phase, Queen and Queensguard characters get +5 STR, and Arstan Whitebeard gains renown.

name: The Battle of the Whispering Wood
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single Military challenge with normal claim. The winner of each challenge may choose and kill a character without a Military icon controlled by the losing opponent. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase.)

name: The Battle of the Blackwater

House Lannister only.

The winner of each challenge may put into play an in-House character or location from his or her hand. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase.)

name: The Battle at the Wall
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single Power challenge with normal claim. The winner of each challenge may draw three cards. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase.)

name: The Battle of Deepwood Motte
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single Military challenge with normal claim. The winner of each challenge may choose and discard from play a location controlled by the losing player. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase.)

name: The Battle of Astapor
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single Power challenge with normal claim. The winner of each challenge may choose and discard any number of attachments from play. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase.)

name: The Viper's Revenge
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single Intrigue challenge with normal claim. The winner of each challenge may choose to have all players skip the standing phase this round. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase.)

name: Highgarden Cavaliers
rules_text: No attachments except Siege.

name: Hornvale
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, choose and kneel a character controlled by the losing opponent. If you trigger this response during the epic phase, draw a card.

name: Claw Isle
rules_text:
House Baratheon only. No attachments.
Response: After you win a challenge, kneel Claw Isle to move 1 power from the losing opponent's House card to yours. If you trigger this response during the epic phase, draw a card.

name: Besieged Shipyard
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge, kneel Besieged Shipyard to discard 1 power from any player's House card. If you trigger this response during the epic phase, draw a card.

name: Stormcrows
rules_text:
No attachments except Siege.

name: Pentos
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. No attachments.
Response: Discard a House Targaryen attachment (cannot be saved) from a character you control to save that character from being killed or discarded from play. If you trigger this response during the epic phase, draw a card.

name: Norvos

House Martell only. No attachments.
Response: After you lose an Intrigue challenge as the defender, discard a card at random from the attacking player's hand. (Discard 2 cards at random from the attacking player's hand if you trigger this response during the epic phase.)

name: The Gift
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel The Gift to reduce the cost of the next Night's Watch character you play this phase by 1. Then, if there is an Epic Battle card next to your plot deck, draw a card.
faqs: A card of the specified type must first be played at a reduced cost for the "then" effect to to occur.

name: The Land Beyond the Wall
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel The Land Beyond the Wall to reduce the cost of the next Wildling character you play this phase by 1. Then, if there is an Epic Battle card next to your plot deck, draw a card.
faqs: A card of the specified type must first be played at a reduced cost for the "then" effect to to occur.

name: The Neck
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel The Neck to reduce the cost of the next Clansman or neutral Creature character you play this phase by 1. Then, if there is an Epic Battle card next to your plot deck, draw a card.
faqs: A card of the specified type must first be played at a reduced cost for the "then" effect to to occur.

name: Old Nan

name: Rhaegar Targaryen
rules_text: Response: After Rhaegar Targaryen is killed, end the current round. Proceed to the next plot phase. Any player can trigger this response.

No attachments.

name: Overzealous Scout

name: Herald of the King

name: Battle of Ruby Ford
rules_text:
Deathbound.
Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single challenge with a claim value of 2. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase.)

name: Desperate Tactics
rules_text: Any phase: Return an Army character you control to your hand to put an Army character with a lower printed STR into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, return that character to your hand if it is still in play.

name: Lie for Your King!

Stalwart.

No attachments except Siege.

name: Disgruntled Mercenary

name: War Scorpion

name: Gates of Winterfell
rules_text:
No attachments.

name: Fishwhiskers
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
If you do not control a Warship location, kneel Fishwhiskers.
flavor_text: Fishwhiskers and his sons were quick to obey.

name: Compelled by the North
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Challenges: Each defending character gets +2 STR until the end of the challenge. Then, stand all House Stark characters with Banner attachments attached.

name: Compelled by the Rock
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Marshalling: Choose an attachment attached to a card you control. Move that attachment to another card you control.

name: Compelled by the Crown
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Challenges: Choose one participating character on each side during an Intrigue or a Power challenge. Remove all other characters from the challenge. Then, stand all House Baratheon characters with Banner attachments attached.

name: Compelled by the Sea
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Any phase: Choose and stand a non-unique location. Then, stand all House Greyjoy characters with Banner attachments attached.

name: Compelled by the Queen
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Any phase: Choose and stand or kneel an attachment. Then, stand all House Targaryen characters with Banner attachments attached.

name: Compelled by the Sun
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Challenges: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses an icon of your choice. Then, stand all House Martell characters with Banner attachments attached.

name: Banner for the North
rules_text: Response: After you win a Military challenge, you may attach Banner for the North (from play or from your hand) to a House Stark character as a Banner attachment with the text: 'Attached character gains stalwart.'

name: Campfire Lights
rules_text: Attach to an opponent's location. Kneel that location. Response: After you win a Military challenge, kneel Campfire Lights to search your deck for a Bannerman character, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Practical Believer

flavor_text: "The sparrow is the humblest and most common of birds, as we are the humblest and most common of men."

name: Banner for the Storm
rules_text: Response: After you win a Power challenge, you may attach Banner for the Storm (from play or from your hand) to a House Baratheon character as a Banner attachment with the text: 'Attached character gains vigilant.'

name: Zealous Collector
rules_text: Dominance: Kneel Zealous Collector to choose and discard from play up to 2 non-Banner attachments. Use this ability only if you control at least 3 Kingdom locations.

name: Banner for the Kraken
rules_text: Response: After you win a Military challenge, you may attach Banner for the Kraken (from play or from your hand) to a House Greyjoy character as a Banner attachment with the text: 'Attached character gains Intimidate.'

name: Ascetic Follower
rules_text: Dominance: Kneel Ascetic Follower to choose a Banner attachment. Unattach it, and put it into play under your control if it is a character. Otherwise, discard it.

name: Banner for the Dragon
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Response: After a character with ambush enters play, attach Banner for the Dragon to that character, if able. (Counts as a Banner attachment with the text: 'Any phase: Discard Banner for the Dragon from play to return attached character to its owner's hand.')

name: Banner for the South
rules_text: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge, you may attach Banner for the South (from play or from your hand) to a House Martell character as a Banner attachment with the text: 'Attached character gains vengeful.'

name: For Family and Honor
rules_text: Challenges: Until the end of the phase, characters you control with at least 1 Banner attachment gain renown and do not kneel to attack or defend.

name: Kings of Summer
rules_text: If it is Summer, draw 1 additional card during the draw phase. If it is Winter, draw 1 less card (to a minimum of 1) during the draw phase.

name: Black Raven
rules_text:
Immune to non-Raven cards.
Attach Black Raven to your House card and discard all other Raven attachments from play. It is Summer. Each player takes 1 additional gold token when he or she counts income.

name: Summer Tax
rules_text: Attach to a player's House card. After you play Summer Tax, draw a card. If it is Summer, attached card's owner needs 1 additional power to win the game. If it is Winter, attached card's owner needs 1 less power to win the game.

name: Fishing Net
rules_text: Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender, and does not count its STR for dominance.
flavor_text: "If it's a fishing village, they'd sell us fish, I bet" - Hot Pie

name: Dragon Sight
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Attach to your House card. If if is Summer, when you declare a challenge type, your opponent must declare defenders before you declare attackers. The opportunity for your opponent to declare defenders after you declare attackers is lost.

name: Jeyne Westerling
rules_text: If there is another Queen character in play, Jeyne Westerling cannot attack, defend, or trigger her character ability. Any Phase: Kneel Jeyne Westerling to search your deck for a King character, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Priestess of the Pyre
rules_text: If it is Summer, stand Priestess of the Pyre each time an event card is played. If it is Winter, kneel Priestess of the Pyre each time an event card is played.

name: Selyse Baratheon
rules_text: If there is another Queen character in play, Selyse Baratheon cannot attack, defend, or trigger her character ability. Dominance: If it is Summer, pay 1 gold to shuffle the top card of your discard pile back into your deck.

name: Summer's Champion
rules_text: If it is Summer, Summer's Champion gains renown. If it is Winter, Summer's Champion gets -2 STR and cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.

name: Scavengers of the Sea
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
After you play Scavengers of the Sea from your hand, choose a player with a House Greyjoy or a House Martell House card. Discard a card at random from that player's hand.

name: Fairweather Followers
rules_text: If it is Summer, stand Fairweather Followers each time an event card is played. If it is Winter, kneel Fairweather Followers each time an event card is played.

name: Red Warlock
rules_text: If it is Winter and you reveal a plot card, kneel Red Warlock. Response: After Red Warlock enters play, if it is Summer, search your deck for an attachment and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Starfall Bannerman
rules_text: If it is not Winter, House Dayne characters get +1 STR.
flavor_text: A quest that took us to Starfall, the Arbor, Oldtown, the Shield Islands, Crakehall, and finally Casterly Rock...

name: Maester of the Sun
rules_text:
Vengeful.
Response: If it is Summer, kneel Maester of the Sun and discard a card from your hand to save a House Martell character from being killed or discarded from play.

name: Knights of the Sun
rules_text: Knights of the Sun gets +1 STR for each gold token on it. Marshalling: If it is Summer, move any number of gold tokens from your gold pool to Knights of the Sun.

name: Carrion Bird
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Carrion Bird participated, shuffle any number of Raven cards from your discard pile, or one card with the printed Raven trait from play, back into their owner's decks. (Cannot be canceled.)

name: Lion's Gate
rules_text: If it is not Winter, Lion's Gate gains: "Any Phase: Kneel Lion's Gate to discard 1 power from a non-House card in play. Then, give that card a Trait of your choice until the end of the phase."

name: Summer Port
rules_text: Marshalling: If it is Summer, kneel Summer Port to reduce the cost of the next House Baratheon character you play this phase by 1.
flavor_text: Strangers are not so strange in a port as they are in little villages.

name: Open Market
rules_text: Dominance: If it is Summer, kneel Open Market and discard 2 cards from your hand to return any card from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor_text: Prices remained shockingly high... yet there seemed no lack of buyers.

name: A Song of Summer
rules_text: While it is Summer, your characters get +1 STR.

name: Kings of Winter
rules_text: If it is Winter, any opponent with as many cards in hand as you, or more, must randomly discard a card from his or her hand at the end of the draw phase. If it is Summer, any opponent with fewer cards in hand than you draws a card at the end of the draw phase, if able.

name: Son of a King
rules_text:
Attached character gains the Bastard trait and gets +1 STR.
All King characters get -1 STR and lose renown.
flavor_text: A bastard had to learn to notice things, to read the truth that people hid behind their eyes.

name: War Horn
rules_text: After you win a Military challenge in which attached character participated and it is Winter, choose and discard a location from play.
flavor_text: The sounds of drums and horns swirled up into the night.

name: White Raven
rules_text:
Immune to non-Raven cards.
Attach White Raven to your House card and discard all other Raven attachments from play. It is Winter. Each player takes 1 less gold token when he or she counts income.

name: Ranger of Winter
rules_text: If it is Winter, Ranger of Winter gains stealth, an Intrigue icon, and does not kneel to defend.
flavor_text: "Everyone talks about snows forty foot deep, and how the ice wind comes howling out of the north, but the real enemy is the cold." - Gared

name: Maester Vyman
rules_text: Response: If it is not Summer, kneel Maester Vyman to cancel a triggered effect that chooses a House Stark character as the only target.

name: Scavengers of King's Landing
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
After you play Scavengers of King's Landing from your hand, choose a player with a House Lannister or a House Stark House card. Discard a card at random from that player's hand.

name: Janos Slynt
rules_text:
No attachments.
If it is Winter, players must pay 1 gold to the treasury before triggering any effect with an influence cost.

name: Ice Fisherman

name: Valyrian Spirit
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
If it is Winter and Valyrian Spirit is killed, shuffle any player's dead and discard piles back into his or her deck.

name: Obara Sand
rules_text:
Stealth.
If Obara Sand is in your hand after your first mulligan, before you place any setup cards you may remove her from the game and take an additional mulligan.

name: Underhanded Assassin
rules_text: While Underhanded Assassin is attacking, participating characters with a higher STR do not count their STR.

name: Mance Rayder
rules_text: Power on Kingdom locations counts towards their controller's victory total. If it is Winter, Mance Rayder gains: 'Response: After you win a challenge in which Mance Rayder participated, take control of a Kingdom location controlled by the losing opponent. Then, that location claims 1 power.'

name: Ser Arthur Dayne
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
If you control fewer characters than the player who is attacking you, Ser Arthur Dayne cannot be bypassed by stealth and does not kneel to defend.

name: Carrion Bird
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Carrion Bird participated, shuffle any number of Raven cards from your discard pile, or one card with the printed Raven trait from play, back into their owner's decks. (Cannot be canceled.)

name: Northern Cave
rules_text: Challenges: If it is Winter, kneel Northern Cave to choose any number of participating characters you control, and remove those characters from the current challenge. Then, stand those characters.

name: The Wall

No attachments.
If it is Winter, your House Baratheon characters gain the Night's Watch trait and do not kneel to defend.
