name: Frozen Sea
rules_text: If it is Summer, discard Frozen Sea from play. If it is Winter, each opponent cannot initiate more than 2 challenges against you each phase.

name: Winter Armada
rules_text: If you reveal a plot card and it is Summer, kneel all House Greyjoy Warship locations you control. Any Phase: If it is Winter, kneel Winter Armada to choose an attacking House Greyjoy character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +4 STR and gains renown.

name: The Winds of Winter
rules_text: While it is Winter, opponent's characters get -1 STR.

name: The Long Winter
rules_text: Attach to a player's House card. (Limit 1 per House card.) If it is Winter, all characters with attached card's House affiliation get -1 STR. If it is Summer, return The Long Winter to its owner's hand.

name: Taxed Dry
rules_text: Attach to an opponent's income providing card. If it is Winter, attached card does not provide an income bonus. If it is Summer, when you count income you may also count the income bonus on the attached card.

name: Burning Sword
rules_text:
Unique character only.
If it is Winter, Burning Sword gains: 'Any Phase: Kneel Burning Sword to give attached character +2 STR and 'immune to card effects' until the end of the phase.'

name: The Long Summer
rules_text: Attach to a player's House card (Limit 1 per House card.) If it is Summer, all characters with attached card's House affiliation get +1 STR. If it is Winter, return The Long Summer to its owner's hand.

name: Demon's Dance
rules_text: Response: After the season changes to Winter or to Summer, kill attached character (cannot be saved).
flavor_text: "My son was poisoned." - Cersei Lannister

name: Shadow Stalker
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Shadow Stalker attacked alone and it is Winter, choose and kill a character.

name: Wintertime Marauders
rules_text: If it is Summer and you reveal a plot card, kneel Wintertime Marauders. Response: If it is Winter and you win a challenge in which Wintertime Marauders is participating, choose and discard a non-unique card from play.

name: Theon Greyjoy
rules_text: If you are playing a House Stark House card, reduce the gold penalty to play Theon Greyjoy by 1. Response: After you win a challenge in which Theon Greyjoy participated, choose a House Stark or House Greyjoy character. If it is Summer, stand that character. If it is Winter, kill that character.

name: Maester Aemon
rules_text:
No attachments except Boon.
Response: If it is not Winter, kneel Maester Aemon to save a Night's Watch character from being killed.
flavor_text: Stewarding for Maester Aemon had been as good a life as he'd ever known.

name: Southron Scavengers
rules_text:
House Martell only.
After you play Southron Scavengers from your hand, choose a player with a House Martell or House Greyjoy House card. Discard a card at random from that player's hand.

name: Walder Frey
rules_text:
Deadly.
After at least 1 defender is declared during a challenge, kneel Walder Frey to have him participate on the side that is currently winning the challenge.
flavor_text: "He is not reasonable. He is proud, and prickly to a fault." - Catelyn Stark

name: Secret Hideout
rules_text:
House Stark only.
If it is Winter, Secret Hideout gains Stalwart when you play it from your hand.
Any Phase: Until the end of the phase, players draw cards from the bottoms of their decks.

name: The Lion's Law
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Any Phase: If there is at least 1 Military Battle plot card revealed, pay 1 gold or kneel a War character to choose and kneel a character or location. Then, discard 1 power from the target.

name: Vigilant Stag
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel 2 influence to choose a unique House Baratheon character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains vigilant.
flavor_text: The sentries passed the spear along from watch to watch.

name: Thuggish Tactics
rules_text: Challenges: Choose a participating Ironborn character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gains intimidate.

name: Dragon Attack
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel a Dragon character to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.
flavor_text: Dragons always preferred to attack from above.

name: A Game of Cyvasse
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Challenges: Each player must choose and kneel a character with an Intrigue icon he or she controls, if able. Then, the player who knelt the character with the highest STR may choose and return a character to its owner's hand.
faqs:
If my opponent plays Game of Cyvasse and I do not cancel its effect can I discard a duplicate to prevent my Ser Arthur Dayne from being returned to my hand?
Yes. The "Then" effect on Game of Cyvasse opens a window for you to save Ser Arthur Dayne.

Could I use Starfall Advisor to cancel Game of Cyvasse's effect that would discard Ser Arthur Dayne?
No. A cancel must cancel an entire effect not just part of an effect. Since Starfall Advisor would not be able to trigger its ability when the event card is first played, the ability is not able to be triggered at all.

name: Den of the Wolf
rules_text: Characters lose all immunities. Any Phase: If it is not the marshalling phase, kneel 3 influence and discard Den of the Wolf from play (cannot be saved) to repeat the current phase at the end of the phase. (Limit once per game.)
flavor_text: Card designed by 2007 A Game of Thrones World Champion, Samuel Matthias Tham.

name: A Time for Ravens
rules_text: When revealed, search your deck for a Raven card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Unconventional Warfare
rules_text: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to give Unconventional Warfare the Military Battle, Power Struggle or Intrigue Gambit trait until the end of the phase.

name: Dawn
rules_text:
House Dayne character only.
If attached character is Ser Arthur Dayne, he gets +5 STR.
Challenges: If attached character is participating in a challenge in which an opponent has more participating characters than you, kneel Dawn to choose and kill a participating character.

name: Northern Scavengers
rules_text:
House Stark only.
After you play Northern Scavengers from your hand, choose a player with a House Stark or a House Lannister House card. Discard a card at random from that player's hand.

name: Grand Maester Pycelle
rules_text: Limited Response: After Grand Maester Pycelle is killed in the challenge phase, return all of your used plots to your plot deck. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)
flavor_text: "The game changed while I lay rotting in my bed."

name: Renly Baratheon
rules_text:
Renown.
If Renly Baratheon is the only King in play, he gains: 'After you win a Power challenge and there is at least 1 Power Struggle plot card revealed, draw a card.'

name: Kraznys mo Nakloz
rules_text: Challenges: If it is Summer, choose an opponent's attachment in play. Pay that attachment's printed gold cost to take control of that attachment, and attach it to a card of your choice. Limit once per attachment per phase.

name: Samwell Tarly
rules_text:
No attachments.
Response: After a Raven card is played, draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: "Why can't I just be Samwell Tarly?"

name: Fights No Sword Can Win
rules_text: Limited Response: After you reveal an Intrigue Gambit plot card, kneel a character with an Intrigue icon to kneel all characters with a Military icon. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

name: The Raven's Message
rules_text: Limited Response: After you reveal a Power Struggle plot card, kneel a character with a Power icon to kneel all characters with an Intrigue icon. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

name: At the Point of a Blade
rules_text: Limited Response: After you reveal a Military Battle plot card, kneel a character with a Military icon to kneel all characters with a Power icon. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)
flavor_text: "A rounded point, and dull, but it will go through your eye all the same." - Ser Jaime Lannister

name: Winterfell Rookery
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Response: After an opponent wins a Military challenge against you, kneel and discard Winterfell Rookery from play (cannot be saved) and pay 1 gold to reveal a new plot card.

name: Lannisport Rookery
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Response: After an opponent wins an Intrigue challenge against you, kneel and discard Lannisport Rookery from play (cannot be saved) and pay 1 gold to reveal a new plot card.

name: Dragonstone Rookery
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After an opponent wins a Power challenge against you, kneel and discard Dragonstone Rookery from play (cannot be saved) and pay 1 gold to reveal a new plot card.

name: Island Rookery
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: After you win a Military challenge by 4 or more total STR, kneel and discard Island Rookery from play (cannot be saved) and pay 1 gold to reveal a new plot card.

name: Qartheen Rookery
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Response: After you win a Power challenge by 4 or more total STR, kneel and discard Qartheen Rookery from play (cannot be saved) and pay 1 gold to reveal a new plot card.

name: Rookery of Sunspear
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge by 4 or more total STR, kneel and discard Rookery of Sunspear from play (cannot be saved) and pay 1 gold to reveal a new plot card.

name: Vale Rookery
rules_text: Response: After an opponent wins dominance, discard Vale Rookery from play (cannot be saved) and pay 1 gold to reveal a new plot card.

name: Heart of the Kingdom
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel a Kingdom location to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR.
flavor_text: "King's Landing is a true city, a thousand times the size of Winterfell." - Jon Snow

name: The Tower of Joy
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge with fewer participating characters than your opponent, kneel The Tower of Joy to choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent.

name: Desolate Passage
rules_text: Each player cannot declare more than 1 attacker or defender in each challenge.

name: The Raven's Song
rules_text: Any effect that would make it Summer or Winter is considered inactive while The Raven's Song is revealed.

name: Needle
rules_text: Attached character gets +1 STR and gains stealth. Response: After you play a character with stalwart from your hand, kneel 1 influence to attach Needle from your discard pile to that character.

name: Head of a Dwarf
rules_text: Attached character gains infamy. If attached character's controller would claim power for his or her House, that power must be placed on a character with at least one Head of a Dwarf card attached.

name: Bolton Refugee
rules_text: If you do not win dominance, pay 1 gold or discard Bolton Refugee from play.
flavor_text: He is a wary man, and we made him warier on the Green Fork. He will be slow to give pursuit.

name: Cat o' the Canals
rules_text:
No attachments except a single Weapon.
Immune to opponent's card effects.
If you control Arya Stark, discard Cat o' the Canals from play.
faqs:
Is Cat o' the Canals immune to stealth?
Stealth resolves as a card effect that targets a character on the defending side. As she is immune to opponent's card effects, Cat o' the Canals cannot be chosen as a target of stealth.

name: Mountain Refugee
rules_text: If you do not win dominance, pay 1 gold or discard Mountain Refugee from play.
flavor_text: The mountain clans were lawless brigands, descending from the heights to rob and kill and melting away like snow whenever the knights rode out from the Vale in search of them.

name: Highgarden Refugee
rules_text: If you do not win dominance, pay 1 gold or discard Highgarden Refugee from play.
flavor_text: "So long as they keep to themselves we let them spin their little webs, but if they get underfoot we step on them." - The Queen of Thorns

name: Arena Knight
rules_text:
Vigilant.
During Power challenges, Arena Knight gains renown.
flavor_text: "Your warhorse, now, he may not be the best one for the joust." - Hullen

name: Island Refugee
rules_text: If you do not win dominance, pay 1 gold or discard Island Refugee from play.
flavor_text: Goosefleshed and dripping, he splashed back onto land, across cold wet sand and sea scoured pebbles.

name: Alannys Greyjoy
rules_text:
If there is another Queen character in play, Alannys Greyjoy cannot attack, defend, or trigger her character ability.
Any Phase: Kneel Alannys Greyjoy to choose an opponent. If that opponent does not kneel a character he or she controls with higher STR than Alannys Greyjoy, discard a card at random from his or her hand.

name: Refugee of the Plains
rules_text: If you do not win dominance, pay 1 gold or discard Refugee of the Plains from play.
flavor_text: The man who does not ride was no man at all, the lowest of the low, without honor or pride.

name: Dragonstone Scavenger
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
After you play Dragonstone Scavenger from your hand, choose a player with a House Targaryen or a House Baratheon House card. Discard a card at random from that player's hand.

name: Refugee of the Citadel
rules_text: If you do not win dominance, pay 1 gold or discard Refugee of the Citadel from play.
flavor_text: The world is wide... I do not need to go back to old Walgrave and the ravens.

name: Pit Viper
rules_text:
Deadly.
Response: After a challenge resolves in which Pit Viper attacked alone, discard Pit Viper from play (cannot be saved) to choose and kill another participating character.

name: Bandit of Winter
rules_text: If it is Winter, Bandit of Winter gains: 'After this card is played from your hand, discard a House Stark or House Greyjoy location from play.'

name: River Bandit
rules_text: If it is not Summer or Winter, River Bandit gains: 'After this card is played from your hand, discard a House Baratheon or House Lannister location from play.'

name: Bandit of Summer
rules_text: If it is Summer, Bandit of Summer gains: 'After this card is played from your hand, discard a House Targaryen or House Martell location from play.'

name: Vale Refugee
rules_text: If you do not win dominance, pay 1 gold or discard Vale Refugee from play.
flavor_text: "No one can hurt me as long as I stay here."

name: Gilly
rules_text: If it is Winter, discard Gilly from play. If it is Summer, Gilly gains +2 STR, a Power icon, and 'After you win a challenge in which Gilly participated, draw a card.'

name: War of Five Kings
rules_text: Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase in which each player may initiate a single challenge of his or her choice. Instead of the normal claim effects, any player who loses one of these challenges as the defender must select his or her next plot card at random. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of the epic phase.)

name: The Tides of War
rules_text: After you win a challenge and it is Summer or Winter, choose and reveal a new plot card.

name: Desperate Looters
rules_text: Response: After Desperate Looters enters play or leaves play, discard the top card of each opponent's deck.
flavor_text: The looters had even made off with the Mother's costly robes...

name: Depleted Host
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Depleted Host participated, search your deck for a Reinforcements event card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Northern Cavalry Flank
rules_text:
Deadly. No attachments except Siege.
If an opponent is running an agenda, Northern Cavalry Flank does not kneel to attack.

name: Northern Infantry
rules_text:
Deadly. No attachments except Siege.
If no opponent is running an agenda, Northern Infantry does not kneel to defend.

name: Weary Swordsmen
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After a Reinforcements event card is played, choose and kneel a character without an Intrigue icon.
flavor_text: A weary smile brushed his lips.

name: Tommen Baratheon
rules_text: If there is another King character in play, Tommen Baratheon cannot attack, defend, or trigger his character ability. Marshalling: Kneel Tommen Baratheon to draw a card.

name: Exhausted Horsemen
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After a Reinforcements event card is played, stand Exhausted Horsemen.
flavor_text: There was only the oncoming horseman and the longaxe in his hand.

name: Stormland Scavengers
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
After you play Stormland Scavengers from your hand, choose a player with a House Baratheon or a House Targaryen House card. Discard a card at random from that player's hand.

name: Weathered Crew
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After a Reinforcements event card is played, put a Warship location into play from your discard pile.

name: Pirates of Orkmont
rules_text:
Intimidate. No attachments.
X is the highest gold value on an opponent's revealed plot card.
flavor_text: The north has nothing for us. Ice and war and pirates.

name: Destitute Horde
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon or Boon.
Response: After a Reinforcements event card is played, choose an attachment controlled by an opponent. Take control of that attachment, and attach it to Destitute Horde, if able. Otherwise, discard it from play.

name: Desert Exiles
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After a Reinforcements event card is played, draw a card.
flavor_text: Every additional man doubled the risk of betrayal.

name: Men With No King
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Limited Response: After a Reinforcements event card is played, pay 2 gold to choose a character or location that does not have its owner's House affiliation. Take control of that card. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

name: Retreat and Regroup
rules_text: Challenges: Play before any challenges have been inititated this phase. If you lose 2 or more challenges this phase, you may return any number of non-unique characters from your discard pile to your hand. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of the phase.)
faqs: If this event's conditions are met, affected characters are returned to the player's hand at the end of the challenge phase.

name: Missing Recruit
rules_text: Any phase: Play if you have lost a Military challenge this phase. Pay 1 gold to put Missing Recruit into play from your hand as a character with 3 STR, a Military icon, stealth, and renown.

name: Spy in Their Midst
rules_text: Any phase: Play if you have lost an Intrigue challenge this phase. Pay 1 gold to put Spy in Their Midst into play from your hand as a character with 3 STR, a Intrigue icon, stealth, and renown.

name: Beguiled Bodyguard
rules_text: Any phase: Play if you have lost a Power challenge this phase. Pay 1 gold to put Beguiled Bodyguard into play from your hand as a character with 3 STR, a Power icon, stealth, and renown.

name: Winter Reserves
rules_text:
Play only if it is Winter.
Any phase: Play if you have lost a challenge this phase. Pay 1 gold to put Winter Reserves into play from your hand as an Army character with 4 STR, a [Military], an [Intrigue], a [Power] icon, and deadly.

name: Summer Reserves
rules_text:
Play only if it is Summer.
Any phase: Play if you have lost a challenge this phase. Pay 1 gold to put Summer Reserves into play from your hand as an Army character with 4 STR, a [Military], an [Intrigue], a [Power] icon, and deadly.
faqs:
If I have a Summer Reserves that has been killed and I play Narrow Escape will it come back into play?
No. Narrow Escape only puts into play character cards that have been killed or discarded. Event, attachment, or location cards that were characters when they were killed or discarded do not qualify

name: Summer Encampment
rules_text: Any phase: If it is Summer, kneel Summer Encampment to return a character you control to its owner's hand.

name: Arya Stark
rules_text:
House Stark only.
If it is Winter, Arya Stark gains Stealth and Deadly. If Arya Stark is killed, put her into Shadows instead of your dead pile.
flavor_text: "He made me a ghost instead of a mouse."

name: Hungry Mob
rules_text: After you pay 3 or more gold for a card or effect, kneel Hungry Mob.
flavor_text: The mob surged around her, shrieking, a maddened beast with a thousand faces.

name: Hidden Chambers
rules_text:
No attachments.
If it is Winter, reduce the cost to bring your cards out of Shadows by 1. If it is Summer, return Hidden Chambers to your hand.

name: Bound by Duty
rules_text: Challenges: Choose a kneeling House Stark character. Until the end of the phase, that character is eligible, while kneeling, to be declared as a defender for any challenge in which it could normally participate.

name: Tyrion Lannister
rules_text:
House Lannister only. Stealth.
Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, Tyrion Lannister gets +2 STR and gains your choice of Deadly, Renown, No attachments, or Immune to Events until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: "Sorry. Dwarfs don't have to be tactful."

name: Tunnels of the Red Keep
rules_text: Your characters get +1 STR for each card you have in Shadows.
flavor_text: He remembered the old stories about Maegor the Cruel, who murdered all the masons who labored on his castle, so they might never reveal its secrets.

name: City Watch
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After you win a challenge in which City Watch is participating, choose an opponent. At the beginnig of the next phase, that player must randomly choose one of his or her cards in Shadows, and either bring it out of Shadows (paying any necessary costs) or discard it from play.

name: Kingswood Trail
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After you declare attackers during a Power challenge, put Kingswood Trail into Shadows to choose and kneel a character with a Power icon controlled by the defending player.

name: Wharf Rats
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only. No attachments.
Wharf Rats cannot be killed. After Wharf Rats' controller wins a challenge, discard the top card of its controller's deck. Response: After Wharf Rats comes out of Shadows, choose an opponent. That opponent takes control of Wharf Rats.

name: Kraken Tattoo
rules_text: Attached character gains the Ironborn trait. Response: After a card is discarded from a player's deck, attached character gets +1 STR and Intimidate until the end of the phase.

name: Treaty with the Isles
rules_text: Ignore the out of House gold penalty on all House Greyjoy cards. Each opponent without a Treaty agenda needs 5 fewer power (to a minimum of 10) to win the game.

name: Ser Barristan Selmy
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Renown. No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After Ser Barristan Selmy comes out of Shadows, look at one opponent's hand. Then, name a non-plot card. No player can play that card during this phase.

name: Dragon Skull
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Attached character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0. Response: After Dragon Skull comes out of Shadows, attach it to an opponent's character or discard it from play.

name: Nomadic Trader
rules_text: Response: After an opponent plays an event card, take 1 gold from the treasury and add it to your gold pold.

name: Treaty with the South
rules_text: Ignore the out of House gold penalty on all House Martell cards. Each opponent without a Treaty agenda needs 5 fewer power (to a minimum of 10) to win the game.

name: The Shadow of the South
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After The Shadow of the South comes out of Shadows, choose an opponent. That opponent cannot play event cards during this phase. Then, if it is Summer, return The Shadow of the South to its owner's hand.

name: Ser Meryn Trant
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, choose and stand a Kingsguard character.
flavor_text: Ser Meryn Trant simply did not care.

name: Shadow Politics
rules_text: Response: After Shadow Politics comes out of Shadows, choose a player. That player may initiate an additional Intrigue challenge against an opponent of his or her choice as a standard player action this phase.

name: City of Lies
rules_text: When revealed, you may put up to 2 cards with the Shadow crest into Shadows from your hand without paying any costs.

name: City of Shadows
rules_text: You may ignore the "House X only" deckbuilding restriction on any card with the Shadow crest. Whenever you bring any card with a "House X only" restriction that does not match your House card out of Shadows, pay 1 additional gold. If you do not have any cards in Shadows, you cannot claim power for unopposed challenges.

name: Catelyn Stark
rules_text: If it is Winter and you have at least 1 card in Shadows, opponents cannot declare Intrigue challenges against you.
flavor_text: She was no longer as young as she had been.

name: Septa Mordane
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Septa Mordane to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -X STR, where X is the number of cards in Shadows.

name: Storm Dancer
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, kneel Storm Dancer to draw a card. (If it is Winter and you have at least 1 card in Shadows, draw 3 cards instead.)
flavor_text: High overhead, the far-eyes sang out from the rigging.

name: Cersei Lannister
rules_text: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which Cersei Lannister participated, choose and kneel up to X non-Army characters. X is the number of cards you control in Shadows.

name: Gold Cloaks
rules_text:
House Lannister only. No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After Gold Cloaks comes out of Shadows, draw a card for each Mercenary character you control.

name: A Fistful of Coppers
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Response: After A Fistful of Coppers comes out of Shadows, move 2 gold from the treasury to your gold pool.
flavor_text: "You found forty thousand golden dragons for a champion's purse, surely you can scrape together a few coppers to keep the king's peace." - Lord Eddard Stark

name: Sweet Cersei
rules_text: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to choose a House Lannister character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR.
flavor_text: "A swift ship, and as strong as the queen she's named for." - Lord Waters

name: Moon Boy
rules_text: Plot: Discard Moon Boy from play to choose an opponent with at least 1 plot card in his or her used plot pile. The next time that opponent must choose a plot this phase, the selection must come from his or her used plot pile. (Limit once per game.)

name: Abandoned Forge
rules_text:
House Baratheon only. No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After Abandoned Forge comes out of Shadows, pay X gold to search your deck for X Weapon attachments, and attach them to Abandoned Forge. Any Phase: Kneel Abandoned Forge to move a Weapon attachment from Abandoned Forge to your hand.

name: Balon Greyjoy
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only. Renown.
Response: After a card with the Shadow crest is discarded from a player's deck, kneel 1 influence or kneel a Noble character to put that card into Shadows under your control. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Balon's Rebellion
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Any Phase: Kneel a House Greyjoy Lord character to choose and kneel X locations. X is the STR of the knelt character.

name: Street Waif
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Street Waif to choose an opponent. If you have more than 1 card in your discard pile, that opponent must choose a card in your discard pile. Return the card to your hand.
flavor_text: He was in a black mood, and not just because a few street urchins wanted to pelt him with dung.

name: Tears of Lys
rules_text: Attached character gains an Intrigue icon and Deadly. Response: After an opponent's character is killed during an Intrigue challenge, discard Tears of Lys to draw a card.
flavor_text: "A rare and costly thing, clear and sweet as water, and it leaves no trace." - Varys

name: The Shadow of the East
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Response: After The Shadow of the East comes out of Shadows, choose and discard 1 attachment from play. Then, if it is Summer, return The Shadow of the East to its owner's hand.

name: Flea Bottom Scavenger
rules_text: Response: After you play Flea Bottom Scavenger from your hand, draw 3 cards if you have no power on your House card.
flavor_text: Amidst the tumbles of rock, she spied brightly colored cloth and bits of shiny metal.

name: Lost Oasis
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Lost Oasis to choose a House Martell character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains Stealth and "after this character bypasses a character by using Stealth, kneel that character."

name: The Hound
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After you play The Hound from your hand, kneel all Knight characters in play.
flavor_text: "We'll see how brave you are then."

name: Condemned by the Council
rules_text: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge, choose a location controlled by the losing opponent. If that location has the Shadow crest, return it to Shadows. Otherwise, discard it from play.

name: Twilight Market
rules_text:
Limited.
Marshalling: Kneel Twilight Market to reduce the cost of the next card you play from your hand into Shadows this phase by 1.
flavor_text: The cloudless sky turned a deep purple, the color of an old bruise, then faded to black.

name: City of Sin
rules_text: When revealed, choose and kneel up to X characters. X is the number of City plots in your used pile.

name: Eddard Stark
rules_text:
Renown.
If you have a House Baratheon House card, reduce the gold penalty to play Eddard Stark by 1.
Response: Cancel a triggered effect that chooses a Noble character as the only target. Then, draw a card. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Tower of the Hand
rules_text:
House Stark only.
If it is Winter, move 1 gold from the treasury to your gold pool each time a card comes out of Shadows.
flavor_text: "No one enters or leaves the Tower of the Hand without my leave." - Eddard Stark

name: Tywin Lannister
rules_text:
Renown.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Tywin Lannister participated, choose a card with the Shadow crest that is currently in play. That card returns to Shadows.

name: Ser Jaime Lannister
rules_text:
Deadly.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Ser Jaime Lannister participated, choose and kneel a non-Army character.
flavor_text: "There are no men like me."

name: Shae's Manse
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, look at the top card of your deck. Then, place that card on the top of your deck or on the bottom of your deck.

name: Robert Baratheon
rules_text:
Renown.
Any phase: Stand Robert Baratheon. Use this ability only if there are no cards in Shadows. Limit 3 times per phase.
flavor_text: "I swear to you, sitting a throne is a thousand times harder than winning one."

name: Royal Entourage
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After you play a Lord or Lady character from your hand, put Royal Entourage into play from your hand or discard pile.

name: Jousting Steed
rules_text:
Knight character only.
Attached character gains Renown. Challenges: Unattach Jousting Steed. Then, it becomes a STR 2 character with a Military and a Power icon and "while Jousting Steed is attacking alone, no more than 1 character can be declared as a defender." At the end of the phase, return Jousting Steed to its owner's hand if it is still in play.

name: The Iron Throne
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After The Iron Throne comes out of Shadows, choose an opponent. If that opponent has more cards in hand than you, discard a card at random from that player's hand. Response: After an opponent draws a card outside of the draw phase, The Iron Throne goes into Shadows.

name: Seaside Urchin
rules_text: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which Seaside Urchin participated, discard the top card of the losing opponent's deck. If that card is an attachment or an event card, Seaside Urchin claims 1 power.

name: Harbor Thug
rules_text: Response: After you win a Military challenge in which Harbor Thug participated, discard the top card of the losing opponent's deck. If that card is a character, Harbor Thug claims 1 power.

name: The Shadow of the Isles
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: After The Shadow of the Isles comes out of Shadows, each player must choose and discard 1 non-limited location from play that he or she controls. Then, if it is Winter, return The Shadow of the Isles to its owner's hand.

name: Merchant Spy
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Merchant Spy and move 1 gold from your gold pool to an opponent's gold pool to look at that player's hand. Then, you may give that opponent an additional 1 gold to choose and discard an attachment card from his or her hand.

name: Aegon's Hill
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Aegon's Hill to look at an opponent's hand. You may choose one character card in that hand and place it in its owner's dead pile.
flavor_text: The bluffs on which it crouched were steep and rocky, spotted with lichen and gnarled thorny trees.

name: Dornish Paramour
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge in which Dornish Paramour participated, discard it from play to draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: She is not truly beautiful, but something about her draws the eye.

name: By the Light of the Sun
rules_text: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge, the losing opponent must choose and discard one card in Shadows that he or she controls.

name: Jon Arryn
rules_text:
Renown.
Jon Arryn cannot be saved. Response: After Jon Arryn is killed, put a Noble character into play from your hand or discard pile.
flavor_text: The Lord of the Eyrie had raised his moon-and-falcon banners in revolt rather than give those he had pledged to protect.

name: Ser Preston Greenfield
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Ser Preston Greenfield participated as the defender, he claims 1 power.
flavor_text: "Your Grace, the sight of our white cloaks might enrage the mob." - Ser Boros Blount

name: The Hand's Judgement
rules_text: Response: Pay 1 gold to cancel the effects of an event card that has just been played.
flavor_text: "So what will you do, m'lord, now that you're the Hand of the King?" - Shae

name: City of Secrets
rules_text: When revealed, shuffle the top X cards of your discard pile back into your deck. X is the number of City plots in your used pile.

name: Sansa Stark
rules_text: If there are no cards in Shadows, Sansa Stark gets +2 STR, a Noble crest, and gains Renown.
flavor_text: "It's better than the songs."

name: Ser Dontos Hollard
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Response: Stand Ser Dontos Hollard to save a Lady character from being killed or discarded from play.
flavor_text: "... all those years I was a knight, I was truly a fool, and now that I am a fool I think... I think I may find it in me to be a knight again..."

name: Maester Malleon's Tome
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Attached character gains an Intrigue icon. Response: After Maester Malleon's Tome comes out of Shadows, attach it to a unique character. Then, if it is Winter, look at an opponent's unused plot deck, and move a plot card from that plot deck to that player's used plot pile.

name: Joffrey Baratheon
rules_text:
Immune to triggered effects.
Response: After an opponent's character is knelt, pay 1 gold to stand Joffrey Baratheon. Then, he claims 1 power.

name: Flogged and Chained
rules_text: Attach to a non-Army character. Response: After a character is knelt by a triggered effect, kneel attached character.
flavor_text: He had been whipped. His back and shoulders had been laid almost bare...

name: The Queen of Thorns
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, The Queen of Thorns claims 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor_text: "Here, Sansa, sit here next to me, I'm much less boring than these others."

name: Margaery Tyrell
rules_text: Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, choose a non-Lady character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box was blank.

name: The Black Cells
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, kneel The Black Cells to choose an opponent's character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot kneel or stand.

name: Distinguished Boatswain
rules_text: Distinguished Boatswain gets -2 STR for each card in Shadows.
flavor_text: "Lordsport has no lack of strong arms." - Theon Greyjoy

name: Blackwater Raiders
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only. No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After Blackwater Raiders come out of Shadows, choose a location in an opponent's discard pile. Put that location into play under your control.

name: Scurvy
rules_text: Attach to an opponent's character, then draw a card. Attached character cannot be saved.
flavor_text: "The Drowned God needed a strong oarsman, I fear..." - Iron Islands Mariner

name: Fishmonger's Square
rules_text:
No attachments.
Response: After an attachment or event card is discarded from a player's deck, kneel Fishmonger's Square to draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: Buyers flocked around the barrels and stalls to haggle over winkles, clams, and river pike.

name: Daemon Blackfyre
rules_text:
Renown.
House Targaryen characters you control gain a War crest.
flavor_text: "Traitors have always paid with their lives." - Ser Davos Seaworth

name: The Dragonpit
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
If you have at least 1 card in Shadows, any characters controlled by opponents who do not have more cards in Shadows than you do get -1 STR.

name: The Red Viper
rules_text:
House Martell only.
If you are not running an Agenda, The Red Viper gains: "Response: After The Red Viper is killed, kill all characters in play."
flavor_text: "It is me you must contend with now, not my patient, prudent, and gouty brother."

name: The Viper's Rage
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you lose a challenge by 4 or more total STR as the defender, all characters controlled by the attacker lose a Military, an Intrigue, and a Power icon until the end of the phase.

name: Syrio Forel
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Syrio Forel participated, put him into Shadows.
flavor_text: "I am your dancing master."

name: The Red Keep
rules_text:
No attachments.
If The Red Keep would leave play, it goes into Shadows instead of going to its owner's hand, deck, discard, or dead pile.
[+3 Influence]

name: The White Book
rules_text:
If you control at least 1 Kingsguard character, claim 1 power for your House each time you successfully defend a challenge.
Each time you lose a challenge as the attacker, kneel a standing Kingsguard character you control or discard 1 power from your House.
faqs:
In order to "successfully defend" a challenge and use the effect of The White Book agenda, do you need to win the challenge?
Yes, you must win a challenge as the defending player in order to successfully defend it.

name: City of Spiders
rules_text: When revealed, you may trigger the "when revealed" effect of any City plot card in your used pile.

name: Jeyne Poole
rules_text: Response: Discard Jeyne Poole from play to cancel the triggered effect of a card that just came out of Shadows.
flavor_text: Jeyne was only a steward's daughter, after all...

name: Cannot be Bribed, Cannot be Bought
rules_text: Response: After a character is knelt by an opponent's card effect, stand that character. Then, that character claims 1 power and you draw a card.

name: Qyburn
rules_text:
House Lannister only. Deadly.
Response: After Qyburn comes out of Shadows, choose a non-Army character in an opponent's dead pile. Put that character into play under your control. If that character is still in play at the end of the phase, return it to its owner's dead pile.

name: Littlefinger
rules_text:
Stealth. No Condition attachments.
Littlefinger does not kneel to attack. Reduce the cost to play Littlefinger by 1 for each card in Shadows.
flavor_text: "I do not trust him. Nor should you." - Tyrion Lannister

name: Death by Payne
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Response: After a character triggers its character ability, kneel Ser Ilyn Payne or a Noble to kill that character.
flavor_text: There was only one service he might be needed for.

name: Knight of Flowers
rules_text:
Renown.
If there are no cards in Shadows, Knight of Flowers does not kneel to attack or defend.
flavor_text: This is what it does to you, to be too good too young.

name: Small Council Chamber
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
After you win an Intrigue challenge, Small Council Chamber goes into Shadows. Response: After Small Council Chamber comes out of Shadows, return a Small Council event from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Ancient Mariner
rules_text: Ancient Mariner gets -3 STR during Military challenges.
flavor_text: His own hair was snow white as well, and his huge beard covered him like a blanket from cheeks to thighs, so it was hard to tell where the beard ended and the pelt began.

name: Shore Leave
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose and stand a kneeling character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.

name: King's Landing Assassin
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Response: After King's Landing Assassin comes out of Shadows, choose a character with no attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

name: Shadow Prophet
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Response: After Shadow Prophet comes out of Shadows, you may look at 1 card in Shadows controlled by each opponent.

name: Visenya's Hill
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Visenya's Hill to choose 1 character card in any discard pile, and move that card to its owner's dead pile.
flavor_text: Visenya's Hill was crowned by the Great Sept of Baelor with its seven crystal towers.

name: Aegon's Legacy
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Dominance: Choose a character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -X STR and is killed if its STR is 0. X is the number of cards currently in Shadows.

name: Dornish Diplomat
rules_text: Response: After you win a Power challenge in which Dornish Diplomat participated, choose and stand a character controlled by an opponent. Then, choose and stand a character you control.

name: The Broken Spear
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel The Broken Spear to choose attached character. Until the end of the phase, that character either gains or loses a Military icon.
flavor_text: Only the fact that some had spears and others empty scabbards served to set them apart.

name: Backroom Bribery
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After Backroom Bribery comes out of Shadows, choose an opponent. Move 1 gold from that player's gold pool to yours.

name: Varys
rules_text:
Stealth.
After Varys comes out of Shadows, choose and discard 1 Ally character from play.

name: Ser Osmund Kettleblack
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Challenges: Kneel Ser Osmund Kettleblack to choose a defending character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR (+4 STR instead if that character has the Kingsguard trait).
flavor_text: "Ser Osmund is as loyal as he is brave." - Cersei Lannister

name: King's Landing
rules_text: After a card comes out of Shadows, stand King's Landing. Any Phase: Kneel King's Landing to draw a card. Use this ability only if you control more King's Landing locations than each opponent.

name: City of Spies
rules_text: When revealed, look at the top X cards of any player's deck, discard one of those cards, and put the rest on top of that deck in any order. X is the number of City plots in your used pile.

name: Peasant Defenders
rules_text:
Reduce the cost to play Weapon attachments on Peasant Defenders by 1.
If Peasant Defenders has a Weapon attachment, they get +3 STR and do not kneel to defend.
flavor_text: Men would fight for the honor of protecting them.

name: Northern Steel
rules_text:
Northern Steel cannot be discarded from play while attached to a House Stark character.
Any Phase: Kneel Northern Steel to give attached character either +3 STR or deadly until the end of the phase.
faqs:
If Northern Steel gets attached to a “No attachments” Stark character with Fortified Position revealed, what happens next turn?
Northern Steel remains attached. Cannot is an absolute, and "Northern Steel cannot be discarded from play while attached to a House Stark character." trumps the Stark characters "No attachments." keyword.

name: Alchemist's Guild Hall
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Limited Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, kneel Alchemist's Guild Hall to choose and kneel a character or location that does not have the [Shadow] crest. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Tyrion's Chain
rules_text: Attach to a location. Kneel that location. If you lose a Military challenge, discard Tyrion's Chain from play. Response: After attached location is knelt, kneel all locations controlled by the attached location's controller.

name: Ser Davos Seaworth
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: Kneel Ser Davos Seaworth to save an atttachment on a character from being discarded from play. Then, attach it to another eligible character, if able.

name: King Robert's Hammer
rules_text: If it is Summer or Winter, kneel King Robert's Hammer. Any Phase: Kneel King Robert's Hammer to choose and stand a House Baratheon character.
flavor_text: She was the largest war galley in the royal fleet...

name: Blackwater Bay
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After you win a Power challenge, kneel Blackwater Bay to choose a card with the Shadow crest in your discard pile, and place that card in Shadows.

name: Island Mercenaries
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only. Renown. No attachments.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Island Mercenaries participated, they claim 1 power.

name: Drinking the Sea
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: Cancel an effect that would save a card from being killed or discarded from play. Then, draw a card.
flavor_text: Between the hulls the water was thick as stew, full of corpses, broken oars, and men clinging to the wreckage.

name: Free Cities Mercenaries
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Renown. No attachments.
Response: After a character with STR 2 or lower is killed, stand Free Cities Mercenaries.

name: Mercenary Contract
rules_text:
War character only.
If you have at least 1 gold in your gold pool, attached character does not kneel to attack or defend during Military challenges.

name: Rhaenys's Hill
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Any Phase: Kneel and discard Rhaenys's Hill from play to put all characters in a single opponent's dead pile into play under your control until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, return those characters to their owner's dead pile.

name: Southron Mercenaries
rules_text:
House Martell only. Renown. No attachments.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Southron Mercenaries participated, move 1 power from the losing opponent's House card to your own.

name: Veteran Spearman
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Challenges: Kneel Veteran Spearman to choose an opponent's character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be chosen to die as the result of Military challenge claim.

name: Venomous Blade
rules_text:
House Martell only.
After Venomous Blade comes out of Shadows, attach it to a character you control. Then, choose and kill an opponent's character with printed STR 2 or less.
Response: After you lose a challenge, Venomous Blade goes into Shadows.

name: Rumors of War
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Any Phase: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a Military icon, a War crest, and +3 STR.
flavor_text: "Obara would have me go to war." - Lord Doran Martell

name: Ser Mandon Moore
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Challenges: Bring Ser Mandon Moore out of Shadows and into play by paying the rest of his gold cost.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Ser Mandon Moore participated as the defender, choose and kill a participating character.

name: Pyromancer's Apprentice
rules_text: Response: After Pyromancer's Apprentice comes out of Shadows, choose a location controlled by an opponent. That location's controller must pay 1 gold to you or discard that location from play.

name: Battle of the Bay
rules_text: Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single Military challenge. In addition to the normal claim effect, the winner of each challenge chooses and returns a King's Landing location from his or her discard pile to his or her hand, if able. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase, then discard it.)

name: City of Soldiers
rules_text: When revealed, choose and kill a character with STR X or lower. X is the number of City plot cards in your used pile.

name: Wolves of the North
rules_text:
Deadly. No attachments.
Reduce the cost to play Wolves of the North by 1 for each The North agenda you are running.
flavor_text: When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies, but the pack survives.

name: Winter Cache
rules_text:
Attached character gets +1 STR.
After attached character leaves play, you may attach Winter Cache to another character instead of placing it in your discard pile.

name: Janos Slynt
rules_text: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to choose 1 Night's Watch character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.
flavor_text: Lord Janos was red-faced and quivering.

name: Pickpocket
rules_text: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which attached character participated, you may choose to take 1 gold from the defending player or the treasury and add it to your gold pool.

name: Loyal Guard
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Loyal Guard can be played from your hand as a duplicate on a Noble character.
flavor_text: "King is only a word, but fealty, loyalty, service... those I must have." - Renly Baratheon

name: Seat of Power
rules_text:
Limited.
Marshalling: Discard Seat of Power from play to reduce the cost of the next House Baratheon card you play this phase by 3.

name: Drowned Fanatic
rules_text: Response: After you win initiative, discard the top 2 cards of each opponent's deck.
flavor_text: The first three men had offered their lives to the Drowned God fearlessly, but the fourth was weak in faith...

name: Ahead of the Tide
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: If an opponent would win initiative, cancel the determination of initiative winner. You win initiative instead.

name: Khal Drogo
rules_text:
Renown.
Response: After you win a Power challenge in which Khal Drogo is participating, choose and kill 1 character with lower STR than Khal Drogo.

name: The Dragon's Blood
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Attached character gains the Noble crest and a Power icon.
flavor_text: Ours by blood right, taken from us by treachery, but ours still, ours forever. You do not steal from the dragon, oh, no. The dragon remembers.

name: Palace Spy
rules_text: Response: After you play Palace Spy from your hand, search your deck for 1 influence-providing location, reveal that card, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: A Gentle Prison
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Challenges: Kneel 2 influence to stand a participating character, and remove it from the current challenge. That character cannot be killed this phase.

name: Ranger of the Watch
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
During Military challenges, Ranger of the Watch gains stealth.
flavor_text: He was dressed in black, as befitted a man of the Night's Watch.

name: Septon Cellador
rules_text:
No attachments.
Any Phase: Kneel Septon Cellador to shuffle any player's deck.
flavor_text: Septon Cellador led the men on the barricade in a prayer, beseeching the Warrior to give them strength.

name: Castle Black
rules_text: Response: After you play a Night's Watch character from your hand, reduce the cost of the next Night's Watch character you play this phase by 1.

name: Skinchanger
rules_text: Challenges: Skinchanger gains an icon of your choice until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor_text: Skinchangers and wargs belonged in Old Nan's stories, not in the world he had lived in all his life.

name: Craster
rules_text: If you lose a challenge in which Craster participated, the winning opponent draws 2 cards.
flavor_text: Craster sat above the fire, the only man to enjoy his own chair.

name: Wildling Mead
rules_text:
Wildling character only.
Any Phase: Kneel Wildling Mead to stand attached character.
flavor_text: The skin was full of mead, but a mead so potent that it made Jon's eyes water and sent tendrils of fire sneaking through his chest.

name: The Rangers
rules_text:
You may run any number of The North agendas that have the words Night's Watch in their text. You need 2 additional power to win the game.
Night's Watch characters you control gain a [Military] icon.

name: Winter Festival
rules_text: When revealed, claim 1 power for your House. (Claim 2 power instead if it is Winter.)

name: Benjen Stark
rules_text:
Stealth. No attachments except Weapon.
Response: After Benjen Stark comes into play, choose and stand 1 Night's Watch character or choose and kneel 1 Wildling character.

name: Frozen Moat
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Frozen Moat to choose 1 attacking character. Until the end of the challenge, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank.

name: Lord Tywin's Man
rules_text: While Lord Tywin's Man is attacking, House Lannister characters cannot defend.

name: Cersei's Wheelhouse
rules_text: Reduce the initiative value on each player's revealed plot card to 0.
flavor_text: "I promise you, if that wretched thing breaks another axle, I'm going to burn it." - Robert Baratheon

name: Zealot of the Light
rules_text: Response: After you win dominance, kneel Zealot of the Light to discard 1 card at random from any 1 opponent's hand.
flavor_text: It takes years of training to see the shapes beyond the flames, and more years still to learn to tell the shapes of what will be from what may be or what was.

name: Compelled by the King
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: If an opponent would win dominance, cancel the determination of dominance winner. You win dominance instead.

name: Nute the Barber
rules_text:
Intimidate.
Any Phase: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Nute the Barber +1 STR until the end of the phase.

name: The Seastone Chair
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge in which at least 1 Noble character participated, choose 1 of the following: claim 1 power for your House, add 2 gold from the treasury to your gold pool, or draw 1 card. (You may select each option once per round.)

name: Maegi Crone
rules_text: Response: After a character's STR is reduced to 0, draw 1 card.
flavor_text: A maegi was a woman who lay with demons and practiced the blackest of sorceries, a vile thing, evil and soulless.

name: Meereenese Brothel
rules_text: Response: After a character's STR is lowered by a card effect, kneel Meereenese Brothel to choose and discard an attachment from play.

name: Maester of Lemonwood
rules_text: Response: After you play Maester of Lemonwood from your hand, choose and discard any number of Condition attachments from play.

name: Bronze Shield
rules_text:
Attach to a House Martell character you control.
Response: After an opponent plays an event card, kill attached character to cancel the effects of that event. Then, if it is Summer, draw a card.

name: Stonesnake
rules_text:
Stealth. No attachments.
Stonesnake can declare stealth on characters with stealth.
flavor_text: Stonesnake moved as fast as his namesake, leaping down on the wildlings in a rain of pebbles.

name: Traitorous Crow
rules_text:
No attachments.
After Traitorous Crow comes out of Shadows, choose and discard 1 Night's Watch or 1 Wildling character from play.

name: Yoren's Task
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard 1 Night's Watch character from play to search your deck for 1 different Night's Watch character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Mammoth Riders
rules_text:
No attachments.
At the end of the challenge phase, return Mammoth Riders to your hand if it is still in play. After you play Mammoth Riders, you cannot play any further cards from your hand this round.

name: Craster's Keep
rules_text: Response: After you play a Wildling character from your hand, reduce the cost of the next Wildling you play this phase by 1.
flavor_text: This is our place. Craster keeps us safe. Better to die free than live a slave.

name: Beyond the Wall
rules_text: Wildling characters you control do not kneel to attack, and cannot defend.
flavor_text: By day the mountains were blue-grey, brushed with frost, but once the sun vanished behind the jagged peaks they turned black.

name: The Free Folk
rules_text:
You may run any number of The North agendas that have the word Wildling in their text. You need 2 additional power to win the game.
Wildling characters you control gain stealth.

name: Fear of Winter
rules_text: Each player cannot play or put into play more than 1 card from his or her hand until you reveal a new plot card.
faqs: Playing or putting a card into Shadows from your hand does count against the limitation set by Fear of Winter. Bringing a card out of Shadows does not count against this card's limitation. Replacement effects that put a card into play from a player's hand (such as those on PotS Darkstar and PotS House Dayne Reserves) also count against the limitation set by this card.

name: Jon Snow
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel 1 Night's Watch or 1 Wildling character to choose another Night's Watch or Wildling character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a War crest.

name: Feigned Retreat
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Response: If an opponent would win a Military challenge against you, kneel 2 influence to cancel the determination of challenge winner. You automatically win the challenge.

name: Greedy Councilor
rules_text: Any Phase: Pay 2 gold to put Greedy Councilor into play from your discard pile.
flavor_text: "We might be able to buy them for half that much, but I prefer not to take chances." - Littlefinger

name: Favors from on High
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Any Phase: Discard X power from your House or from cards you control to take X gold from the treasury and add it to your gold pool.

name: Salladhor's Crew
rules_text: Response: After you play Salladhor's Crew from your hand, reduce the gold cost of the next House Baratheon card you play this phase by 3.
flavor_text: Salladhor Saan was a resourceful old pirate, and his crews were born seamen, fearless in a fight.

name: The Iron Throne
rules_text: If you are the only player to control The Iron Throne, you automatically win dominance (cannot be canceled).
flavor_text: The Iron Throne was full of traps for the unwary... a chair that could kill a man, and had, if the stories could be believed.

name: Margaery Tyrell
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Margaery Tyrell to choose an opponent. That opponent must choose and reveal a new plot card. (Limit once per round.)

name: Naval Escort
rules_text:
If you do not control at least 1 House Greyjoy character, discard Naval Escort from play.

Yes. The first Misinformation cancels the game's standard determination of challenge winner, and creates its own. The second Misinformation would cancel this new determination, replacing it with its own.

name: Val
rules_text: Any Phase: Reveal and draw the top card of your deck. Play that card as your next response or action, if able. Otherwise, discard it.
flavor_text: "Gods," Val whispered, "gods, why are they doing this?"
faqs: A player who has reached his or her draw cap may not trigger Val's "reveal and draw" effect.

How does the timing on Val work?
Triggering Val's ability is an "Any Phase" action. Within that action, you are going to have a Response opportunity. If you reveal/draw a Response effect (like an event) and do not play it during that very next opportunity, the card is discarded. Because it was revealed, your opponent will be able to monitor this. Similarly, if you reveal/draw a card that requires a standard action to play (a "Phase" event, or a character/attachment/location during your marshalling phase) and do not play it on your very next action opportunity (i.e., the next opportunity you have to play an action after triggering Val), the card is discarded. Note that if you can play the card you drew with Val on your next action, you must. You may not choose to discard it instead.

rules_text:
This agenda counts as 5 cards at your command.
You cannot place cards during the setup phase. Other cards you control do not provide a gold bonus. Your House card gains:
[+2 Income]
[+2 Influence]
[+2 Initiative]
flavor_text: Card designed by 2009 A Game of Thrones Joust Champion, Greg Atkinson.
faqs: The "Other cards you control do not provide a gold bonus" text does not apply to the +2 gold gained by your House card from this agenda.

name: Stoic Resolve
rules_text: Knelt characters cannot be killed.

name: Steelshanks' Reserves
rules_text:
No attachments.
During the challenge phase, the active player gains control of Steelshanks' Reserves.
flavor_text: Steelshanks's archers were winding there crossbows and reloading while the Bloody Mummers shouted curses and threats at them.

name: In Ramsay's Name
rules_text: Any Phase: Until the end of the phase, each time a House Bolton character changes control, that character claims 1 power.
flavor_text: "Take my horse, he's swifter, and here, wear the ring my father gave me, so they'll know you came from me." - Ramsay Snow

name: Son of the Mist
rules_text: Response: After a player plays the last card from his or her hand, kneel a Clansman character to have Son of the Mist claim 1 power.
flavor_text: The mountain clans were lawless brigands, descending from the heights to rob and kill and melting away like snow.

name: Ill-Begotten Spoils
rules_text: While attached character is attacking an opponent with more cards in hand than you, raise the Claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

name: Stormlands Smuggler
rules_text: House Baratheon only. Stealth. Immune to events.

name: Massey's Hook
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Massey's Hook to choose and stand 1 character with stealth.
flavor_text: "It's a long sail from Storm's End, the fleet will need to come up Massey's Hook and through the Gullet and across Blackwater Bay."

name: Euron Crow's Eye
rules_text:
Renown.
While Euron Crow's Eye is attacking, Raider characters gain stealth and your opponents cannot play events.
flavor_text: "The Crow's Eye worships naught but his own pride."

name: Cragorn
rules_text: Any Phase: Return Cragorn to your hand to take 1 gold from an opponent's gold pool and add it to your own.
flavor_text: It was one of Euron's mongrels winding the call, a monstrous man with a shaved head. Rings of gold and jade and jet glistened on his arms, and on his broad chest was tattooed some bird of prey, talons dropping blood.

name: Euron's Mongrel
rules_text: Limited Response: After a card is discarded from a player's deck, kneel Euron's Mongrel or kneel a Warship location to choose and discard 1 copy of that card from play. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Horn of Dragons
rules_text:
Unique character only.
Attached character gets +4 STR.
Any Phase: Kneel Horn of Dragons to take control of a Dragon character until the end of the phase.

name: Longship Silence
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Longship Silence to choose 1 attacking Raider character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gains stealth. If you win the challenge, draw 1 card.
flavor_text: The decks of Euron's ship were painted red, to better hide the blood that soaked them.

name: River Raid
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: After a character card is discarded from an opponent's deck, put that card into play under your control. At the end of the phase, return that character to its owner's discard pile.

name: Horseback Hunters
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Ambush.
After you lose a Military challenge, return Horseback Hunters to your hand.

name: The Womb of the World
rules_text: Response: After you win dominance, kneel The Womb of the World to return a non-unique Dothraki character from your dead pile to your hand.
flavor_text: A thousand thousand years ago, Jhiqui told her, the first man had emerged from its depths, riding upon the back of the first horse.

name: Silent Assassin
rules_text:
Deadly.
Challenges: Kneel Silent Assassin to stand and remove 1 of your attacking characters from the current challenge. Then, Silent Assassin is considered to be participating in the challenge as an attacker.

name: Poisoned Knife
rules_text: Attached character gains stealth. Response: After attached character declares stealth, discard the bypassed character from play unless its controller kneels 1 influence or pays 1 gold to the treasury.

name: The Mad Huntsman
rules_text:
Stealth.
If you have no power on your House card, The Mad Huntsman does not kneel to attack or defend.
flavor_text: Only then the Mad Huntsman appeared, shoving his captive down into the light, and she and Gendry were forgotten.

name: Hollow Hill
rules_text:
If you have no power on your House card, reduce the gold penalty on all characters you play from your hand by 1.
Response: After you play a character with an affiliation that does not match any other card you control (including your House card), draw 1 card.

name: Whispers from the Hill
rules_text: Response: After a character is killed, move up to 3 power from that character to another character controlled by the same player. Then, draw 1 card.

name: Retaliation!
rules_text: If you win initiative, you must choose an opponent as the first player.

name: Steelshanks Walton
rules_text:
Deadly.
Dominance: If you won dominance this round, take control of Steelshanks Walton. (Any player may trigger this effect.)
flavor_text: Steelshanks Walton commanded Jaime's escort; blunt, brusque, brutal, at heart a simple soldier.

name: The Weeping Water
rules_text:
After a character changes control, stand The Weeping Water.
Any Phase: Kneel The Weeping Water to return the topmost House Bolton card in your discard pile to the top of your deck.

name: Tribeless Vagabond
rules_text:
Stealth.
Challenges: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Tribeless Vagabond an icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Tyrion's Thug
rules_text:
Clansman character only.
Any Phase: Discard 1 card from your hand to stand or kneel attached character.
flavor_text: He had more faith in their iron loyalties and sense of honor than in the greed of sellswords.

name: Shadow Enchantress
rules_text: If there is at least 1 card in Shadows, Asshai characters gain a Military icon and get +1 STR for each card in Shadows.
flavor_text: Davos remembered too well the living shadow that had squirmed from out her womb.

name: King Robert's Debt
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After you win a challenge, draw 1 card for each power claimed for renown during that challenge.
flavor_text: "At the least, they will say... this last thing... this I did right. You won't fail me." - Robert Baratheon

name: Bloodthirsty Crew
rules_text:
Intimidate. Deadly.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Bloodthirsty Crew participated, discard the top 2 cards of the losing opponent's deck.

name: Refurbished Hulk
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only. Limited.
Marshalling: Kneel Refurbished Hulk to reduce the cost of the next location you play this phase by 2.

name: Jhogo
rules_text:
If he is attacking alone, Jhogo gains stealth.
Response: After you win a Military challenge in which Jhogo participated, draw 1 card for each attacking Dothraki character.
flavor_text: "I will deal with these scouts."

name: Jhogo's Whip
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Ambush.
Dothraki character only.
Challenges: If attached character is attacking, kneel Jhogo's Whip to stand and remove a character from the current challenge. (Up to 2 characters instead if attached character is Jhogo.)

name: Tyene Sand
rules_text: Sand Snake characters you control gain an Intrigue icon and stealth.
flavor_text: "You think too much, Uncle."

name: Nymeria Sand
rules_text: Sand Snake characters you control gain a Military icon and Deadly.
flavor_text: Lady Nym was no less deadly, though she kept her knives well hidden.

name: Bastard Daughter
rules_text: Response: After you lose a challenge, discard Bastard Daughter from play to put a unique Sand Snake character into play from your hand or discard pile.
flavor_text: ... it was said that he bedded men and women both, and had begotten bastard girls all over Dorne.

name: Blood of the Viper
rules_text:
House Martell character only.
Attached character gains the Sand Snake trait and 'Sand Snake characters you control get +1 STR.'

name: Alchemist's Shop
rules_text: Your characters with Weapon attachments you control get +2 STR and gain Deadly.
flavor_text: Oil? Or poison? Tyrion decided that he would sooner not know.

name: His Viper Eyes
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you lose a challenge in which at least 1 Sand Snake character participated, kneel 1 influence to look at an opponent's hand. Discard 1 event card from that hand, if able.
flavor_text: All of Prince Oberyn's children have his viper eyes. Hotah suddenly realized. The color does not matter.

name: Jack-be-Lucky
rules_text: If you have no power on your House card, Jack-be-Lucky gains: "Dominance: Discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card."
flavor_text: "My father got himself good and hanged by Lord Piper's bailiff, my brother Wat got sent to the Wall, and the Lannisters killed my other brothers. An eye, that's nothing."

name: Orphaned Recruit
rules_text: Response: After Orphaned Recruit enters play, move 1 power from any player's House card to Orphaned Recruit.

name: Gossip and Lies
rules_text: Challenges: Choose 1 participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR for each power you have that is not on your House card.
flavor_text: "Yes, yes," the queen said impatiently, "but first we must stop this filth from spreading further."

name: Bungled Orders
rules_text: After a player loses a challenge, that player must reveal a new plot card.

name: Roose Bolton
rules_text: Roose Bolton does not kneel to attack during Intrigue challenges. Response: After you win a challenge in which Roose Bolton participated, all players take control of each character they own currently in play.

name: The Flayed Men
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
After a player wins a Power challenge against you, that player gains control of The Flayed Men.

name: Bolton Loyalist
rules_text: After a player wins an Intrigue challenge against you, that player takes control of Bolton Loyalist.

name: Bloody Scourge
rules_text: House Bolton character only. Setup. Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, kneel Bloody Scourge to choose and discard 1 kneeling character from play.

name: The Dreadfort
rules_text: Response: After you play or take control of a House Bolton character with STR 3 or higher, draw 1 card.
flavor_text: "Bolton's bastard is massing men at the Dreadfort," she warned them.
faqs:
Can I trigger The Dreadfort when I play a Bolton Refugee with a printed STR of 2, and have Winterfell Castle in play, which gives the Bolton Refugee +1 STR?
Qualifying characteristics of cards are checked at the time a Response effect is triggered. In this example, the Bolton character enters play and has its STR raised to 3 (by the constant effect on Winterfell Castle) when it enters play, which occurs before the Response effect is triggered. When the Response is triggered, the character’s STR is 3, and it has just been played, so you can use The Dreadfort to draw a card.

name: Terror in the Dungeons
rules_text: Response: After a player takes control of a House Bolton character, kneel 1 influence to kill that character and another character of equal or lower printed cost controlled by the same player.

name: Shagga Son of Dolf
rules_text:
Deadly.
Knelt Clansman characters you control can be declared as defenders during Military challenges.
flavor_text: Massive and slow and strong he seemed, dressed in all skins, with a club in his right hand and an axe in his left.

name: Mountain Camp
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel Mountain Camp to reduce the cost of the next Clansman character you play this phase by 2. That character comes into play knelt.

name: Knight of Summerhall
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Any Phase: Kneel a Holy character to put Knight of Summerhall into play from your dead pile.
flavor_text: Did we learn nothing from Summerhall?

name: Bound by the Light
rules_text: Asshai character only. Response: After attached character is killed, search your deck for another Asshai character of equal or lower printed cost and put it into play. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Euron's Enforcers
rules_text:
Intimidate. No attachments.
Euron's Enforcers get +1 STR for each Raider character you control.
flavor_text: Men black as tar stared out at him, and others squat and hairy as the apes of Sothoros. Monsters, Victarion thought.

name: We Take Westeros!
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Limited Response: After you win a Power challenge in which at least 1 Raider character participated, discard the top X cards of the losing opponent's deck. X is the amount by which you won the challenge. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Dothraki Handmaiden
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Dothraki Handmaiden to choose an attacking Dothraki character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.
flavor_text: Her brother Viserys gifted her with three hand-maids. Dany knew they had cost him nothing; Illyrio no doubt had provided the girls.

name: Black Hatchling
rules_text:
No attachments.
Discard Black Hatchling from play any time you control Drogon. Black Hatchling cannot defend.
flavor_text: The black-and-scarlet beast was draped across her shoulders, its long sinuous neck coiled under her chin.

name: Obella Sand
rules_text: Sand Snake characters you control gain a Power icon and vengeful.
flavor_text: "... Elia and Obella have become the terror of the pools." - Doran Martell

name: No Use For Grief
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After a Sand Snake character is killed, kneel 1 influence to search your deck for 1 Sand Snake character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. (Kneel 3 influence to search for any number of Sand Snake characters and put them into play instead if The Red Viper was just killed.) Then shuffle your deck.

name: Anguy the Archer
rules_text:
Deadly.
If you have no power on your House card, Anguy the Archer gains: "Response: After an opponent's character is killed, Anguy the Archer claims 1 power (limit 3 per phase)."

name: Stoney Sept
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Stoney Sept to choose and return 1 Brotherhood character you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Stoney Sept was the biggest town Arya had seen since King's Landing, and Harwin said her father had won a famous battle here.

name: Flaming Sword
rules_text: Limit 1 per character. Attached character gets +1 STR and cannot have its STR lowered by card effects. If attached character is Beric Dondarrion, he gains: 'After Beric Dondarrion claims power for renown, he claims 1 additional power.'

name: Relentless Persecution
rules_text: When revealed, kneel all non-unique characters in play.

name: Lucas Blackwood
rules_text: Response: After Lucas Blackwood is killed, you may initiate a Military challenge against an opponent of your choice as your next player action this phase.

name: Widow's Watch
rules_text: Response: After you play a unique card from your hand, kneel Widow's Watch or kneel a Learned character to search your deck for a copy of that card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Daven Lannister
rules_text:
Infamy.
Response: After you win dominance by 4 or more total STR, pay X gold to claim X power for Daven Lannister. X is the number of power currently on Daven Lannister (Limit once per game.)

name: Deep Den
rules_text: Response: After the challenges phase begins and you are the first player, kneel Deep Den to choose a new first player.

name: The Laughing Storm
rules_text:
House Baratheon only. Deadly.
While The Laughing Storm is standing, cards cannot be discarded from your hand.
flavor_text:
"Ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha ha!"
Card designed by 2010 A Game of Thrones World Joust Champion, Alec Irwin

name: Lucky Bones
rules_text:
House Baratheon character only.
Response: After you win a Power challenge in which attached character participated, kneel Lucky Bones and discard the top 2 cards of your deck to draw 1 card. (Draw 2 cards instead if attached character is Ser Davos Seaworth.)

name: Gylbert Farwynd
rules_text: The cost to play non-Noble cards cannot be reduced.
flavor_text: This would-be king was a tall spare lord with a melancholy visage, his lantern jaw shaved clean.

name: Support of Saltcliffe
rules_text:
Ironborn character only.
Response: After 1 or more cards are discarded from an opponent's deck, stand attached character. Limit 3 times per round.

name: Daenerys Targaryen
rules_text:
Renown.
Targaryen characters you control get +1 STR.
flavor_text: "The blood of my enemies I will shed gladly. The blood of innocents is another matter."

name: The Dragon Strikes
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose a Dragon character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth, renown, and deadly.

name: Tower Captain
rules_text: [+1 Influence]
flavor_text: He was only a captain of guards, and still a stranger to this land and its seven-faced god, even after all these years.

name: Doran's Game
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: Kneel a Learned character or 3 influence to cancel the effects of an event card just played. Then, you may kneel a second Learned character to attach that event to your House card. you may play that event as if it were in your hand.

name: Oldtown Advisor
rules_text: If Oldtown Advisor has at least 2 Chain attachments attached, it gains: "Response: Kneel Oldtown Advisor to cancel the effects of an event card just played."

name: Leyton Hightower
rules_text:
No Attachments. Renown.
Leyton Hightower cannot be saved.
Maester characters you control gain: "immune to opponents' events and attachments."

name: Beware of the Sphinx
rules_text: Challenges: Choose a participating Maester character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR for each Chain attachment it has. If you win the challenge, draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: "The sphinx is the riddle, not the riddler," he blurted. "Do you know what that means?"

name: The Citadel of Oldtown
rules_text: Response: Kneel The Citadel of Oldtown to save a Maester character from being killed or discarded from play, then return that character and all of its Chain attachments to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: "... and at the Citadel in Oldtown they can teach you a thousand things more." - Maester Luwin

name: Copper Link
rules_text:
