Setup. Maester character only.
Response: After attached character kneels, choose 1 card in play. Until the end of the phase, that card gains 1 Trait of your choice. (Limit once per phase).
flavor_text: ...he had not come here to drink, but Alleras had been buying to celebrate his copper link...

name: Apprentice Collar
rules_text:
Setup.
Attached character gains the Maester trait and gets +1 STR for each Chain attachment it has.
flavor_text: "I need you to become my new maester." - Jon Snow

name: The Maester's Path
rules_text:
Before shuffling your deck during setup, remove up to 12 Chain attachments with different titles from your deck and place them on The Maester's Path.
You cannot win the game if there are any Chain attachments on this card.
Response: After you win a challenge, attach 1 Chain from this card to a printed Maester character you control.

name: At the Gates
rules_text: When revealed, if you have no City plot cards in your used pile, search your deck for a neutral or in-House Maester character of printed cost 3 or lower, and put it into play. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Maester Luwin
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge in which Maester Luwin participated, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an event card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
flavor_text: Listen, and it may be that you will learn something of what lordship is all about.

name: Riders of the Red Fork
rules_text:
Immune to opponents' events.
While Riders of the Red Fork is in your deck, it meets the criteria to be found by any search effect.
flavor_text: The crossing was guarded by a mixed force of archers and pikemen wearing the eagle badge of the Mallisters.
faqs:
If I search for Riders of the Red Fork with Rhaegal (Core Set T109) can I attach the Riders of the Red Fork to Rhaegal as a duplicate?
Yes. Rhaegal's ability allows for the search of a duplicate, and the Riders of the Red Fork's ability allows them to be searched for as that duplicate. When Rhaegal's ability resolves it attaches the Riders of the Red Fork to itself as a legal duplicate.

name: Freezing Rain
rules_text:
Attach to a location.
Treat attached location as if its printed text box was blank.
Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to move Freezing Rain to another location.
flavor_text: Every blade of grass was carved from emerald, every drip of water turned to diamond.

name: Maester Creylen
rules_text: Response: After a player wins an Intrigue challenge, pay 1 gold to have Maester Creylen claim 1 power.

name: Black Ears
rules_text:
Deadly.
Challenges: Discard 1 card from your hand to choose 1 character participating in the same challenge with Black Ears. If you have fewer cards in hand than each opponent, remove that character from the challenge.(Limit once per challenge)

name: The Inn of the Kneeling Man
rules_text: Response: After a character with STR 2 or lower is knelt, kneel The Inn of the Kneeling Man to stand that character. Use this effect only if it is Summer or Winter. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Shireen Baratheon
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Shireen Baratheon to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot claim power.
flavor_text: Shrieen was a summer child, and had never known true cold.

name: Cleansing Light
rules_text:
Asshai character only.
Attached character gets +1 STR for each card in Shadows.
Challenges: Discard a card from your Shadows area to give attached character deadly until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: "Shadows only live when given birth by light." - Melisandre

name: Kingsmoot Hopeful
rules_text: Limited.
flavor_text: Aeron Damphair stepped forward once more. "I ask again. Who shall be king over us?" "Me!" a deep voice boomed and once more the crowd parted.

name: Burned and Pillaged
rules_text:
Limited.
Attach to a location.
Attached location gains:
[-1 Initiative]
[-1 Income]

name: Shadow Seer
rules_text: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which Shadow Seer participated, put a card with the Shadow crest into Shadows from your hand.
flavor_text: To go forward you must go back, and to touch the light you must pass beneath the shadow.

name: Pyrophobia
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Response: After a character's STR is reduced to 2 or lower by a card effect, return that character and all attachments on it to their owner's hand.
flavor_text: Half a hundred buckets of seawater still hung from the gunwales, in case of fires.

name: Maester Kedry
rules_text: [+2 Influence]
flavor_text: A maester traveled with them too, a maester skilled in tongues.

name: Ghaston Grey
rules_text: Challenges: Return a Martell [Noble] character you own and control to your hand to choose an opponent's character of equal or lower printed cost. Return that character to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Ser Manfrey proved a bit more forthcoming. "They were taken to the Planky town and will be conveyed by ship to Ghaston Grey, until such time as Prince Doran decides their fate."

name: Jaqen H'ghar
rules_text: Any phase: Bring Jaqen H'ghar out of Shadows by paying the rest of his cost to choose 1 non-Army character in an opponent's dead pile that was killed this phase, and attach it to Jaqen H'ghar as a duplicate. Jaqen H'ghar gains the printed text, base STR, icons, traits and crests of that card. If that duplicate leaves play, return Jaqen H'ghar to Shadows.
faqs:
Do the self-referential abilities gained by Jaqen H'ghar from the character attached to him refer to Jaqen H'ghar or the character attached to him?
Jaqen H'ghar gains the text box, without alteration, of the character attached to him. Any ability that specifically names that attached character does not reference Jaqen H'ghar.

name: Oldtown Scholar
flavor_text: "Pray all you wish," the maester said. "It does not change the law."

name: Called by the Citadel
rules_text: Any Phase: Return a Maester character you control and all Chain attachments on that character to their owner's hand. Then, draw 1 card.

name: Pale Steel Link
rules_text:
Setup. Maester character only.
Response: After attached character kneels, put a character or attachment card of printed cost 1 or lower into play from your hand. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor_text: "Lords are gold and knights are steel, but two links can't make a chain." - Maester Luwin

name: Bronze Link
rules_text:
Setup. Maester character only.
Response: After attached character kneels, return the topmost attachment card from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor_text: "A maester forges his chain with study, he told me. The different metals are each a different kind of learning." - Jon Snow

name: Forging the Chain
rules_text: After you play a Chain attachment from your hand or put one into play from your Agenda, you may put another Chain attachment into play from your hand or discard pile.

name: Galbart Glover
rules_text:
Immune to opponents' events.
While resolving any effect that would allow you to search your deck, you may instead search your discard pile.
flavor_text: "The ironmen have my castle and now the Lannisters have my brother..."
faqs: I have Maester Luwin and Galbart Glover out at the same time. If I win a challenge with Maester Luwin can I search the top 5 cards of my discard pile?No. Searching the top 5 cards of your deck does not count as searching your entire deck.

name: Karhold Rookery
rules_text:
When you search the top X cards of your deck, search 1 additional card.
[+1 Initiative]
flavor_text: "We are kin, Stark and Karstark." - Lord Rickard Karstark

name: Lady Genna
rules_text: Response: After you lose an Intrigue challenge as the attacker, you may initiate an additional Intrigue challenge this phase.
flavor_text: "Men are such thundering great fools. Even the sort who come along once in a thousand years."

name: Without His Beard
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge reveal up to 3 random cards from the losing opponent's hand. You may discard those cards and replace them with an equal number of cards from the top of that player's deck.
flavor_text: Shaving him was the cruelest thing Tyrion could have done, thought Jaime.

name: Maester Lomys
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Maester Lomys and discard 1 power each from any number of characters you control to have each of those characters gain "cannot be killed" until the end of the phase.

name: Conflict of Interest
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Play at the beginning of the challenges phase.
Challenges: Kneel a Learned character to choose a player. Until the end of the phase, all players use the base claim value from that player's revealed plot card.

name: Tower Library
rules_text: Response: After a character claims power for renown, kneel Tower library to give a Learned character you control renown until the end of the phase.

name: Maester Murenmure
rules_text: During the marshalling phase, Maester Murenmure gains: "Response: Kneel Maester Murenmure to cancel a triggered effect."
flavor_text: "It is not for you to say who must go and who remains. The maester stays." - Gorold Goodbrother

name: Longship Black Wind
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Longship Black Wind to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gains deadly. If a character dies for deadly curing this challenge, draw 1 card.

name: Called to Arms
rules_text: Challenges: Choose an opponent who must choose and discard 1, 2, or 3 cards from the top of his deck. If he chooses to discard 1 card, stand all Raider characters you control. If he chooses to discard 2 cards, claim 1 power for each Raider character you control. If he chooses to discard 3 cards, each Raider character you control gets +1 STR and gains deadly until the end of the phase.

name: Magister Illyrio
rules_text: You may play attachments from opponents' discard piles as if they were in your hand.
flavor_text: Magister Illyrio was a dealer in spices, gemstones, dragonbone, and other, less savory things.

name: Dragon Lore
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Maester character only.
Marshalling: Kneel Dragon Lore and kneel attached character to reduce the next Dragon character you play this phase to 0.

name: Hellholt Engineer
rules_text: Response: After an opponent kneels a location, choose and stand a location you control. Limit 3 times per round.

name: Snakeskin Veil
rules_text:
Printed Sandsnake character only.
Attached character is immune to opponent's non-plot card effects.

name: Archmaester Ebrose
rules_text: Limited Response: After you win a challenge in which Archmaester Ebrose participated, he claims 1 power for each Chain attachment he has. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)
flavor_text: ... but Ebrose's sighs had somehow proved just as painful as Vaelyn's barbs.

name: Citadel Custom
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel a Maester character to choose a player. That player may initiate an additional Power challenge this phase.
flavor_text: The night before an acolyte takes his vows, he must stand a vigil in the vault. - Armen the Acolyte

name: The Conclave
rules_text:
Reduce the cost to play The Conclave by 1 for each Maester character you control.
Response: After The Conclave is declared as an attacker or defender, until the end of the phase it gains (choose 1) Stealth, Renown, or Deadly.

name: Tin Link
rules_text:
Setup. Maester character only.
Response: After attached character kneels choose and discard 1 non-Chain attachment from play. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Lead Link
rules_text:
Setup. Maester Character only.
Any Phase: Kneel attached character to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -X STR. X is the number of Chain attachments on attached character (Limit once per phase).

name: Dry Season
rules_text: Treat all non-unique locations as if their printed text boxes were blank.

name: Guardian Wolf
rules_text:
House Stark only. No attachments. Deadly.
Challenges: Pay the rest of Guardian Wolf's cost to bring it out of Shadows, knelt, as a participant on your side in any challenge in which you control at least 1 participating Lord or Lady character.

name: The Weasel's Way
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Response: After a player searches his deck and reveals 1 or more cards, name 1 of those cards. That player must place that card in his discard pile.
Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to draw 1 card.
flavor_text: Run, Weasel, run as fast as you can, run and never come back.

name: The Regent's Spy
rules_text: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which The Regent's Spy participated, look at the top card of the losing opponent's deck.

name: Spidercraft
rules_text:
Attach to a character you control with an Intrigue and a Power icon.
When you win a challenge in which attached character attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, look at the losing opponent's hand and choose and discard 1 card from that player's hand.

name: Stormlands Bastard
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Stormlands Bastard to choose a unique Baratheon character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gains renown.
flavor_text: Ned studied the shape of the jaw, the eyes like blue ice. Yes, he thought, I see it.

name: Litany of Light
rules_text: Any Phase: Until the end of the phase, each of your Asshai characters gets +1 STR and gains the Learned crest.

name: Baelor Blacktyde
rules_text:
Stealth.
Opponents cannot play copies of event cards that are in their discard pile.
flavor_text: "Balon was mad, Aeron is madder, and Euron is maddest of them all."

name: Training Vessel
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Training Vessel to choose an attacking Raider character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, discard the top card of the losing opponent's deck.
flavor_text: The longship was so new that she still smelled of pitch and resin.

name: Linked Advisor
rules_text: Linked Advisor gets +1 STR for each attachment it has.

name: Plaza of Purification
rules_text: During the marshalling phase, you may pay any amount of the gold cost of Army characters using influence instead.

name: Royal Favor
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Challenges: Choose a unique Targaryen character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not kneel to attack or defend during Power challenges.

name: Informed Acolyte
rules_text: Response: After an opponent draws 1 or more cards outside the draw phase, kneel Informed Acolyte to draw that many cards.
flavor_text: He had only been at the Citadel for a year, yet already he had forged three links of his maester's chain.

name: Streets of Hellholt
rules_text: Response: After an opponent triggers a cost reducing effect, kneel Streets of Hellholt to reduce the cost of the next Martell card you play this phase by 1.

name: The Prince's Plans
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Any Phase: Kneel 4 influence to return the top 4 cards of your discard pile to your hand. After this effect resolves, remove The Prince's Plans from the game.

name: Oldtown Raven
rules_text:
No attachments.
Marshalling: Kneel Oldtown Raven to reduce the cost of the next Maester character or Chain attachment you play this phase by 1. Ignore all gold penalties while playing that card.

name: The Isle of Ravens
rules_text: Response: After a Chain attachment leaves play, kneel The Isle of Ravens to return that card to its owner's hand instead.

name: Old Intrigues
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel a Maester character to return 1 Citadel event card from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit 1 per phase.)
flavor_text: "There is a glass candle burning in the Mage's chambers" - Leo Tyrell

name: Steel Link
rules_text:
Setup. Maester character only.
Response: After attached character kneels, choose and stand 1 location. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Gold Link
rules_text:
Setup. Maester character only.
Any Phase: Kneel attached character to take X gold from the treasury and add it to your gold pool. X is the number of Chain attachments on attached character (Limit once per phase).

name: Outwit
rules_text: Response: Kneel a Learned character to cancel the "when revealed" effects of a plot card just revealed.

name: Rickon Stark
rules_text: Response: After an effect allows you to search your deck, kneel Rickon Stark to copy that effect. (Limit once per phase)
flavor_text: "Tell him he can have all m y things while I'm away, he'll like that." - Jon Snow

name: Lonely Hills
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 for the next challenge of the same type you initiate this phase.
flavor_text: The builders had not even leveled the earth; there were hills and valleys behind the walls of Winterfell.

name: House Payne Enforcer
rules_text: Deadly.
flavor_text: "I would say it is past time we summoned Ilyn Payne." - Cersei Lannister

name: Restrict and Restrain
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Play before any challenges have been initiated this phase.
Any Phase: Kneel a Learned character to have each player choose up to 3 characters. Characters not chosen cannot participate in challenges this phase.

name: Ser Jon Fossoway
rules_text:
Renown
Marshalling: Kneel Ser Jon Fossoway to take X gold from the treasury and add it to your gold pool. X is the number of power on Ser Jon Fossoway.
flavor_text: "I would gladly take this challenge myself, though I'm not half the swordsman Lord Caron is, or Ser Guyard."

name: Dragonstone Watchtower
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Dragonstone Watchtower and name a card. If an opponent plays or reveals that card this phase, claim 1 power for your house. If that card is not played or revealed stand Dragonstone Watchtower at the end of the phase.

name: Iron Fleet Raiders
rules_text:
No attachments.
Any Phase: Discard the top card of your deck to give Iron Fleed Raiders -2 STR until the end of the phase. Only opponents can trigger this effect.
flavor_text: The Drowned God had made them to reave and rape, to carve out kingdoms and write their names in fire and blood and song.

name: Iron Lore
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Any Phase: Pay the printed cost of 1 location in your discard pile to put it into play.
flavor_text: "Is it the gold price you paid, or the iron?" - Lord Balon Greyjoy

name: Bloodrider
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Response: Kneel 2 influence and put Bloodrider into play from your hand to cancel the effects of a character ability just triggered.
flavor_text: They were the khal's brothers, his shadows, his fiercest friends. "Blood of my blood," Drogo called them.

name: House of Shadow
rules_text: Response: After a character's STR is lowered by a card effect, kneel a Learned character to give that character -1 STR until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: "There is a saying in Qarth. A warlock's house is built of bones and lies." -Xaro Xhoan Daxos

name: Starfall Cavalry
rules_text:
No attachments. Renown.
Reduce the cost to play Starfall Cavalry by 1 for each House Dayne character you control.

name: Oberyn's Guile
rules_text:
Unique Martell character only.
Response: After you lose a challenge reveal the top card of your deck, then add it to your hand.
flavor_text: "... and even that was taken from him, when Prince Oberyn of Dorne stabbed Ser Gregor with a poisoned spear." - The Elder Brother

name: The Mad Mouse
rules_text:
Deadly.
Response: After you play The Mad Mouse from your hand, choose an opponent's character. If that character dies before the end of the next challenge phase and The Mad Mouse is still in play. The Mad Mouse claims 3 power

name: Archmaester Marwyn
rules_text: Response: After Archmaester Marwyn is killed, resolve the "when revealed" effect of any plot card in any player's used pile.
flavor_text: "Only a man trained in teh Citadel of Oldtown wears such a chain, and such men do know much of healing." - Ser Jorah Mormont

name: Citadel Law
rules_text: Plot: Kneel a Maester character to choose a player. That player must choose and reveal a new plot card.
flavor_text: "'Should our morrows be foretold?' and to that I should answer, 'No! Some doors are best left closed" - Grand Maester Pycelle

name: We Light the Way
rules_text:
Play before any challenges have been declared this phase.
Any Phase: Kneel a Maester character to choose a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, your Maester characters do not kneel to attack or defend during challenges of that type.

name: The Archmaester's Wrath
rules_text: Dominance: Kneel X Maester characters to have each player choose and discard X characters he or she controls from play.
flavor_text: "The world the Citadel is building has no place in it for sorcery or prophecy or glass candles, much less for dragons." - Archmaester Marwyn

name: Iron Link
rules_text:
Setup. Maester character only.
Response: After attached character kneels, choose 1 character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains a Military icon. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Black Iron Link
rules_text:
Setup. Maester character only.
Response: After attached character kneels, choose 1 character. Until the end of the phase, that character either gains or loses an Intrigue icon. (Limit once per phase.)

name: War of Attrition
rules_text: After you lose a challenge as the attacker, discard 1 card at random from the defending player's hand.

name: Maester of Last Hearth
rules_text:
Your Creature characters get +1 STR.
If it is Winter, Maester of Last Hearth gains: "Response: Kneel Maester of Last Hearth to save a Creature from being killed or discarded from play."

name: Ser Brynden's Guile
rules_text: Challenges: Choose a Stark character to get +1 STR until the end of the challenge. Then, search the top 4 cards of your deck for a House Tully card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Corrupt Contender
rules_text: Challenges: Corrupt Contender gets +10 STR until the end of the challenge. After the challenge resolves, discard Corrupt Contender from play (cannot be saved). Limit once per challenge.
flavor_text: ... however strong or fast or skilled a knight may be, there are others who can match him.

name: Slander and Lies
rules_text:
Attach to an opponent's character.
You may spend power counters on attached character as if they were gold tokens in your gold pool.

name: Rotten Bastard
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Each player's draw cap is reduced from 3 additional cards per round to 2 additional cards per round.
flavor_text: "Their mothers were copper and honey, chestnut and butter; yet the babes were all black as ravens..." - Varys

name: Maester's Tower
rules_text: Response: Kneel a Learned character to copy a triggered effect that returns a character from your discard or dead pile to your hand, deck, shadows area, or play.
flavor_text: The maester stood on the windswept balcony outside his chambers. It was here the ravens came, after long flight.

name: Famished Deckhand
rules_text: Any player who controls more characters than each other player counts 3 fewer gold during the marshalling phase.
flavor_text: "... my lord father once told me that hard places breed hard men, and hard men rule the world." - Theon Greyjoy

name: The Iron Cliffs
rules_text:
After The Iron Cliffs comes into play, place 2 gold tokens from the treasury on it.
Response: Discard 1 gold token from The Iron Cliffs to save a Greyjoy character from being killed.

name: Shadow Parasite
rules_text: Response: After a character's STR is reduced by X, Shadow Parasite gets +X STR until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: Shadows whirled and danced inside a tent, boneless and terrible.

name: Litany of Fire
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Challenges: During the next dominance phase, treat all locations as if they were characters with STR 3 and no icons.

name: Spear Phalanx
rules_text:
No attachments. Deadly.
Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, kneel Spear Phalanx and kneel 3 influence to choose and discard 1 attacking character from play.
flavor_text: The captain chose twenty spears to accompany it, out of the thirty who were posted at the Water Gardens.

name: Advisor's Chambers
rules_text:
Any Phase: Kneel a Learned character to stand Advisor's Chambers.
[+2 Influence]

name: Faceless Man
rules_text:
If you control a War character, Faceless Man gets +2 STR.
If you control a Shadow character, Faceless Man gains Stealth.
If you control a Holy character, Faceless Man gains deadly.
If you control a Noble character, Faceless Man gains a Power icon.

name: Prolific Statesman
rules_text: Prolific Statesman gains the crests printed on every other character you control.

name: Ser Gerold Hightower
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Renown.
Response: Kneel a Kingsguard character to save a King or Queen character from being killed or discarded from play.

name: Citadel Politics
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel a Maester character to choose a player. That player may initiate an additional Intrigue challenge this phase. (Limit 1 per phase.)

name: Valyrian Steel Link
rules_text:
Setup. Maester character only.
Any Phase: Kneel attached character to draw 1 card (2 cards instead if attached character has 3 or more Chain attachments). (Limit once per phase).

name: Brass Link
rules_text:
Setup. Maester character only.
Any Phase: Kneel attached character to discard the top X cards from any player's deck. X is the number of Chain attachments on attached character (Limit once per phase).

name: Schemes of the Scholar
rules_text: Learned characters you control do not kneel to attack or defend during Intrigue challenges. Raise your claim value by 1 during Intrigue challenges you initiate.

name: Search and Detain
rules_text: When revealed, choose a card without any attachments controlled by the first player. Return that card to its owner's hand (cannot be saved).

name: Arya Stark
rules_text:
House Stark only. Joust.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Arya Stark attacked alone, each opponent with a Title that opposes your Title must also satisfy the claim of that challenge, if able.
flavor_text: "I don't wear gowns. You can't fight in a stupid gown."

name: Meera Reed
rules_text:
House Stark only. Stealth.
Response: After a Stark character leaves play, put Meera Reed into Shadows.
Response: After Meera Reed comes out of shadows, choose 1 non-plot card (2 instead if it is Winter) and treat its printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: Card designed by 2010 Castle Stahleck Champion Andrea Gualdoni
faqs:
If I bring Meera Reed out of Shadows as a duplicate for the version I already have in play, does her "Response" effect still blank a card?
No. Meera Reed leaves shadows and immediately becomes a duplicate. Duplicates have no text, titles, or traits.

If I bring Meera Reed out of Shadows, can she target The Red Viper to blank him?
No. Meera Reed is considered a character in play after she comes out of Shadows, and The Red Viper is immune to her ability

name: The Last River
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel The Last River to give each participating character without a Military icon -1 STR until the end of the challenge.

name: Ser Jaime Lannister
rules_text:
Infamy.
Challenges: Kneel Ser Jaime Lannister to choose and kneel 1 non-Army character controlled by an opponent. Then, if Ser Jaime Lannister has more power on him than that character has STR, discard that character from play. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor_text: "There are no men like me. There's only me."

name: Knight of Flowers
rules_text:
Joust.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Knight of Flowers attacked or defended alone, he claims 2 power. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor_text: Ser Loras rode superbly, and handled a lance as if he'd been born holding one.

name: Highgarden Squire
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Highgarden Squire to choose 1 Knight character. That character gains joust until the end of the phase.

name: Storm's End Tourney Grounds
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After you win a challenge in which at least 1 of your participating characters has joust, kneel your House card to place the topmost character in your discard pile on top of your deck (into your hand instead if you control more unique characters than each opponent).

name: The Knight
rules_text:
Joust.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, stand The Knight. Then, discard teh top card of each opponent's deck.
flavor_text: "He planted his standard beneath the castle and defied the Grimms to face him. One did, and then another, and another. He slew them all..." - Hotho Harlaw

name: Nightfall
rules_text:
Attached character gains a War crest.
Response: After a challenge in which attached character participated resolves, choose and kill 1 non-unique participating character.

name: Ser Barristan Selmy
rules_text:
Renown.
Challenges: While Ser Barristan Selmy is participating in a challenge, discard a card form your hand to choose 1 participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

name: Dragon Support
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Challenges: Choose a participating character you control. Until the end of the challenge, that character gains melee. Then, each participating character controlled by an opponent gets -1 STR until the end of the phase.

name: Darkstar
rules_text:
Joust. Stealth.
After Darkstar bypasses a character by using stealth, move 1 power from that character to Darkstar.
flavor_text: "Men call me Darkstar, and I am of the night."

name: Dorea Sand
rules_text: Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, until the end of the phase Sand Snake characters you control gain: "This character does not kneel to attack."
flavor_text: "Dorea stalks about knocking oranges off the trees with her morningstar, and Elia and Obella have become the terror of the pools." - Doran Martell

name: A Nest of Vipers
rules_text: Response: After a Martell character is killed, unique Sand Snake characters you control gain renown until the end of the phase.

name: Highgarden
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Highgarden and pay 1 gold to choose 1 character with 1 or more power on it. Stand or kneel that character.

name: Newly Made Lord
rules_text: After you play Newly Made Lord from your hand, choose and discard from play 1 non-limited location with cost 3 or lower if able.
flavor_text:
Card designed by the 2003 A Game of Thrones World Champion Casey Galvan.
"Captains and kings, lift your cups to the Lords of the Four Shields!"

name: Shadow Tower Knight
rules_text: Cards you control cannot gain Traits through card effects.
flavor_text: He saw some of the men from the Shadow Tower, big bearded men with long axes and eight-foot spears.

name: Free Man
rules_text: Response: After Free Man leaves play, choose and stand 1 War Crest character

name: Tourney Lance
rules_text:
Attached character gains joust.
After you play Tourney Lance, draw 1 card.
flavor_text: Suddenly Loras Tyrell was on him, placing the point of his lance just there, an din an eye blink the mountain was falling.

name: Into the Lists
rules_text: When revealed, each player may choose and kneel 1 non-Army character with a Military icon he or she controls. The character with the highest STR knelt in this way claims 2 power.

name: The Smalljon
rules_text:
Melee.
Response: After The Smalljon is declared as an attacker against a player with a Title you oppose, raise the claim on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

name: Dreadfort Outrider
rules_text:
Joust. Melee.
If you control no other House Bolton characters, discard Dreadfort Outrider from play.

name: In the Name of the King
rules_text:
Attach to an opponent's House card.
Attached House card gains: "Characters you control get +2 STR during Military challenges."
After the owner of attached House card wins a Military challenge, claim 1 power for your house if you have more than 1 opponent.

name: Varys
rules_text:
House Lannister only. Stealth.
If you have more than 1 opponent Varys gains: "Response: After an opponent declares a challenge, put Varys into Shadows to redirect the challenge against an eligible opponent of your choice, ignoring any Title restrictions."

name: Whisper Campaign
rules_text:
Attach to an opponent's House card.
If you have more than 1 oppponent, after a player wins an Intrigue challenge against the owner of attached House card, kneel Whisper Campaign. Then, the winner of the challenge draws 1 card for each card discarded for claim.

name: Bought and Paid For
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Dominance: Pay X gold to choose and discard 1 attachment from play. X is the printed gold cost of that attachment.

name: Robert Baratheon
rules_text:
Melee. Renown.
While Robert Baratheon is attacking alone in a Power challenge, each opponent you are not attacking may declare 1 eligible character as a defender. If you win the challenge, instead of the normal claim effects, each opponent must satisfy the claim effect of the challenge.

name: Warhammer
rules_text: Response: After you win a Power challenge in which attached character participated, choose and discard from play 1 participating character with 1 or more power on it.
flavor_text: A monstrous thing it was, its haft wrapped in old leather, its head a brick of steel as large as a loaf of bread.

name: Euron Crow's Eye
rules_text:
Renown.
Response: After an opponent declares a challenge against you, discard the top card of each opponent's deck. Then, draw 1 card for each location discarded in this way.
flavor_text: "From Ib to Asshai, when men see my sails, they pray."

name: Captain of the Iron Fleet
rules_text:
Unique Greyjoy character only.
Attached character gains renown.
Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, choose and discard 1 kneeling location from play.

name: Raiding the Reach
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, reveal the top 5 cards of the losing opponent's deck. Choose and discard 2 cards (3 cards instead if it is Winter) and put the rest back on top of the deck in any order.

name: Khaleesi's Faithful
rules_text:
No attachments.
If you have more than 1 opponent, Khaleesi's Faithful gains: "Limited Response: After Khaleesi's Faithful is declared as a defender, move 1 power from a card controlled by the attacking player to your House card. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)"

name: Overwhelming Numbers
rules_text: Response: After you declare 2 or more attackers, each with the Dothraki trait, opponents cannot declare non-Army characters as defenders during this challenge.

name: Doran Martell
rules_text:
No attachments. Vengeful.
Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, each opponent must choose and discard 1 card from his or her hand.
flavor_text: "Vengeance... Justice... Fire and blood."

name: The Vaith
rules_text: Response: After a player declares a challenge against you, kneel 1 influence to choose 1 character controlled by that player. That character loses an icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Thoros of Myr
rules_text:
Melee. Renown.
If you have more than 1 opponent Thoros of Myr gains: "While Thoros of Myr is attacking, non-unique characters cannot defend alone."
flavor_text: "... it shan't be murder, only justice."

name: Old Bear's Crow
rules_text:
No attachments.
Night's Watch characters you control without a printed Military icon gain a War Crest.
Night's Watch characters you control without a printed Intrigue icon cannot be bypassed by stealth.
Night's Watch characters you control without a printed Power icon get +1 STR.

name: A Champion Arises
rules_text: Dominance: If you won every challenge in which you were the attacker or defender this round (minimum of 1), choose a non-Army character you control to claim 1 power for each opponent in the game. (Limit one per phase.)
flavor_text: He took the victory, an dthe champion's purse, and, for perhaps the first time in his life, the love of the commons.

name: Flea Bottom
rules_text:
No attachments.
Marshalling: Kneel Flea Bottom to lower the cost of the next character you play this phase by 2. That character comes into play knelt.
flavor_text: Card designed by 2004 A Game of Thrones World Champion Greg Atkinson.

name: The Grand Melee
rules_text: During challenges, total attacking STR is determined by counting the number of participating attackers and total defending STR is determined by counting the number of participating defenders.

name: Winterfell Practice Yard
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Challenges: Kneel Winterfell Practice Yard to choose 1 character. That character gains melee until the end of the phase. If you control more unique characters than each opponent, it also gains renown until the end of the phase.

name: Harrenhal
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Response: After a character is killed, kneel Harrenhal to search the top 3 cards of your deck for 1 card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Myrcella Lannister
rules_text: If you have more than 1 opponent, Myrcella Lannister gains: "Any Phase: Kneel Myrcella Lannister to choose an opponent. Exchange Titles with that player. This effect cannot be triggered during a challenge."
flavor_text: She had all of her mother's beauty, and none of her nature.

name: Lannisport Tourney Grounds
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge, kneel Lannisport Tourney Grounds to choose and kneel 1 character. Then, if you control more unique characters than each opponent, discard all power on that character.

name: Shyra Errol
rules_text: Response: After a character you control is killed, discard Shyla Errol from play to discard 1 power from the killed character. Then, move the remaining power from that character to another character you control.

name: Enemy to the Crown
rules_text:
Attach to an opponent's House card.
If you have more than 1 opponent, after a player wins a Power challenge against the owner of attached House card, kneel Enemy to the Crown. Then, the winner of the challenge stands 1 character for each power moved for claim.

name: Fiery Kiss
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After Fiery Kiss comes out of Shadows, choose 1 non-Army Baratheon character in your dead pile and put it into play. That character gains vigilant until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, discard the character if it is still in play.
faqs:
If a character enters play through an effect like Fiery Kiss that would cause that character to leave play at the end of the phase or round, but the character enters play as a duplicate (because the player already owns and controls another copy of that character), what happens at the end of the phase?
The check, "if that character is still in play" cannot be made, as the card entered play as a duplicate. The duplicate remains in play at the end of the phase.

name: Alannys Greyjoy
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: Kneel Alannys Greyjoy to cancel an effect triggered by a player with 3 or more non-character cards in his or her discard pile.
flavor_text: "Maron? Rodrik, where are you? Theon, my baby, come to Mother."

name: Nagga's Hill
rules_text: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Nagga's Hill to choose a non-unique, non-event card in the losing player's discard pile. Put that card into play under your control. At the end of the phase, discard that card if it is still in play.

name: The Iron Price
rules_text:
Attach to an opponent's House card.
If you have more than 1 opponent, after a player wins a Military challenge against the owner of attached House card, kneel The Iron Price. Then, the winner of the challenge claims 1 power for each character killed for claim

name: Meereen Tourney Grounds
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Response: After a character is declared as an attacker or defender, kneel Meereen Tourney Grounds to give that character -1 STR until the end of the phase. (-3 STR instead if you control more unique characters than each opponent.)

name: Ride Them Down
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Challenges: Choose an attacking Dothraki or Knight character. That character gains renown until the end of the challenge.
Response: After you win a Power challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Ride Them Down from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Maiden of Poisons
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, choose a challenge icon. Then each opponent chooses 1 standing character he or she controls with that icon, if able. All chosen characters lose that icon until the end of the phase.

name: Sunspear Tourney Grounds
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: If you have lost a challenge this phase, kneel Sunspear Tourney Grounds to cancel a triggered character ability. (A character ability or the effects of an event triggered instead if you control more unique characters than each opponent.)

name: The Scourge
rules_text:
Any Phase: Kneel The Scourge to choose 1 character. That character loses a Military, an Intrigue, and a Power icon until the end of the phase.
Response: After a character loses an icon from The Scourge, choose and discard 1 card from your hand to have that character gain that icon until the end of the phase. Any player may trigger this effect.

name: Lyanna Stark
rules_text:
Renown.
Non-unique characters get -1 STR while knelt.
After Lyanna Stark is killed, stand all Lord characters in play. Those characters gain deadly until the end of the round.
flavor_text: "Promise me..."

name: Jalabhar Xho
rules_text:
Renown.
If you lose dominance by 4 or more total STR, discard all power on Jalabhar Xho. At the beginning of the dominance phase, if no opponent has won a challenge against you this round, Jalabhar Xho claims 2 power.

name: Champion's Favour
rules_text:
Setup.
Attached character gains melee.
flavor_text: They fought with blunted weapons in a chaos of mud and blood, small troops fighting together and then turning on each other as alliances formed and fractured, until only one man was left standing.

name: The First Snow of Winter
rules_text: When the first challenge is initiated this round, return all characters with printed cost 2 or lower to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: Card designed by the 2005 A Game of Thrones World Champion John M. Bruno.

name: Called to Court
rules_text: When revealed, each player may put an in-House character of printed cost 3 or lower into play from his or her hand. Each player must choose 1 character he or she controls and return it to its owner's hand, if able.

name: Greatjon Umber
rules_text:
Melee.
Challenges: Kneel Greatjon Umber to have him participate in the current challenge as a defender. Then, if your Title supports the defending player's Title, Greatjon Umber claims 1 power.
flavor_text: Greatjon became Robb's right hand, his staunchest champion.

name: Rickard Karstark
rules_text:
Rickard Karstark does not kneel to attack during [Military] challenges.
If you are not running an agenda, Rickard Karstark gains: "Response: After 1 or more of an opponent's characters are killed for [Military] claim, Rickard Karstark claims 1 power."

name: Ser Gregor Clegane
rules_text:
Joust.
While Ser Gregor Clegane is attacking, characters cannot be saved.
flavor_text: "No one could ever withstand Gregor." - The Hound

name: The Hound
rules_text:
Melee.
If The Hound would be killed, instead shuffle him back into your deck.
flavor_text: The Hound's eyes seemed to glitter through the steel of that hideous dog's-head helm. "He ran." He looked at Ned's face and laughed. "But not very fast."

name: A House Divided
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Response: After a player plays a character with a Trait he already has in play, choose and return 1 character with that Trait to the top of its owner's deck.

name: Oath of Fealty
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Marshalling: Kneel a Knight character to add 1 gold to your gold pool for each Knight character you control.

name: Ser Davos Seaworth
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After Ser Davos Seaworth enters play, attach the top card of your deck to him, face down, as a duplicate.
flavor_text: "Hear me for the sake of the onions I brought you, and the fingers you took."

name: Ser Axell Florent
rules_text: Response: After Ser Axell Florent enters play, choose and discard 1 duplicate from play.
flavor_text: "Let the false and the fickle feel your flames."

name: Theon Greyjoy
rules_text:
While Theon Greyjoy is in your dead pile, he gains: "At the beginning of the dominance phase, discard the top card of each opponent's deck.
Response: After a unique character is discarded from the top of an opponent's deck, put Theon Greyjoy into play from your dead pile"

name: Asha Greyjoy
rules_text:
Renown.
House Greyjoy only.
Asha Greyjoy does not kneel to attack an opponent with 3 or more non-character cards in his or her discard pile.
flavor_text: "I throw an axe as well as any man, but when the target is so small..."

name: Finger Dance
rules_text: Response: Kneel an Ironborn character to cancel the effects of an event card just played. Then, discard the top card of the event controller's deck. If a non-character card is discarded in this way, shuffle Finger Dance back into your deck.
flavor_text: A roar of laughter went up when one of Eldred's fingers landed in Ralf the Limper's wine cup.

name: Ser Jorah Mormont
rules_text:
Joust.
After Ser Jorah Mormont comes into play, choose and discard 1 Mercenary or Ally character from play.
flavor_text: "As you will, Khaleesi."

name: Daario Naharis
rules_text:
Melee.
After Daario Naharis comes into play, choose and discard 1 Knight or Traitor character from play.
flavor_text: "My sword is yours. My life is yours. My love is yours. My blood, my body, my songs, you own them all. I live and die at your command, fair queen."

name: Arianne's Conspirators
rules_text:
Melee.
Response: After an attachment or location is discarded from your hand as claim for an [Intrigue] challenge, choose and discard 1 card of the same type from play.
flavor_text: "One day the singers will make all of us immortal."

name: Quentyn's Guard
rules_text:
Deadly. Stealth.
Reduce the cost to play Quentyn's Guard by 1 for each opponent you have.
flavor_text: "Your brother went with Cletus Yronwood, Maester Kedry, and three of Lord Yronwood's best young knights..." - Doran Martell

name: Words Are Like Arrows
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you lose a challenge, kneel 2 influence to choose 1 participating character controlled by the winning player and return it to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "Words are like arrows, Arianne. Once loosed, you cannot call them back." - Doran Martell

name: Ghost of High Heart
rules_text:
While you have no power on your House, Brotherhood characters get +1 STR.
Challenges: Kneel Ghost of High Heart to look at a player's hand. Choose and discard 1 card from that hand. That player draws 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
flavor_text: Card designed by 2006 A Game of Thrones World Champion Matthew Ley.

name: Ocean Road
rules_text:
Limit 1 per deck.
Marshalling: Kneel Ocean Road to lower the cost of the next character with a [Noble] or [War] crest you play this phase by 1.

name: Satin
rules_text:
No attachments.
Marshalling: Kneel a Night's Watch character to reveal the top card of each player's deck. Then (choose one): each player discards that card, draws that card, or returns it to the top of his or her deck.
flavor_text: Satin, they called him, even in the wool and mail and boiled leather of the Night's Watch.

name: You Swore an Oath
rules_text: Knight characters gain joust and do not kneel to defend.

name: Knight of Harrenhal
rules_text:
House Stark only.
If a card would be discarded from your hand at random, you may choose the card to be discarded instead.

name: No Quarter
rules_text:
House Stark.
Response: After you win a Military challenge in which you control at least 1 participating unique character, choose and kill 1 character controlled by the losing opponent. (Limit 1 per challenge.)

name: Queen's Guard
rules_text: After you trigger an effect that kneels an opponent's character, choose and kneel 1 character controlled by a different opponent.

name: Davos's Confidant
rules_text: If an opponent is running an agenda, Davos's Confidant gains: "Immune to opponent's events."

name: The Painted Table
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Any phase: Kneel The Painted Table to cancel the next effect triggered this phase.
flavor_text: His shadow went before him, tall and thin, and fell across the Painted Table like a sword.

name: Cotter Pyke
rules_text:
No attachments. Intimidate. Melee.
If a Black Raven card is not in play, it is Winter.
flavor_text: "If you muck this up, I'm going to rip your liver out and eat it raw with onions."

name: Corpse Lake
rules_text: Response: After a triggered effect discards 1 or more characters from the top of an opponent's deck, claim 1 power for your House. (Limit 3 times per round.)

name: Nighttime Raid
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Challenges: Choose an attacking [Greyjoy] character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth. If you win the challenge, choose and discard 1 attachment from play.

name: Dragon Knight
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Ambush.
Response: After Dragon Knight comes into play, choose 1 character to get -1 STR until the end of the phase (-2 STR instead if it is Summer).

name: Exiled Knight
rules_text:
Deadly.
Exiled Knight does not kneel to defend while it has at least 1 attachment.

name: Meraxes
rules_text:
House Targaryen Only.
Meraxes counts as 4 STR during the dominance phase.
Dominance: Kneel Meraxes to draw 1 card. Then, each opponent who did not attack you this round draws 1 card.

name: Dagos Manwoody
rules_text: Vengeful. Melee.
flavor_text: "The crowned skull of House Manwoody, bone and gold on black." - Podrick Payne

name: The Brimstone
rules_text: Response: After a card is discarded from an opponent's hand, choose 1 character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains or loses an icon of your choice.

name: Blood Debt
rules_text:
Attach to an opponent's House card.
Attached House card gains: "Characters you control gain stealth during [Intrigue] challenges."
After the owner of attached House card wins an [Intrigue] challenge, claim 1 power for your House if you have more than 1 opponent.

name: First Ranger
rules_text:
Unique character only.
Attached character gains the Night's Watch trait.
Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, stand all other Night's Watch characters.

name: Condemned
rules_text:
Attached character loses all Traits and immunities.
If you win dominance, kill attached character.

name: A United Cause
rules_text:
House Stark or House Baratheon only.
Play only if you have more than 1 opponent.
Dominance: Discard 1 power from your House card to (choose one): return a character with printed cost 3 or less from your dead pile to your hand, or search the top 4 cards of your deck for a card, put it into your hand and then shuffle the rest back into your deck. (Limit 1 per phase.)

name: Enemy of My Enemy
rules_text:
House Lannister or House Greyjoy only.
Play only if you have more than 1 opponent.
Draw: Discard 1 power from your House card to (choose one): draw 2 cards, or each opponent chooses and discards a location he or she controls with printed cost 1 or less from play. (Limit 1 per phase.)

name: Secret Alliance
rules_text:
House Martell or House Targaryen only.
Play only if you have more than 1 opponent.
Challenges: Discard 1 power from your House card to (choose one): choose and remove 1 participating character from a challenge, or choose 1 unique character in your dead pile and put it on top of your deck. (Limit 1 per phase.)

name: I Fight to Win
rules_text: If you have more than 1 opponent, after each player has selected a Title, you may select a second Title from the remaining Titles and use both Titles this round.

name: Ser Kyle Condon
rules_text:
Stalwart.
Response: After Ser Kyle Condon is killed or discarded from play, draw 1 card.

name: Northern Courser
rules_text:
[Stark] character only.
If you win a [Military] challenge in which attached character attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, choose and kill 1 character controlled by the losing opponent.

name: House Clegane Outlaw
rules_text:
Infamy.
House Clegane Outlaw does not count its STR during challenges unless it has 1 or more power on it.
flavor_text: "Oh, they were brigands, beyond a doubt. Lannister brigands." - Raymun Darry

name: Andal Charger
rules_text:
[Lannister] character only.
If you win an [Intrigue] challenge in which attached character attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, look at the losing opponent's hand. Choose and return 1 card from that hand to the top or bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Dragonstone Convert
rules_text:
Stealth.
If you have more than one opponent, Dragonstone Convert gains Vigilant.
flavor_text: "I have seen it in the flames."

name: Highgarden Destrier
rules_text:
[Baratheon] character only.
If you win a [Power] challenge in which attached character attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, choose 1 character in your discard pile and return it to your hand.

name: The Sparr
rules_text:
Melee.
Lower the income and initiative on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.
flavor_text: Aeron knew the Sparr, a hatched-faced old man with watery eyes whose quavery voice was law on this part of Great Wyk.

name: Drowned Crewman
rules_text:
If you have more than 1 opponent Drowned Crewman gains:
"Marshalling: Kneel Drowned crewman to choose an opponent with more cards in his or her discard pile than you. Move 1 gold token from that player's gold pool to your own."

name: Isle Garron
rules_text:
[Greyjoy] character only.
If you win a [Military] challenge in which attached character attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, choose 1 location in the losing player's discard pile. Put that location into play under your control.

name: Sorrowful Man
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Deadly.
Response: After an opponent's character enters play, kneel 2 influence to bring Sorrowful Man out of Shadows and into play. Then, that character's controller must either pay you 1 gold or kill that character.

name: True Queen's Loyalist
rules_text:
Attach to an opponent's House card.
Attached House card gains: "Characters you control gain deadly during [Power] challenges."
After the owner of attached House card wins a [Power] challenge, claim 1 power for your House if you have more than 1 opponent.

name: Dothraki Stallion
rules_text:
[Targaryen] character only.
If you win a [Power] challenge in which attached character attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, return the top card of your discard pile to your hand.

name: The Red Viper
rules_text:
Stealth. Renown.
Response: After you lose a challenge, place 1 gold token from the treasury on The Red Viper.
Challenges: Discard 1 gold token from The Red Viper to stand him. Then, you may discard 1 additional gold token from him to raise the claim value on any player's revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the current challenge.

name: Rhoynish Steed
rules_text:
[Martell] character only.
If you win an [Intrigue] challenge in which attached character attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, choose 1 character controlled by the losing opponent and return it to its owner's hand.

name: Poisoned Spear
rules_text:
Attached character gains joust.
Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, kneel Poisoned Spear to choose and kill a character with no icons.
flavor_text: "When Oberyn spun the haft between the palms of his hand, they glistened black."

name: Heavy Taxes
rules_text:
Attach to your House card.
If you are not running an agenda, Heavy Taxes gains: "Players cannot count more than 4 gold during the marshalling phase."
faqs:
Does Heavy Taxes affect the gold counted before or after Black Raven's effect has the players take 1 gold?
The players each count their plot gold and all the income bonuses they each have in play. If this number is greater than 4, the rest is disregarded because of Heavy Taxes. When the player takes the gold from the treasury Black Raven causes each player to take 1 additional gold token. The same is true of when White Raven is in play, all numbers above 4 are disregarded and then White Raven causes each player to take 1 less gold token from the treasury

name: Seal of the Crown
rules_text:
Attach to your House card.
If you are not running an agenda, Seal of the Crown gains: "Players draw 1 additional card during the draw phase.
After a player draws 1 or more cards through another card effect, that player must choose and discard 1 card from his or her hand."

name: Isle of Faces
rules_text: Unique characters you control count their STR toward dominance while knelt.

name: Twist of Fate
rules_text: When a player wins a challenge against you as the attacker, he or she may choose to use the claim effect of any challenge type instead of the normal claim effect. This text box cannot be blanked.

name: Across the Summer Sea
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
If you have more than 1 opponent, challenges cannot be initiated by you or against you.

name: The Kindly Man
rules_text:
House Stark only. Deadly.
If The Kindly Man would be killed, instead attach him to your House card as your only agenda with the text:
"Response: After you win an [Intrigue] or [Power] challenge, choose a non-unique character in any dead or discard pile and put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, discard that character if it is still in play. (Limit once per phase.)"

name: Turncloak
rules_text:
House Greyjoy or House Stark only.
Attached characters gains the Traitor trait and the text: "If you do not win dominance, discard this character from play."
Response: After Turncloak comes out of Shadows during the challenges phase, attach it to an opponent's character.

name: Ward
rules_text:
House Stark or House Targaryen only.
Response: After you win a military challenge, choose a character of STR 2 or less controlled by the losing player. Attach Ward to the chosen character as a Condition attachment with the text: "Take control of attached character. If the owner of attached character wins an Intrigue or Power challenge against you, discard Ward."

name: Hugor Hill
rules_text:
Discard Hugor Hill from play if you control Tyrion Lannister.
If you win a challenge in which Hugor Hill attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, choose a character in the losing opponent's discard pile with a cost of X or lower. Put that character into play under your control. X is the amount by which you won the challenge.

name: Ser Kevan Lannister
rules_text:
House Lannister Only. Stealth.
If Ser Kevan Lannister would be killed, instead attach him to your House Card as your only agenda with the text: "Response: After you win an intrigue challenge as the attacker, choose and kneel a character."

name: Futile Gestures
rules_text: Response: Discard 1 power from a Lannister character you control to cancel a triggered effect that chooses that character as its only target. Then, draw a card.

name: Stannis Baratheon
rules_text:
Immune to location abilities.
While Stannis Baratheon is the only King character in play, he gains vigilant, renown, and stealth.

name: The Bastard of Nightsong
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge in which The Bastard of Nightsong participated, move 1 power from the losing opponent's House card to The Bastard of Nightsong.

name: Willas Tyrell
rules_text:
While Willas Tyrell is participating in a challenge against an opponent running an agenda, he gains renown.
While Willas Tyrell is participating in a challenge, participating Lannister and Martell characters do not count their STR.

name: Aeron Damphair
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only. Stealth.
If Aeron Damphair would be killed, instead attach him to your House card as your only agenda with the text: "Response: After a [Greyjoy] character is saved, draw 2 cards."

name: Maester Kerwin
rules_text: Response: Kill Maester Kerwin (cannot be saved) to cancel any effect that chooses 1 of your Ironborn characters as its only target.

name: Thirst-for-Vengeance
rules_text:
Attached character gains deadly.
Response: After a character dies for deadly, attached character claims 1 power.

name: Playing the Part
rules_text: Challenges: Choose a [Martell] character. Until the end of th ephase taht character gains stealth and "Immune to triggered effects."

name: Harried by Dragons
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Ambush.
Attached character gets -1 STR.
Response: After Harried by Dragons is played from your hand, search your deck for a card named Harried by Dragons and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Incinerate
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose a character and name a Trait. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -X STR and is killed if its STR is 0. X is the number of Targaryen characters you control with the named Trait.

name: Magister Illyrio
rules_text: Response: After a character enters play during the challenges phase, choose a non-unique character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR and is killed if STR is 0

name: Volantis
rules_text:
Lower the cost of the first out-of-House Greyjoy card you play each round by 1.
Lower the cost of the first Mercenary character you play each round by 1.
[+1 Influence]

name: Above the Sorrows
rules_text: When revealed, discard the top card of each opponent's deck. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the "when revealed" effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.

name: Shores of Ny Sar
rules_text: When revealed, reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the "when revealed" effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.

name: At the Palace of Sorrows
rules_text: When revealed, each player chooses a card in play which he or she controls and puts the chosen card on top of its owner's deck. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the "when revealed" effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.

name: Damon Dance-For-Me
rules_text:
Immune to events.
While Damon Dance-For-Me is participating in a challenge against an opponent running an agenda, he gains deadly and stealth.
If you are not running an agenda, Damon Dance-For-Me gains renown

name: Bran Stark
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel a Direwolf to stand Bran Stark. Then, Bran Stark gains (choose 1): a [Military] icon, stealth, or deadly until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: "I am him, and he is me. He feels what I feel."

name: Castle Battlements
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Attach to a location you control.
Attached location is immune to other non-plot card effects.
While you are the defending player, non-unique characters lose stealth and deadly.
faqs: The attached location does not gain immunity to Castle Battlements.

name: Penny
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Penny to choose a character without attachments. The controller of that character chooses to either kneel that character or choose and discard 1 card from his or her hand.
flavor_text: Despite the horrors Penny had suffered, she remained somehow trusting.

name: Merchant's Widow
rules_text:
Merchant's Widow gets +1 STR for each gold token on it.
Response: After an opponent returns gold to the treasury during the taxation phase, add 1 gold from the treasury to Merchant's Widow.

name: Shireen Baratheon
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
If Shireen Baratheon would be killed, instead attach her to your House Card as your only agenda with the text: "Response: After you win a [Power] challenge, choose a character you control with renown. Until the end of the phase, when that character claims power for renown, it claims 1 additional power."

name: Dragonstone Bannerman
rules_text: Response: After you win dominance, Dragonstone Bannerman claims 1 power.
flavor_text: He had not forgotten the courtesies he had learned on Dragonstone during his years of service.

name: Victarion Greyjoy
rules_text:
Renown.
Victarion Greyjoy gets +1 STR for each knelt warship location you control.
flavor_text: Victarion Greyjoy turned back toward the prow, his gaze sweeping across his fleet. Longships filled the sea.

name: Moqorro
rules_text: Response: Kneel Moqorro to save a unique [Greyjoy] character from being killed or discarded. That character gets +2 STR and gains intimidate until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: "The captain commands and I obey."

name: Quentyn Martell
rules_text:
House Martell only. Stealth.
If Quentyn Martell would be killed, instead attach Quentyn Martell to your House card as your only agenda with the text: "Unique [Martell] characters you control gain vengeful. Response: After 1 or more characters stand for vengeful, draw one card."

name: Spiteful Bastard
rules_text:
Response: After you lose a challenge as the attacker, stand Spiteful Bastard.
Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, stand Spiteful Bastard.

name: Recruitment
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Any Phase: Kneel X influence to choose a non-unique Mercenary or Ally character in your dead or discard pile and put that character into play. X is the printed cost of that character.

name: Young Griff
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Stealth.
Response: After Young Griff comes out of Shadows, stand any number of characters you control. Then, you may immediately bring another card out of Shadows by paying the rest of its gold cost.

name: Strong Belwas
rules_text:
No attachments except Boon.
Strong Belwas gets -1 STR for each gold token on him and is killed if his STR is 0.
Response: Place 1 gold token from the treasury on Strong Belwas to save another unique [Targaryen] character from being killed or discarded from play. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Braavos
rules_text:
Lower the cost of the first out-of-House [Stark] card you play each round by 1.
Lower the cost of the first Lady character you play each round by 1.
[+1 Influence]

name: Norvos
rules_text:
Lower the cost of the first out-of-House [Martell] card you play each round by 1.
Lower the cost of the first Lord character you play each round by 1.
[+1 Influence]

name: Pulled from the Rhoyne
rules_text: When revealed, each player returns the top character in his or her dead pile to the top of his or her deck. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the "when revealed" effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.

name: Under the Bridge of Dream
rules_text: When revealed, add 2 gold from the treasury to your gold pool. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the "when revealed" effect on any River plot card in your used pile.

name: On Dagger Lake
rules_text: When revealed, each opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand, if able. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the "when revealed" effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.

name: Before the Black Walls
rules_text: When revealed, name a challenge type. In order to declare any characters to attack or defend during challenges of that type, a player must declare all of his or her eligible characters. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the "when revealed" effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.
faqs: "When revealed, name a challenge type. In order to declare any characters to attack or defend during challenges of that type, a player must declare all of his or her eligible characters." is all considered part of the "When revealed" effect and is active while the plot is revealed or when the "When revealed" effect has been triggered by another River plot card.

name: Follower of the Many-Faced God
rules_text:
Stalwart.
Characters with Stalwart gain stealth.
Response: After you play a character with the stalwart keyword from your hand, choose and stand a [Stark] character.

name: Abel's Washerwoman
rules_text:
Melee.
If Able's Washerwoman is attacking and all of your participating characters have the Wildling trait, she gains: "Response: After the defending player declares no defenders, claim 1 power for your House."
faqs:
When can Abel's Washerwoman trigger its response when the defending player controls Naval characters?
Abel's Washerwoman can only trigger its response when no defenders are declared during the standard framework "declare defenders" step. The presence of eligible Naval characters that may defend after this step or have been declared prior to this step does not change the fact that "no defenders" were declared during the precise window of this response trigger.

name: Yezzan's Grotesquerie
rules_text:
Infamy.
While Yezzan's Grotesquerie is participating in a challenge, characters with a [Military] icon do not count their STR.
flavor_text: Count yourselves fortunate, for Yezzan is a kindly and benevolent master.

name: Selhorys Customs Officer
rules_text: Response: After an opponent pays gold outside of the marshalling phase, move that gold into your gold pool.
flavor_text: He opened up his purse and stacked silver coins beside the board, one atop another until finally Qavo smiled.

name: Wildling Bard
rules_text: Challenges: Before any challenges are declared, discard a card from your hand to give a [Baratheon] or [Stark] character renown until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per round.)
flavor_text: He calls himself a bard. In truth he's more a pander.

name: The Red Queen's Faithful
rules_text:
No attachments. Lower the cost to play The Red Queen's Faithful by 1 for each unique [Baratheon] character you control.
Response: After you win a challenge in which The Red Queen's Faithful participated, choose a player. Move up to 3 power from his or her House card to a character he or she controls.

name: Follower of Two Gods
rules_text:
If Follower of Two Gods would be killed, instead put it on the bottom of your deck.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, Follower of Two Gods gains a [Power] icon until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: "What need have we of quarter? We are ironborn, and two gods look over us." - Victarion Greyjoy

name: Thrall
rules_text: Dominance: Return Thrall from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.
flavor_text: Victarion put the slavers to the sword, then sent his men below to unchain the rowers. "You row for me now. Row hard, and you shall prosper."

name: Iron Fleet Captain
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Iron Fleet Captain participated, it claims 1 power.
flavor_text: "Every man of you is worth twenty of them, for only we are made of iron." - Victarion Greyjoy

name: Victarion's Reavers

Little and Less only prevents playing response effects from hand. A character whose card text was a response that could be triggered from hand such as Khal Drogo (Core T107) would not be able to be triggered, but a character ability on a card in play would still be able to be triggered.

rules_text:
When you reveal Black Sails as your agenda, shuffle your deck and cut it into 2 stacks. Then, the opponent to your left chooses one stack to be The Hold, which is out of play. The other stack is your draw deck.
Response: After you win a challenge in which you had at least 1 [Naval] attacker, choose 1 card from The Hold. At the end of the phase, add it to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)
faqs: The Hold is open information to its owner, but can only be looked at by opponents when a card effect specifically allows them to do so.

What is the proper pregame and deck cutting procedure for the Black Sails agenda?
First, shuffle your deck, and then present it to your opponent for additional shuffling and/or a final cut. The opponent shuffles and cuts to his or her satisfaction to determine the final ordering of the cards in the deck.
You are then responsible for making one cut that splits the deck into two stacks. You may not re-order or count cards during this process. If, on a visual comparison of the two stacks, they are not to your liking, you may return the deck to its original composition (without altering the original order of the cards) and make an additional attempt at the cut. You may make up to three attempts at this cut without delaying the game. After a successful cut is made, present the two stacks to your opponent, who then chooses one stack as your deck and the other as your hold.
Once your deck is selected, proceed with drawing your initial hands. If you choose to mulligan, you only mulligan your deck -- your hold is locked in at this point.

rules_text: Response: After you play a Smuggler character, pay 2 gold to choose and discard from play 1 non-limited location with printed cost 3 or lower.

name: Oakenshield Port
rules_text:
When Oakenshield Port enters play put 6 gold tokens from the treasury on it.
Response: After you win a challenge, discard 1 gold token from Oakenshield Port to claim 1 power for your House (discard 2 gold tokens to claim 2 power from your house instead if a [Naval] attacker or defender was participating in that challenge).

name: Ours is the Fury
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After you win a [Power] challenge by 4 or more total STR, stand all participating unique characters you control.
flavor_text: Robert's face was purple. "Out," he croaked, choking on his rage. - A Game of Thrones

name: Moreo Tumitis
rules_text: While you control at least 1 Warship, Moreo Tumitis gains renown.
flavor_text: He'd been playing the narrow sea for thirty years, he'd told her. The Storm Dancer was his fourth ship, and his fastest - A Game of Thrones

name: Swamps of the Neck
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Swamps of the Neck to choose a participating character you control. Stand that character, and remove it from the challenge.

name: Titan's Daughter
rules_text: Response: After an opponent declares a [Naval] attacker against you, kneel Titan's Daughter to choose a standing character you control and kneel it as a defender. If you win the challenge, search your deck for a character, reveal it, and shuffle your deck. Then, put the revealed card on top of your deck.

name: Hellholt Docks
rules_text: Response: After an opponent kneels a location, kneel Hellholt Docks to choose and kneel a location.

name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you lose a challenge, discard your hand of at least 1 card to reveal the same number of cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your hand.

name: House Targaryen Loyalist
rules_text: If you control 1 or more Dragon characters, House Targaryen Loyalist loses the Traitor trait and gains: "House Targaryen Loyalist gains renown during [Power] challenges."

name: Balerion
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Balerion to lower the cost of the next character you put into play using ambush this phase by 1. That character claims 1 power when it comes into play and until the end of the phase, it gains a [Naval] enhancement on its [Power] icon, if able.

name: Fire and Blood
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Challenges: Choose a [Targaryen] character. That character gets +2 STR until the end of the phase. Then, attach Fire and Blood to that character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text, "Attached character gains cannot be discarded from play")

name: Torrhen's Square
rules_text: If you have no other City plots in your used pile, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during [Military] challenges.

name: Negotiations at the Great Sept
rules_text: If you have no other City plots in your used pile, choose an opponent. You and that opponent may each choose to shuffle your hands of at least 1 card into your decks, and replace them with the top 5 cards of the same deck.

name: The Long Voyage
rules_text:
Neutral Faction House card only.
Your minimum deck size is 85 cards.
When you draw during the draw phase, draw 1 additional card.

name: House Clegane Brigands
rules_text: If you are running a character agenda or are not running an agenda, House Clegane Brigands gains: "Response: After you win an [Intrigue] challenge, stand House Clegane Brigands."

name: Sitting the Iron Throne
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Deathbound.
Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to choose a character to claim 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)
Dominance: If you won dominance this phase, pay 1 gold to return Sitting the Iron Throne from yoru dead pile to your hand.

name: Raiders of Orkmont
rules_text: If you are running a character agenda or are not running an agenda, Raiders of Orkmont gains: "Response: After you win a [Military] challenge, look at the top 3 cards of the losing opponent's deck. Discard up to 2 of those cards. Put the remaining cards back on the top of the deck in any order."

name: Deepwood Motte
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Deepwood Motte to discard the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck (any player may discard 1 power from his or her House card to cancel this effect). If 2 or more non-character cards are discarded in this way, choose and stand a character.

name: Seized
rules_text:
Attach to a non-unique non-limited location.
Take control of attached location and discard all other attachments attached to it.
flavor_text: The northmen would not realize their true peril, not until the hammers fell on Deepwood Motte and Moat Cailin. - A Clash of Kings

name: Blackcrown Knights
rules_text: If you are running a character agenda or are not running an agenda, Blackcrown Knights gains: "Response: After you win a [Power] challenge in which Blackcrown Knights participated, discard 1 card from your hand to have Blackcrown Knights claim 2 power."

name: Dale Seaworth
rules_text:
Joust.
Response: After Dale Seaworth enters play or leaves play, choose and return 1 [Baratheon] card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Shores of the Blackwater
rules_text: Challenges: If you have won a challenge by 4 or more total STR this phase, kneel and discard Shores of the Blackwater from play to choose a character in your dead pile killed this phase. Return that character to your hand.

name: Riders of Karhold
rules_text: If you are running a character agenda or are not running an agenda, Riders of Karhold gains: "Response: After you win a [Military] challenge, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a character add it to your hand, otherwise return it to the top of your deck."

name: Passing the Wall
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Any Phase: Put a Night's Watch character into play from your hand, then draw 1 card. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, return it to your hand.
flavor_text: "Then pass." the door said. Its lips opened, wide and wider and wider still until nothing at all remained but a great gaping mouth in a righ of wrinkles. - A Storm of Swords

name: Host of the Boneway
rules_text: If you are running a character agenda or are not running an agenda, Host of the Boneway gains: "Response: After you win an [Intrigue] challenge, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an event card add it to your hand, otherwise return it to the top of your deck."

name: Greenblood Vessel
rules_text: Response: After an opponent declares a challenge against you, kneel Greenblood Vessel to choose a character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an icon of your choice.
