name: Shores of the Summer Sea
rules_text: Response: After you lose a challenge, kneel Shores of the Summer Sea to choose 2 cards in your discard pile. Shuffle those cards back into your deck.

name: Dothraki Outrider
rules_text:
Stealth.
Dothraki Outrider gains renown during [Power] challenges.
flavor_text: "Dothraki have been seen north of Dagger Lake, outriders from old Motho's khalasar." - Haldon Halfmaester

name: Braided Screamers
rules_text: If you are running a character agenda or are not running an agenda, braided Screamers gain: "Response: After you play a Dothraki character of cost 3 or more, search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Dothraki character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. Limit once per round."

name: Port at Slaver's Bay
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel Port at Slaver's Bay to lower the cost of the next attachment you play this phase by 1 (by 2 instead if it is an out-of-House attachment).

name: Margaery Tyrell
rules_text:
While any opponent controls a Lady or Queen character, Margaery Tyrell gains melee.
Response: After Margaery Tyrell is knelt as an attacker, choose an dkneel a character controlled by the defending player. Then, that character is participating in this challenge as a defender. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor_text: Card designed by 2011 European Melee Champion Gregoire Lefebvre.

name: Blazewater Bay
rules_text:
Marshalling: Kneel and discard Blazewater Bay to lower the cost of the next card you play this phase with a [Naval] enhancement by 2.
[+1 Influence]

name: Blackwater Rush
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Blackwater Rush to choose a character with a [Naval] enhancement. Until the end of the phase, that character gains deadly.
flavor_text: A wall of red-hot steel, blazing wood, and swirling green flame stretched before him. The mouth of the Blackwater Rush had turned into the mouth of hell. - A Clash of Kings

name: King's Landing Coup
rules_text: If you have no other City plots in your used pile, reveal the top card of your deck and add it to your hand every time you win a challenge as the defender.

name: Arbor Guardsman
rules_text: Response: After you kneel a standing character using a card effect, add 2 gold to your gold pool from the treasury (Limit once per round).

name: Iron Islands Brigand
rules_text: Response: Discard Iron Islands Brigand from play to cancel the effects of a location card just triggered.

name: Iron Fleet Scout
rules_text: Challenges: Pay 1 gold to turn Iron Fleet Scout into a character with 2 STR, a [Military] icon and a [Power] icon, each with a [Naval] enhancement on it, until the end of the phase.

name: Lyseni Pirate
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge in which Lyseni Pirate was declared as a [Naval] attacker or defender, it claims 1 power.
flavor_text: "The Lyseni was a smuggler himself, as well as a trader, a banker, and notorious pirate." - A Clash of Kings

name: Khorane Sathmantes
rules_text: Smuggler characters gain stealth.
flavor_text: His name was Khorane Sathmantes, a Lyseni like Salladhor Saan, whose ship this was. - A Storm of Swords

name: Wylla Manderly
rules_text:
Stalwart.
While Wylla Manderly is defending and there is at least 1 attacking Ally or Traitor character, she gets +3 STR.
flavor_text: "Not every woman can be as brave as my Wylla..." - Wyman Manderly

name: White Harbor
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel White Harbor to choose a character controlled by an opponent with 6 or more power on his or her House card. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be saved and ignores any effect that would make it 'cannot be killed.'

name: Manderly's Scheme
rules_text:
House Stark only.
During [Intrigue] challenges against you, your characters with a [Military] icon gain an [Intrigue] icon.

name: Planky Town Orphan
rules_text: Response: After you play Planky Town Orphan from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. Play that card as your next action this phase. Otherwise, return it to the top of your deck.

name: Salty Dornishman
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose 1 icon. Until the end of the phase, Salty Dornishman gains that icon with a [Naval] enhancement on it.
flavor_text: Salty Dornishmen who lived along the coasts had the most Rhyonsih blood. They were lithe and dark, with smooth olive skin and long black hair streaming in the wind. - A Storm of Swords

name: Ser Cletus Yronwood
rules_text:
Melee. Renown.
If you are running a non-character agenda, treat Ser Cletus Yronwood's printed text box (apart from this ability) as if it were blank.
Response: After Ser Cletus Yronwood is killed, draw 2 cards.

name: Ser Rolly Duckfield
rules_text: While you control a Lord or Lady character, Ser Rolly Duckfield cannot be discarded from play.
flavor_text: "Any knight can make a night, and Griff made me." - A Dance With Dragons

name: Blood Magic Ritual
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Response: After Blood Magic Ritual comes out of Shadows, choose a non-Army character in your dead pile and put it into play. Attach Blood Magic Ritual to it. If Blood Magic Ritual is discarded or leaves play, kill that character.

name: Guided by Quaithe
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Any Phase: Put a character or location card from your hand into Shadows as if it had the [Shadow] crest. Then, attach Guided by Quaithe to it. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text, "Pay the printed gold cost of the attached card to put it into play as your Shadows action. If Guided by Quaithe becomes unattached, return attached card to it's owners hand if it is still in Shadows.")

name: Dagger Lake Galley
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Dagger Lake Galley to choose a unique character you control. That character gains a [Naval] enhancement on the icon of your choice until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: Two galleys had come out to meet them. They seemed to skim upon the water like dragonflies. - A Feast for Crows

name: Anointed by the Mother
rules_text:
Any House except Lannister.
Response: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a [Holy] character to cancel a triggered effect that would cause a player to draw 1 or more cards. Instead, you draw that number of cards.

name: Judged by the Father
rules_text:
Any House except Targaryen.
Any Phase: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a [Holy] character to choose a character with STR 3 or less in your dead pile and return it to hand.

name: Nurtured by the Crone
rules_text:
Any House except Martell.
Nurtured by the Crone cannot be cancelled.
Response: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a [Holy] character to cancel a triggered effect that chooses a unique character or location as its only target.

name: Desperate Measures
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to search the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal 1 of those cards and add it to your hand. Then, discard the other searched cards.

name: Aurane Waters
rules_text: If you have more than 1 opponent and Aurane Waters would be killed or discarded from play, instead Aurane Waters is added to the title pool (limit 1 per title pool). As a Title, Aurane Waters gains: "Once per round name a challenge icon. Until the end of the phase, unique characters you control gain a [Naval] enhancement on that icon, if able."

name: King's Landing Dromon
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Response: After you win a challenge in which you declared 1 or more [Naval] attackers or defenders, kneel King's Landing Dromon to have that character claim 1 power.
flavor_text: "If it please Your Grace, I will launch the rest of our new dromons." - Aurane Waters

name: Qarl the Maid
rules_text:
Intimidate.
Response: After you declare Qarl the Maid as a [Naval] attacker, discard the top 2 cards of the defending player's deck. Until the end of the phase, Qarl the Maid gets +2 STR for each event card discarded in this way.

name: Ten Towers Longship
rules_text:
You may place an event card attached to Ten Towers Longship on the bottom of its owner's deck to play it as if it was in your hand.
Response: After you win a challenge by 4 or more total STR, kneel Ten Towers Longship to choose an event card in the losing opponent's discard pile. Attach that event card to Ten Towers Longship.

name: Longship Nightflyer
rules_text: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Longship Nightflyer to have the losing opponent choose and discard a card from his or her hand.

name: Arms of the Kraken
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only. Play before any challenges have been declared this phase.
Challenges: Until the end of the phase, when a player loses a challenge, he or she must choose a location he or she controls and return it to its owner's hand.

name: Shores of the Mander
rules_text: While you control at least 1 Captain character, your characters get +1 STR during the challenges phase.
flavor_text:
Across the Mander, the storm lords had raised their standards, Renly's own bannermen, sworn to House Baratheon and Storm's End.
- A Clash of Kings

name: Huntress
rules_text:
No attachments.
Challenges: Kneel Huntress to choose a Lord or Captain character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains melee and renown.

name: Fury
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Fury and discard 2 cards from your hand to choose and stand a [Baratheon] character without attachments. Then draw 1 card. (Draw 2 cards instead if you have won a challenge by 4 or more STR this round.)

name: House Manderly Escort
rules_text: House Manderly Escort gets +1 STR for each House Manderly character you control.

name: Trident Guard
rules_text: Melee.
flavor_text: They found defenders; two guards at teh flap of the tent, leaning on tall spears with round leather shields strapped to their arms. - Storm of Swords

name: Call of the Three-Eyed Crow
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Response: After a unique non-Army character you own enters your dead pile, put that character into play knelt under your control.

name: Starfall Skirmisher
rules_text: Melee.
flavor_text: Their armor was heavily enameled and inlaid with burnished copper, shining silver, and soft red gold. - A Storm of Swords

name: Choosing the Spear
rules_text: Challenges: Choose and stand a [Martell] character. That character gains melee until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: "He pointed to the spear, then to my mother's tears, and I picked up the spear." - Obara Sand

name: Venomous Manticore
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to attach Venomous Manticore to a character (counts as a Creature attachment with the text 'Attached character gets -1 STR. Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to attach Venomous Manticore to another eligible character').

name: Randyll Tarly
rules_text:
Melee.
Response: After you declare Randyll Tarly as an attacker, choose any number of House Tyrell characters to gain vigilant until the end of the challenge.
flavor_text: "Randyll tarly is the finest soldier in the realm." - Ser Kevan Lannister

name: Cape Wrath
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose a card you control that is currently in play with the [Shadow] crest and return it to Shadows.

name: The Tattered Prince
rules_text: If The Tattered Prince would be killed, instead attach him to your House card as your only agenda with the text: "Ignore all gold penalties when playing out-of-House Mercenary characters. Lower the cost of the first Mercenary character you play each round by 1."

name: Blessed by the Maiden
rules_text:
Any House except Baratheon.
Any Phase: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a [Holy] character to choose up to 3 cards in any player's discard and dead piles and shuffle them into his or her deck.

name: Supported by the Smith
rules_text:
Any House except Greyjoy.
Any Phase: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a [Holy] character to choose up to 2 locations with a total printed cost of 2 or less in your discard pile and put them into play.

name: Favored by the Warrior
rules_text:
Any House except Stark.
Response: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a [Holy] character to save a unique character you control from being killed (any player may discard 3 power from his or her House card to cancel this effect). Then, search your deck for a copy of that character and attach it as a duplicate and shuffle your deck.

name: Alester Florent
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR during [Power] challenges for each Bannerman character you control.
flavor_text: "...in place of coin I have taken a handsome parchment, very crisp. It bears the name and seal of Lord Alester Florent, the Hand of the King." - Salladhor Saan

name: Brightwater Keep
rules_text:
No attachments.
Response: After a card is discarded from a player's hand, kneel Brightwater Keep to return that card to its owner's hand.

name: Into the Breach
rules_text: Any Phase: Put a [Baratheon] character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, discard it.
flavor_text: "They've landed men on the tourney grounds, hundreds! They're bringing a ram up to the King's Gate."

name: Gorold Goodbrother
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose and kneel X locations. X is the number of Bannerman characters you control.
flavor_text: "I must send word to Pyke, and soon," said Gorold Goodbrother. "Damphair, I would have your counsel. What shall it be, homage or defiance?"

name: Hammerhorn
rules_text:
No attachments.
The player with the most cards at his or her command at the beginning of the draw phase draws 1 less card (to a minimum of 1) when he or she draws for that phase.

name: Scaling Ladder
rules_text:
Attach to a location.
While attached location is knelt, its controller cannot declare defenders during [Military] challenges.
flavor_text: "Perhaps they will spend a day or two fashioning ladders and tying grapnels to the ends of ropes." - Maester Luwin

name: Damon Marbrand
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR during [Intrigue] challenges for each Bannerman character you control.

name: Ashemark
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to add 1 gold token from the treasury to your gold pool. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

name: Trebuchet
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard Trebuchet from play to give each of your participating characters +X STR until the end of the challenge. X is the number of cards in your hand.

name: Edric Dayne
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose X characters. Until the end of the phase, those characters gain, "immune to events." X is the number of bannerman characters you control.

name: Southron Stronghold
rules_text:
Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to stand Southron Stronghold.
[+1 Income]
[+1 Influence]

name: Poisoned Well
rules_text:
Attach to a location.
Response: After attached location's effect is triggered, return it to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "Watch where you set your feet," Drey cautioned. "It has been a while since Prince Oberyn milked the local vipers."

name: Mors Umber
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each Bannerman character you control.
flavor_text: "Crow-food, they call him. A crow once took him for dead and pecked out his eye. He caught the bird in his fist and bit its head off." - Jon Snow

name: Northland Keep
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Northland Keep to choose a participating character with a higher STR than printed cost. Remove that character from the challenge.

name: Breaching the Wall
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Limited Response: After you win a [Military] challenge, choose and kill any number of characters with a higher STR than printed cost that are controlled by the losing opponent. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Ser Raymun Darry
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to put an attachment of cost X or lower into play from your hand. X is the number of Bannerman characters you control.

name: Castle Darry
rules_text:
Immune to plot card effects.
At the end of the standing phase, claim 1 power for your House if you control more attachments than each opponent.

name: Rain of Fire
rules_text:
Play only if you control at least 1 printed Dragon character.
Challenges: Discard all attachment cards from play. Then, discard the top card of your deck for each attachment discarded by this effect.

name: Storm the Gate
rules_text:
House Baratheon or Greyjoy only.
Dominance: Kneel 3 influence or pay 3 gold to discard all kneeling characters from play.

name: Rally Cry
rules_text: When revealed, choose and discard 1 character or location with cost X or lower controlled by the player with the most cards at his or her command. X is the combined number of plots in all players' used piles.

name: Ser Imry Florent
rules_text:
Ser Imry Florent cannot be returned to your hand.
If it is Summer or Winter, Ser Imry Florent gets +2 STR and gains deadly.

name: Ser Garlan Tyrell
rules_text:
Renown. Deadly.
If it is Summer, kneel Ser Garlan Tyrell and discard all power from him.
flavor_text: "That was ill done, Your Grace..."

name: The Kingsroad
rules_text:
After you win a challenge, kneel all copies of The Kingsroad in play to choose an opponent. Then, if it is Winter, that player must discard 1 card at random from his or her hand.
[+1 Initiative]
[+1 Income]

name: Balon Greyjoy
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Renown.
If it is Winter, each of your characters gets +2 STR while you control more locations than each opponent.

name: Longship Great Kraken
rules_text: If it is not Summer, Longship Great Kraken gains, "Dominance: Each opponent must discard the top X cards of his or her deck, where X is the number of characters in his or her dead pile. (Limit once per round.)"

name: Damphair's Drowned
rules_text: If you control more locations than each opponent, Damphair's Drowned gets +1 STR and gains an [Intrigue] icon with a [Naval] enhancement.

name: King's Landing Guard
rules_text:
No attachments.
Response: After you win a [Military] challenge in which King's Landing Guard participated, discard 1 card at random from the losing player's hand.

name: Tommen Baratheon
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Any Phase: If it is Summer, kneel Tommen Baratheon to look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Switch any 1 of those cards with a card in your hand, if able. Then, put the remaining cards on top of your deck in any order.

name: The Kingsroad
rules_text:
After you win a challenge, kneel all copies of The Kingsroad in play. Then, if it is Summer, draw 1 card.
[+1 Initiative]
[+1 Income]

name: Ellaria Sand
rules_text:
House Martell only. Stealth.
While it is Summer, Ellaria Sand gains: "Response: After an opponent plays or puts a character into play, Ellaria Sand claims 2 power if that player controls more characters than you. (Limit 3 times per phase.)"

name: Oberyn's Shield Bearer
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Any Phase: If it is Summer, discard Oberyn's Shield Bearer (cannot be saved) to cancel the next 3 effects triggered by a single opponent (of your choice) this round.

name: The Long Plan
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you have lost your third challenge in the same phase, bring The Long Plan out of Shadows by paying the rest of its gold cost. Then, claim 3 power for your House. (Limit 1 per phase.)

name: Bran Stark
rules_text: If it is Winter, Bran Stark gains, "Challenges: During a challenge, kneel Bran Stark to choose and kneel a standing, non-participating, non-Army character with higher STR than printed cost. That character is now participating in the current challenge on your side."

name: Winterfell
rules_text:
House Stark only. No attachments.
Challenges: If it is Winter, kneel Winterfell to increase the claim of the current challenge by 1.
flavor_text:
"Winterfell may have need of all its swords soon, and they had best not be made of wood."
-Catelyn Stark

name: Green Dream
rules_text: Dominance: If you are running a Seasons agenda, search your deck for a non-Raven card with either the word "Summer" or "Winter" in its text box, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Khal Drogo
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Renown.
If it is Summer, each of your characters gets +2 STR while you control more attachments than each opponent.

name: Slaver's Bay
rules_text: Response: If it is Summer, after you win a [Power] challenge, kneel Slaver's Bay to put a non-unique character from any opponent's discard pile into play under your control.

name: Dothraki Vanguard
rules_text: Response: After you play Dothraki Vanguard from your hand, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may put 1 revealed Dothraki character into play. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: A Song of Fire
rules_text:
If no opponent is running a Seasons agenda, it cannot be Winter.
If it is Summer, increase each player's draw cap by 1.

name: A Song of Ice
rules_text:
If no opponent is running a Seasons agenda, it cannot be Summer.
If it is Winter, each player must choose and discard down to 4 cards in hand at the end of the dominance phase.

name: Shadow Killer
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Stealth. Deadly.
Response: After Shadow Killer comes out of shadows, choose and kill a character controlled by a player with more cards at his or her command than you (cannot be saved)

name: Melisandre
rules_text:
Renown.
[Holy] characters in your dead pile count their STR toward dominance.
Response: After you win dominance, choose a [Holy] character in your dead pile and put it into play.

name: Greydon Goodbrother
rules_text: Discard Greydon Goodbrother from play (cannot be saved) if you control fewer locations than any opponent.

name: Longship Grey Ghost
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
After you win an unopposed challenge, return Longship Grey Ghost to shadows.
Response: After Longship Grey Ghost comes out of shadows, choose a character. That character cannot defend this phase.

name: Tywin Lannister
rules_text:
Renown.
Tywin Lannister does not kneel to attack an opponent with more cards in hand than you.
flavor_text: "No man sheds Lannister blood with impunity."

name: The Hound
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
No attachments except Weapon.
The Hound gets +1 STR for each card in shadows.

name: Arianne Martell
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After Arianne Martell comes out of shadows, choose and reveal a new plot card.
flavor_text: "I want Sunspear, and my father's seat. I want Dorne!"

name: Palestone Sword Guard
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence or discard 1 card from your hand to give Palestone Sword Guard +1 STR and an icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Umber Champion
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard Umber Champion from play (cannot be saved) to stand each defending character.
flavor_text: All along the benches, his sons and brothers and sworn swords leapt to their feet, grabbing for their steel.

name: Moat Cailin
rules_text:
House Stark only.
While defending a challenge with at least 1 character, your side counts +1 STR for each card in shadows.
Response: After a challenge is declared against you, bring Moat Cailin out of shadows.

name: Ser Jorah Mormont
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
No attachments except Weapon.
If Ser Jorah Mormont is discarded from your hand, put him into shadows instead. Then, draw 1 card.

name: Harpy's Scourge
rules_text:
Setup.
Challenges: Discard a card from your hand to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR, and attached character gets +1 STR.

name: Ser Barristan Selmy
rules_text:
No attachments. Renown.
Challenges: Kneel 1 influence or pay 1 gold to bring a Kingsguard or Queensguard character out of shadows.

name: Ser Jaime Lannister
rules_text:
No attachments. Renown.
Response: After a card comes out of shadows, draw 1 card. (Draw 3 cards instead if you control 3 or more Kingsguard characters.)
flavor_text: "Believe what you will, I'm past caring what people say of me."

name: Ser Meryn Trant
rules_text:
No attachments. Stealth.
Response: After a card comes out of shadows, each opponent must choose and kneel 1 standing character or location he controls, if able.

name: Ser Mandon Moore
rules_text:
No attachments. Deadly.
If you have more cards in shadows than each opponent, opponents' characters cannot be saved.
flavor_text: ...Ser Mandon flashed past him, death in snow-white silk.

name: Ser Preston Greenfield
rules_text:
No attachments.
Any Phase: Return a Kingsguard or Queensguard character you control to shadows. (Limit once per round.)

name: Ser Arys Oakheart
rules_text:
No attachments.
Response: After a card comes out of shadows, choose and stand 1 character you control. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

name: Ser Boros Blount
rules_text:
No attachments.
Response: After Ser Boros Blount comes out of shadows, each of your characters get +1 STR until the end of the phase.

name: On My Oath
rules_text: When revealed, put a Kingsguard or Queensguard character with the [Shadows] crest into shadows from your dead or discard pile.

name: Coldhands
rules_text:
Coldhands cannot be saved.
Response: After you play Coldhands from your hand, choose 1 non-Army character controlled by each player, if able, and remove those characters from the game. When Coldhands leaves play, return the removed cards to play under their owners' control.
flavor_text: Card designed by 2011 AGoT LCG World Joust Champion Brett Zeiler.
faqs:
What happens if a unique card removed from the game via Coldhands attempts to re-enter the game, but another copy of that card is in its owner's dead pile?
The card cannot enter play, and remains removed from the game.

name: Stannis Baratheon
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Renown.
If it is Winter, Stannis Baratheon gets +1 STR and gains, "Response: After you play an event card, choose a character without any power on it. That character claims 1 power."

name: Melisandre's Favor
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Take control of attached character.
At the end of the dominance phase, discard Melisandre's Favor from play.

name: Gormond Goodbrother
rules_text: Response: Kneel Gormond Goodbrother to save a location you control from being discarded from play.
flavor_text:
"Aye, and which are you?" Aeron demanded.
"Gormond. Gormond Goodbrother, if it please my lord."

name: Hammerhorn Raiders
rules_text:
No attachments.
While Hammerhorn Raiders is attacking, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 if you win the challenge by counting at least twice as much STR as the defending player.

name: Plunder
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Any Phase: Choose an opponent. Add 1 gold token to your gold pool from the treasury for each location that opponent controls.

name: Janos Slynt
rules_text: Response: After 1 or more cards are discarded from an opponent's hand, stand Janos Slynt to draw 1 card.
flavor_text: "I am Janos Slynt, Lord of Harrenhal, and commander here at Castle Black until such time as Bowen Marsh returns with his garrison."

name: Janos's Conspirator
rules_text:
Response: After you play Janos's Conspirator from your hand, choose and kneel a character if
there is a Wildling or another Night's Watch character in play.

name: Secret Orders
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Any Phase: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character's base STR is X. X is the amount of gold in its controller's gold pool when this effect resolves.

name: Viper's Paramour
rules_text: Ally characters cannot be declared as defenders while Viper's Paramour is attacking.
flavor_text:
"Did you tire of your paramour on the road?"
-Tyrion Lannister

name: Dayne Spearman
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you lose a challenge, put Dayne Spearman into shadows to choose a character. That character loses a [Military], an [Intrigue], and a [Power] icon until the end of the phase.

name: Dornish Hermitage
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an icon of your choice.

name: Jon Snow
rules_text:
Deadly.
Your Wildling characters get +1 STR.
Your Night's Watch characters gain "immune to events."

name: Yoren
rules_text: If it is not Summer, Yoren can defend [Intrigue] challenges declared against you, even while kneeling.
flavor_text: Yoren was stooped and sinister, his features hidden behind a beard as black as his clothing, but he seemed as tough as an old root and as hard as stone.

name: Aegon's Favor
rules_text:
Setup.
Attach to a character you control.
Challenges: Discard the top card of your deck to give attached character +1 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit 5 per round.)

name: Loyal to the Last
rules_text:
Challenges: During a [Power] challenge, kneel 2 of your [Targaryen] characters to kill all attacking characters.
Limit 1 per challenge.
flavor_text: "To the end of my days I shall remain your faithful knight, should you find me worthy to bear a sword again." -Ser Barristan Selmy

name: Eastwatch Envoy
rules_text:
Stealth.
When Eastwatch Envoy gains an icon, it also gains a [Naval] enhancement with that icon.
flavor_text: Cotter Pyke had written from Eastwatch to report that the Storm Crow had sighted the wreckage of a galley along the coast of Skagos.

name: Ygritte
rules_text: Response: After you play Ygritte from your hand, choose and take control of a neutral or Night's Watch character until Ygritte leaves play.
flavor_text: "You know nothing, Jon Snow."

name: Betrayal at the Wall
rules_text:
Increase the size of your plot deck by 1. (Limit 1 per plot deck.)
When revealed, choose and reveal a new plot card if you control 2 or more Night's Watch or Wildling characters. (Cannot be canceled.)
faqs:
What happens if I reveal Betrayal at the Wall as my final plot card, and its "when revealed" effect attempts to resolve when I do not have a plot deck?
You are not able to choose and reveal a new plot card, so the "when revealed" effect fails to resolve.

name: Befouled River
rules_text: When revealed, the player with the most cards at his or her command must choose and discard 2 cards that are under his or her command.

name: Brightwater Man-at-Arms
rules_text:
Deadly.
Brightwater Man-at-Arms does not kneel to attack or defend.
At the end of the dominance phase, discard Brightwater Man-at-Arms from play.

name: Forced March
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Any Phase: Stand any number of characters with combined printed cost 3 or lower.

name: Asha Greyjoy
rules_text:
Renown.
If any opponent has more power on his or her House card than you, Asha Greyjoy cannot be killed.

name: Pyke
rules_text:
No attachments. Immune to events and character abilities.
Power on Pyke counts towards your victory total.
Any Phase: Kneel Pyke to move 1 power from your House card to Pyke.

name: Storming the Shore
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Any Phase: Choose and kneel any number of locations with combined printed cost 3 or lower.
flavor_text: At the first glimpse of longships the old men would light their beacon fires, and the call would leap from hill to hill and island to island. Fear! Foes! Raiders! Raiders!

name: Ashemark Knight
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to draw 1 card.
flavor_text: "Kevan, I want Ser Addam's outriders to screen our movements. Give him as many men as he requires, and send them out in groups of four." -Tywin Lannister

name: Ser Gregor's Dog
rules_text: Response: After a card is discarded from any player's hand, Ser Gregor's Dog gets +1 STR until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: Dogs, his father called them all, and he used them like dogs, to hound his prey and put fear in their hearts

name: Harry the Riverlands
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Any Phase: Kneel any number of characters with combined printed cost 3 or lower.
flavor_text:
"Tell them I want to see the riverlands afire from the Gods Eye to the Red Fork."
-Tywin Lannister

name: Obara Sand
rules_text: Obara Sand gets +2 STR and gains renown while she is attacking a player who controls more characters than you.
flavor_text: "Give me back my spear, Uncle. Cersei sent us a head. We should send her back a bag of them."

name: Doran's Favor
rules_text:
Setup. Attach to a character you control.
Discard attached character from play (cannot be saved) when you kneel Doran's Favor to pay an influence cost.
[+4 Influence]

name: Prepare for War
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Any Phase: Choose any number of influence providing cards with combined printed cost 3 or lower. Kneel all chosen cards or stand all chosen cards.

name: Robb Stark
rules_text:
Renown.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Robb Stark participated, choose and kill a character
with a higher STR than its printed cost. (Cannot be saved.)

name: Harwin
rules_text: While any opponent's House card has more power than your House card, Harwin gains, "Response: After you win a [Military] challenge, search your deck for a card, shuffle your deck, and then put that card on top of your deck."

name: Griffin's Roost
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
While any opponent's House card has more power than your House card, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during [Power] challenges.

name: Daenerys's Favor
rules_text:
Attach to a character you control.
Attached character gets +3 STR, gains the Bannerman trait, and gains a [Military], an [Intrigue], and a [Power] icon.
After you lose a [Power] challenge, discard attached character from play. (Cannot be saved.)

name: Gendry
rules_text: While any opponent's House card has more power than your House card, Gendry gains, "Response: After you win a challenge in which Gendry participated, move 1 power from the losing player's House card to Gendry."

name: Lady of the Leaves
rules_text:
Immune to events.
While any opponent's House card has more power than your House card, Lady of the Leaves gains, "Any Phase: Kneel Lady of the Leaves to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank."

name: A Noble Cause
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
You draw 1 less card during the draw phase (to a minimum of 1).
Your [Baratheon] characters with printed cost 2 or higher gain renown.

name: The Old Way
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Joust format only.
After a challenge resolves, the player who counted the lowest total STR must choose and kill a participating character he or she controls.

name: Redwyne Straits
rules_text: When revealed, the player with the fewest cards at his or her command adds 4 gold to his or her gold pool.

name: Maester Cressen
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Response: After Maester Cressen comes out of shadows or after he is killed, return the topmost card of your discard pile to your hand.

name: Mace Tyrell
rules_text:
Renown.
If it is not Summer, reduce the amount of power required for each player to win the game by 1 for each power on Mace Tyrell.

name: Riches of the Reach
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Any Phase: Draw 4 cards, ignoring the draw cap. You cannot draw cards for the rest of the game.
flavor_text: Very tall, very courtly, and very richâ€¦

name: Gran Goodbrother
rules_text: If you control more locations than each opponent, Gran Goodbrother cannot be killed or discarded from play.

name: Longship Maiden's Bane
rules_text: Challenges: During a challenge, kneel Longship Maiden's Bane to have it participate in the current challenge on your side as a character with "cannot be killed" and X STR. X is the number of unique Greyjoy Warship cards you control.
faqs:
Does Longship Maiden's Bane lose the immunity granted by House of Dreams while Longship Maiden's Bane is functioning as a character?
When a card changes type and becomes a character, it loses all other card types. As House of Dreams specifies that the immunity is granted to "that location", the immunity from the agenda is not present while Maiden's Bane is changed to a character. When Longship Maiden's Bane reverts back to its original state as a location, House of Dreams again provides its immunity. This is because the immunity granted by House of Dreams is being granted by a constant effect.

name: Euron's Favor
rules_text:
Setup.
Attach to a character you control.
Any Phase: Discard a Warship location from play or from your hand to give attached character +4 STR and deadly until the end of the phase.

name: Grand Maester Pycelle
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge in which Grand Maester Pycelle participated, discard up to 2 cards at random from the losing opponent's hand. Then, that player adds that same number of cards from the top of his deck to his hand.

name: Tywin's Favor
rules_text:
Setup. Attach to a character you control.
Any Phase: Discard attached character from play to add 4 gold tokens to your gold pool from the treasury.
flavor_text:
"House Westerling has its pardon, and your brother Rolph has been made Lord of Castamere. What else would you have of us?"
-Jaime Lannister

name: Lashing Out
rules_text:
Challenges: During an [Intrigue] challenge, kneel 2 of your [Lannister] characters to kill all attacking characters.
Limit 1 per challenge.
flavor_text: "A day will come when you think yourself safe and happy, and suddenly your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth, and you'll know the debt is paid." -Tyrion Lannister

name: Southron Heiress
rules_text: Southron Heiress gains stealth and deadly when attacking a player who controls more characters than you.
flavor_text:
"It would gladden my heart if I could assure you that the Sand Snakes were alone in wanting war, but I will not tell you lies, ser."
-Doran Martell

name: Secret Schemes
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Challenges: Kneel X influence to reveal X cards from the top of your deck and add them to your hand, if able. Then, shuffle X cards from your hand into your deck.

name: Littlefinger
rules_text:
Stealth. Immune to opponents' events.
Reduce the cost to bring Littlefinger out of shadows by a single opponent's (your choice) current power total.
Increase the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 when attacking an opponent with more power than you.
flavor_text: Card designed by the player community at Days of Ice and Fire 2012.

name: Alleras
rules_text:
No attachments.
If you are not running an agenda, Alleras gains: "Response: After an opponent running an agenda wins a challenge as the attacker against you, name a challenge type. That player cannot declare attackers or defenders during that challenge type until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)"

name: Sansa Stark
rules_text: Response: After you play Sansa Stark from your hand, search your deck for a card. If you have the fewest cards at your command, add it to your hand. Otherwise, discard it. Shuffle your deck.

name: Robb's Favor
rules_text:
Attach to a [Stark] character you control. Limit 1 per character.
While attached character is attacking alone, increase the claim value on your revealed plot card by 2. If you win that challenge, discard attached character from play (cannot be saved).

name: Viserion
rules_text:
Stealth.
No attachments.
Rhaegal cannot be killed.

name: Drogon
rules_text:
Renown.
No attachments.
Viserion cannot be killed.

name: Rhaegal
rules_text:
Deadly.
No attachments.
Drogon cannot be killed.

name: Bloodthirst
rules_text:
House Martell only.
At the end of the challenge phase, the player who controls the fewest characters draws 2 cards.

name: Summoned by the Conclave
rules_text: When revealed, each player not running an agenda may search his or her deck for a character card, reveal it, and add it to his or her hand. Shuffle all searched decks.

name: Conquest
rules_text:
When you announce your agenda, name a House. Ignore the out-of-House gold penalty when playing cards or placing setup cards with that affiliation.
Your out-of-House character and attachment cards with that affiliation gain "prized 1" while leaving play. Your out-of-House location cards with that affiliation gain "prized 2" while leaving play.

name: Defiance
rules_text:
Your plot deck must contain exactly 10 plot cards.
Each of your plot cards gains "prized 1" while moving to your used pile.

name: Seasoned Smuggler
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Response: After you win a [Power] challenge in which Seasoned Smuggler participated, choose and stand a prized card.
flavor_text: "...I heard it said that you were a bolder sort of man, the sort who might risk anything for sufficient gold." -Ser Gerris Drinkwater

name: Bitterbridge
rules_text:
Immune to character abilities.
Any Phase: Kneel Bitterbridge to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot trigger its abilities.
flavor_text: "His Grace is encamped with his host near Bitterbridge, where the roseroad crosses the Mander." -Ser Colen of Greenpools

name: Right of Conquest
rules_text:
House Baratheon only. Prized 1.
Response: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating Lord or Lady character, the losing player must choose 1 location he or she controls. Then, choose and take control of a different non-limited location under that player's control.

name: Enraged Crewman
rules_text:
Melee.
If you win a challenge in which Enraged Crewman participated by 4 or more STR as the attacker, the challenge is considered unopposed.

name: The Reaver's Song
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only. Prized 1.
Response: After you win dominance, discard all locations from play. You cannot play locations for the rest of the game.

name: Frey Armsmen
rules_text:
No attachments.
Frey Armsmen gets +2 STR during [Military] challenges for each House Frey character you control.
flavor_text: More and more riders were emerging from the castle, a column four wide with no end to it, knights and squires and freeriders, torches and longaxes.

name: Traitor
rules_text:
Attached character gains the Traitor trait.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, treat it as if its printed text box were blank.
flavor_text: As doomed as the Night's Watch, if Lord Tywin marks us down as traitors.

name: Doran Martell
rules_text:
Prized 2. Stealth.
When a prized card is discarded from an opponent's hand, claim power for your House equal to that card's prized value.
flavor_text: "Things can change quickly in the game of thrones."

name: Spy from Starfall
rules_text:
Prized 1.
While Spy from Starfall is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.

name: You Murdered Her Children
rules_text:
House Martell only. Prized 2.
Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, kneel 2 influence to choose and discard an attacking character from play. Then, search the deck and hand of that character's controller for any number of copies of that character and discard them. Then, shuffle the deck.

name: Catelyn Stark
rules_text:
Prized 2.
Immune to character abilities.
Response: After Catelyn Stark leaves play, choose a non-Army [Stark] character in your dead pile and put that character into play.

name: Show of Force
rules_text:
House Stark only. Prized 2.
Response: Play after you win a [Military] challenge as the defender. Immediately after the resolution of the current challenge, a [Military] challenge is initiated against the losing opponent with you as the attacking player and your currently defending characters as your only attacking characters.
faqs:
What is the timing of a challenge initiated by Show of Force?
The challenge initiated by Show of Force bypasses the standard framework action window steps of choosing challenge type and declaring characters -- the event card performs each of these steps on its own. Following this, the remainder of the challenge resolves as would any other challenge that was initiated by conventional means. Note that the wording "as your only attacking characters" refers only to how the challenge is initiated: you cannot declare other characters via standard challenge declaration procedures, but other effects, such as a naval icon, may be used to add characters to the challenge.

name: Aegon Targaryen
rules_text:
Prized 1. No attachments.
If you control Young Griff, discard Young Griff from play.
Non-Dragon characters without attachments get -1 STR.
flavor_text: "I will claim the Iron Throne by myself, with your swords and your allegiance."

name: Lysono Maar
rules_text: Response: After an attachment enters play, choose a player. Look at that player's hand.
flavor_text: The spymaster was new to Griff, a Lyseni named Lysono Maarâ€¦

name: Theon Greyjoy
rules_text:
Prized 2.
After a player counts income, he or she must choose and kill a character he or she controls.
flavor_text: Card designed by 2012 A Game of Thrones European Joust Champion Stefano Montanari

name: Tycho Nestoris
rules_text:
Prized 2. No attachments.
Response: After you count income, pay 1 gold to draw 1 card.
[+1 Income]

name: Seizing the Prize
rules_text: When you claim power for the prized keyword, claim 1 additional power.

name: Crossing the Mummer's Ford
rules_text: When revealed, reveal the top X cards of your deck and add them to your hand. X is the number of River plot cards in your used pile. This effect cannot be triggered by other card effects.

name: Knight of the Songs
rules_text:
Joust.
Knight of the Songs gets +1 STR for each prized character you control.
flavor_text:
"Winter will never come for the likes of us. Should we die in battle, they will surely sing of us, and it's always summer in the songs."
-Brienne of Tarth

name: Rider from Storm's End
rules_text:
If you control a [Stark] character, Rider from Storm's End gets +1 STR.
If you control a [Lannister] character, Rider from Storm's End gains stealth.
flavor_text: Down in the yard below, a rider in a winged helm urged his well-lathered horse under the spikes. "Summon the king!" he called.

name: A Taste of Glory
rules_text: Challenges: Until the end of the phase, each prized character you control gets +2 STR and gains renown.

name: Wex Pyke
rules_text:
Prized 1. Stealth.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Wex Pyke participated, choose 1 prized card in your dead or discard pile, and return it to your hand.

name: Every Captain is a King
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: After a player declares a [Naval] attacker or defender, put a Warship location into play from your hand.
flavor_text: On the Iron Islands they were one and the same, for every captain was a king on his own deck, and every king must be a captain.

name: Ser Robert Strong
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
No attachments.
Each character with a printed cost that is less than the number of characters in its controller's dead pile comes into play knelt.

name: Frey Emissary
rules_text:
If you control a [Stark] character, Frey Emissary gets +1 STR.
If you control a [Baratheon] character, Frey Emissary gains renown.

name: Counterplot
rules_text:
House Lannister only. Prized 3.
Limited Response: After an opponent reveals a plot card, kneel a unique [Lannister] character to cancel the revealing of that plot and move it to its owner's used pile. That player must choose and reveal a new plot card. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Summer Sea Scout
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put all revealed prized cards into your hand. Return all non-prized cards to the top of your deck in any order.

name: Blood Orange Grove
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Any Phase: Kneel Blood Orange Grove to choose a character with a crest. Until the end of the phase, that character loses all crests and gains a challenge icon of your choice.

name: Desert Raider
rules_text:
House Martell only. Prized 1.
Response: After you lose a challenge, put Desert Raider into play from your dead pile. Then, choose a character and either an [Intrigue] or a [Power] icon. Until the end of the phase, the chosen character loses that icon and Desert Raider gains it.
flavor_text: Card designed by 2012 A Game of Thrones European Melee Champion Istvan Cserdi

name: Ser Edmure Tully
rules_text:
Deadly.
Any Phase: Choose a card in any player's discard or dead pile. Shuffle that card back into its owner's deck. (Limit once per round.)
flavor_text: "I held Riverrun, and I bloodied Lord Tywin's nose."

name: The Gatehouse Tower
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Your characters get +1 STR if you control fewer characters than each opponent.
flavor_text: The Gatehouse Tower, squat and wide, was the largest of the three, slimy with moss, a gnarled tree growing sideways from the stones of its north sideâ€¦

name: Needle
rules_text:
Prized 2.
Unique [Stark] character only.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, opponents cannot trigger effects.
flavor_text: "All the best swords have names." -Jon Snow

name: Rhoyne Poleman
rules_text: Prized 1. Melee.
flavor_text: They drifted inexorably toward the bridge. Yandry stabbed out with his pole to keep them from smashing into a pier.

name: Viserys Targaryen
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Prized 1.
Any Phase: Kneel Viserys Targaryen to choose and discard an attachment from play.
flavor_text: "Keep your hands off me! No one touches the dragon without leave."

name: Tokar
rules_text: Attached character gains a [Power] icon, and during [Power] challenges gains renown.
flavor_text: The garment was a clumsy thing, a long loose shapeless sheet that had to be wound around her hips and under an arm and over a shoulder, its dangling fringes carefully layered and displayed. Wound too loose, it was like to fall off; wound too tight, it would tangle, trip, and bind

name: Shagwell
rules_text:
Prized 1. Deadly.
If you are running the Neutral Faction House card, Shagwell gains, "Response: After you play a Mercenary character, choose and kneel a non-Army character. (Limit once per round.)"
flavor_text: "You mustn't hurt sweet Shagwell, I'm too droll to die."

name: Vargo Hoat
rules_text:
Prized 1. Renown.
Response: After Vargo Hoat enters play, choose and kneel any player's House card. You may discard a character agenda from that House card.
flavor_text: "Thee'th worth a bag of thapphireth!"

name: The Lost Message
rules_text: Prized 1. When revealed, choose and discard an attachment from play.

name: Knight of the North
rules_text:
Prized 1.
While Knight of the North is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.
flavor_text: King's men in one corner and queen's men in another, Jon did not fail to note, but only a few. It's too cold for most of them.

name: Heartsbane
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Attached character gets +1 STR.
Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, kneel Heartsbane to stand attached character.
flavor_text: "I was afraid I'd hurt one of my sisters." -Samwell Tarly

name: Orkmont Reaver
rules_text:
Prized 2.
Response: After an opponent plays a character from his or her hand, discard Orkmont Reaver from
play (cannot be saved) to kill that character.

name: Iron Islands Marines
rules_text: Challenges: Discard a card from your hand to turn Iron Islands Marines into an Army character with 3 STR, deadly, a military icon, and a power icon until the end of the phase.

name: Longship Iron Victory
rules_text:
Prized 2.
Challenges: Discard Longship Iron Victory (cannot be saved) to choose and kill 1 participating character (cannot be saved).
flavor_text: The Iron Victory raked her side so hard that half the boarding party lost their feet.

name: Podrick Payne
rules_text:
Prized 1. Stealth.
Tyrion Lannister gains a military icon.
Each card discarded from an opponent's hand reduces his or her draw cap by 1 (to a minimum of 0) until the end of the round.

name: The Mander
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel The Mander to draw 1 card. (2 cards instead if any player has a prized plot revealed.)
flavor_text: It was a lazy river, wide and slow and treacher- ous with snags and sandbars.

name: There Are No Men Like Me
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Challenges: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a military icon and does not kneel to attack or defend during military challenges.
flavor_text: “There's only me.” –Ser Jaime Lannister

name: The Bastard of Godsgrace
rules_text:
Stealth.
The first event card played by an opponent each round gains "prized 1" if The Bastard of Godsgrace is standing.
flavor_text: “...Daemon Sand and this Santagar girl were both close to Prince Doran's own daughter, Arianne, or so the Dornishmen would have us believe.” –Qyburn

name: The Stepstones
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Response: After you lose a challenge, discard 1 gold token from a character you control to reveal the top card of your deck and add it to your hand.

name: The Drunkard's Tower
rules_text:
House Stark only.
When you count income, count 2 additional gold if you control fewer characters than each opponent.
flavor_text: The Drunkard's Tower leaned like a man about to spew a bellyful of wine into the gutter.

name: The Children's Tower
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Dominance: If you control fewer characters than each opponent, kneel The Children's Tower to search the top 5 cards of your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Then shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Ice
rules_text:
Prized 2.
Unique Stark character only.
Challenges: While attached character is participating in a challenge, discard Ice to choose and kill up to X participating characters. X is the number of prized cards you control.

name: Blackfyre
rules_text:
Prized 1. Setup.
Response: If it is not Winter, after attached character is declared as
a defender, kneel Blackfyre to remove all characters without attachments from the challenge.

name: Fire Made Flesh
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Prized 2.
Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose a unique character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown and does not kneel to attack.
flavor_text: He is fire made flesh, she thought, and so am I.

name: House Bannerman
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel House Bannerman to ignore all gold penalties on the next card you play this phase.
flavor_text: All of them were bannermen to the Tullys, their swords sworn to the service of Riverrun. Catelyn wondered if that would be enough, if it came to war.

name: Septon Utt
rules_text:
Prized 1. Stealth.
Response: After Septon Utt enters or leaves play, draw 1 card if you are running the Neutral Faction House card.
flavor_text: “I have sinned,” the septon wailed. “I know, I know. Forgive me, Father. Oh, grievously have I sinned.”

name: Zollo
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Response: After you play Zollo, choose an opponent. Move all gold from that player's gold pool to yours.

name: Calling the Banners
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Dominance: Search your deck for a prized card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Common Cause
rules_text: Prized 1. X is equal to the number of different House affiliations among the characters you control. (Each character cannot contribute more than 1 House affiliation to this count.)

name: Renly Baratheon
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Marshalling: Kneel a Baratheon character to lower the cost of the next character you play this phase by X, where X is the number of prized cards you control. (Limit once per round.)

name: Lyseni Captain
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Response: After you play Lyseni Captain, pay 2 gold to move all power from a character to Lyseni Captain.

name: Warden of the South
rules_text:
Prized 2.
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel attached House card to choose an opponent. That opponent must choose and reveal a new plot card.

name: Great Wyk
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Great Wyk to choose another location. Kneel or stand that location.
flavor_text: Great Wyk was the largest of the Iron Islands, so vast that some of its lords had holdings that did not front upon the holy sea.

name: King of the Isles
rules_text:
Prized 3.
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel King of the Isles. Then, until the end of the round King of the Isles gains, "Response: Kneel attached House card to cancel a
triggered effect."

name: Set Sail
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, search your deck for a Warship location, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Tyrion Lannister
rules_text:
Prized 2. Stealth.
If you win a challenge in which Tyrion Lannister attacked alone, instead of
the normal claim effects, reveal a card from the losing opponent's hand at random. You may put that card into play under your control, if able. Otherwise, discard it.

name: The Westerlands
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Response: After an opponent's character is knelt by one of your card effects, choose and kneel a location. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

name: Warden of the West
rules_text:
Prized 3.
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel attached House card
to choose and kneel a character. Discard all power on that character.

name: Dorne Loyalist
rules_text:
Prized 2. Stealth.
Response: Kneel a prized character to cancel the effects of a character ability just triggered.

name: Prince of Dorne
rules_text:
Prized 3.
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel attached House card to look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 of those cards to your hand, and shuffle the others back
into your deck.

name: Hoster Tully
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Response: After Hoster Tully leaves play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of House Tully cards, reveal them and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: The Blackfish
rules_text:
Prized 2. Renown.
While The Blackfish is attacking, each character that dies for [Military] claim gains "prized 1."
flavor_text:
"He's not as black a fish as that."
–Ser Jaime Lannister

name: Warden of the North
rules_text:
Prized 2.
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel attached House card to choose a character. That character gains stealth and "does not kneel to defend" until the end of the round.

name: Horselord
rules_text:
Prized 1.
While Horselord is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.
flavor_text: Many were Dothraki horselords, big men with red-brown skin, their drooping mustachios bound in metal rings, their black hair oiled and braided and hung with bells.

name: Daenerys Targaryen
rules_text:
Prized 2.
House Targaryen only.
Response: After you declare Daenerys Targaryen as an attacker, choose a character without attachments controlled by the defending player. If you win the challenge, kill that character.

name: Khal
rules_text:
Prized 2.
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel attached House card to choose a character. That character gains deadly and “Does not kneel to attack or defend during Power challenges” until the end of the round.

name: Harrenhal
rules_text:
Prized 2.
If Harrenhal has 3 or more gold tokens on it, discard it from play (cannot be saved).
Response: Kill a character you own and control to cancel a triggered effect. Then, place 1 gold token on Harrenhal.
Harrenhal cannot be triggered if it has 3 or more gold tokens on it.

name: The Brave Companions
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Attach to the Neutral Faction House card.
Response: After a neutral character you own leaves play, kneel attached House card to attach that character facedown to The Brave Companions instead.
Marshalling: Kneel attached House card to return an attached facedown card to your hand.

name: Dark Wings, Dark Words
rules_text:
Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. You cannot have more than 1 copy of each event card by title in your deck. You cannot trigger event card effects from your dead or discard pile.
Response: After you play an event card, draw 1 card.
flavor_text: Card designed by 2011 A Game of Thrones World Melee Champion, Corey Faherty.

name: Defenders of the Wall
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Defenders of the Wall may be declared as a defender during [Military] challenges initiated against you by players running an agenda even if it is already kneeling.

name: Deserted Castle
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel Deserted Castle to choose a [Baratheon] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains the Night's Watch trait.

name: The Wall
rules_text:
Prized 1.
If it is Winter, each of your Night's Watch characters gains a [Power] icon and the [Baratheon] affiliation.
Any Phase: Kneel The Wall to stand all Night's Watch characters you control.

name: Lonely Light Envoy
rules_text:
If you control a [Martell] character, Lonely Light Envoy gains an [Intrigue] icon.
If you control a [Targaryen] character, Lonely Light Envoy gains "immune to plot effects."

name: Farwynd Explorer
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: If you are the first player, bring Farwynd Explorer out of Shadows to cancel a triggered effect.
[+2 Initiative]

name: Longship Iron Wind
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Challenges: Kneel Longship Iron Wind to put a character with printed cost 2 or lower into play from your hand.
flavor_text: No man had ever loved his wives half as well as the Lord Captain loved his ships.

name: Ashemark Councilor
rules_text:
Prized 1.
While Ashemark Councilor is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.

name: Marbrand Outrider
rules_text:
Prized 2.
Response: After 1 or more cards are discarded from an opponent's hand, reveal the top card of your deck and add it to your hand.

name: House Dayne Escort
rules_text:
If you control a [Greyjoy] character, House Dayne Escort gains deadly.
If you control a [Lannister] character, House Dayne Escort gains "immune to plot effects."
flavor_text: He could see their banners flying as the riders emerged from the green of the living wood in a long dusty column.

name: Seneschal Ricasso
rules_text: Response: After Seneschal Ricasso leaves play, choose a prized character in your dead or discard pile and put it into play under your control.
flavor_text:
“Best send a rider to Ricasso, and have him open my apartments in the Tower of the Sun.”
–Doran Martell

name: Elia Sand
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Challenges: Choose an opponent who controls more characters than you. You may declare an additional [Intrigue] challenge against that opponent this phase. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Riverlands Hunter
rules_text:
Prized 1.
While Riverlands Hunter is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.
flavor_text: Between rains, floods, fire, and war, they had lost two harvests and a good part of a third. An early winter would mean famine all across the riverlands.

name: Hand of the King
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Lord or Lady character only.
Any Phase: Kneel Hand of the King to stand attached character.
flavor_text: “Lord Eddard Stark, I would name you the Hand of the King.” –Robert Baratheon

name: Black Dragon Egg
rules_text:
Prized 1. Limit 1 per deck. Attached character gains deadly.
Response: After Black Dragon Egg leaves play, search your deck for a copy of Drogon or Black Hatchling, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Green Dragon Egg
rules_text:
Prized 1. Limit 1 per deck.96
Attached character gains melee.
Response: After Green Dragon Egg leaves play, search your deck for a copy of Rhaegal or Green Hatchling, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: White Dragon Egg
rules_text:
Prized 1. Limit 1 per deck. Attached character gains stealth.
Response: After White Dragon Egg leaves play, search your deck for a copy of Viserion or White Hatchling, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: In the Hands of the Qohorik
rules_text:
Neutral Faction only. Prized 1.
Plot: Choose an opponent. That player must choose his or her next plot card this phase at random.
flavor_text: “He's going to cut one foot off everyone. The left one.” –Arya Stark

name: Royal Decree
rules_text:
Prized 2.
Response: Cancel the effects of an event card just played. (Non-prized event cards cannot cancel this effect.)
flavor_text:
“It is His Grace's wish that these good men be rewarded for their valor. By his decree...”
–Kevan Lannister

name: Heads on Pikes
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Any Phase: Each opponent discards the top 2 cards from his or her deck for each character in his or her dead pile. (Limit 1 per round.)
flavor_text: “My lords, within the year, we will have all their heads on pikes...” –Marq Piper

name: The Aftermath
rules_text: Prized 1. At the end of the marshalling phase, each player chooses up to 3 characters he or she controls. All characters not chosen are discarded from play (cannot be saved).

name: Robert Baratheon
rules_text:
Prized 2. Renown.
Response: After you win a challenge in which a prized character participated, Robert Baratheon claims 1 power.

name: Flame and Shadow
rules_text:
House Baratheon only. Prized 2.
Marshalling: Kneel 2 influence to choose a non-Army character without attachments. Take control of that character until the end of the challenges phase.

name: Raider from Orkwood
rules_text:
Prized 1.
While Raider from Orkwood
is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.
flavor_text: All around the sea was full of ships. Some were burning, some were sinking, some had been smashed to splinters.

name: Orkwood Captain
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Orkwood Captain participated as an attacker, kneel all locations controlled by the defending player.

name: Ten Towers
rules_text: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Ten Towers to discard X cards from the top of the losing player's deck. X is the amount of STR by which you won the challenge.

name: Ser Balon Swann
rules_text:
House Lannister only. No attachments.
Response: After Ser Balon Swann comes out of Shadows, each opponent with 4 or more cards in hand chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.

name: Wheels within Wheels
rules_text:
House Lannister only. Prized 2.
Any Phase: Kneel a unique [Lannister] character to choose and reveal a new plot card.
flavor_text: Wheels within wheels within wheels. Ned's head was pounding. “Why? Why now?”

name: The Boneway
rules_text: Response: After an opponent plays or reveals a prized card, each player chooses up to 3 characters he or she controls. All characters not chosen are returned to their owners' hands.

name: Locked in a Cell
rules_text:
House Martell only. Prized 2.
Any Phase: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a [Noble] character to choose a character without a crest. Return that character to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Hers was a gentle prison.

name: Northern Clansman
rules_text:
If you control a [Baratheon] character, Northern Clansman gains renown.
If you control a [Lannister] character, Northern Clansman gains stealth.
flavor_text: “At Winterfell we called them lords, but their own folk don't.” –Bran Stark

name: Blackwood Elite
rules_text:
Prized 2. No attachments.
Deadly. Renown.
Blackwood Elite must be chosen for [Military] claim, if able.
flavor_text: “Small wonder Lord Tywin ran off to fight Stannis. He'd had his fill of northmen and rivermen both.” –Robb Stark

name: Mad King Aerys
rules_text:
Prized 1. Renown.
Mad King Aerys cannot be killed unless an opponent controls a [Noble] character or Ser Jaime Lannister.
Dominance: Kneel Mad King Aerys to choose and kill a [Noble] character.
flavor_text: Card designed by 2012 A Game of Thrones World Joust Champion John M. Bruno

name: Dragon Ambassador
rules_text:
If you control a [Greyjoy] character, Dragon Ambassador gains deadly.
If you control a [Martell] character, Dragon Ambassador gains an [Intrigue] icon.
flavor_text: “Is that the way of it? The gift you bring me is your own sweet self.” –Daenerys Targaryen

name: By Sword or By Guile
rules_text:
House Targaryen only.
Response: After you win a [Military]
or [Power] challenge as the attacker, cancel the claim effect of that challenge. Then, move up to 3 power from the losing opponent's House card to your House card. (Limit 1 per phase.)

name: The Iron Throne
rules_text:
Prized 2.
The Iron Throne cannot stand during
the standing phase or by other card effects.
If you are the only player to control The Iron Throne, players cannot trigger response effects while The Iron Throne is standing.
After a player wins a challenge, that player may choose to stand or kneel The Iron Throne.

name: Sellsail Galley
rules_text:
Prized 1.
Response: After you win a challenge by 4 or more total STR, kneel Sellsail Galley to search your deck or your discard pile for a character with a [Naval] enhancement, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck if it was
searched.

name: They Lay with Lions
rules_text: Prized 1. When revealed, choose and kneel a non-prized character.

name: A Task in the East
rules_text: When revealed, if you have a [Targaryen] House card search your deck for a [Martell] card. If you have a [Martell] House card search your deck for a [Greyjoy] card. Reveal and add that card to your hand and shuffle your deck.

name: A Task for the King
rules_text: When revealed, if you have a [Lannister] House card search your deck for a [Baratheon] card. If you have a [Baratheon] House card search your deck for a [Stark] card. Reveal and add that card to your hand and shuffle your deck.

name: The Turncloak's Task
rules_text: When revealed, if you have a [Stark] House card search your deck for a [Lannister] card. If you have a [Greyjoy] House card search your deck for a [Targaryen] card. Reveal and add that card to your hand and shuffle your deck.

name: Knight of Flowers
rules_text:
House Baratheon only. Renown.
Response: Discard a card at random from your hand and bring Knight of Flowers out of Shadows to save a unique character from being killed or discarded from play.

name: Ser Robar Royce
rules_text: While Ser Robar Royce is participating in a challenge, each Rainbow Guard character you control gains deadly.

name: Rainbow Guard Squire
rules_text: Challenges: If you control 1 or more Rainbow Guard characters, kneel all copies of Rainbow Guard Squire you control to draw 1 card.

name: The Drumm
rules_text:
Deadly.
Limited Response: After you declare The Drumm as an attacker, choose a location controlled by the defending player. If you win the challenge by 4 or more total STR, discard that location. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: The Sea Tower
rules_text:
Limited.
Marshalling: Kneel The Sea Tower to reduce the cost of the next [Greyjoy] character you play this phase by 1.

name: Red Rain
rules_text:
Unique [Greyjoy] character only.
Limited Response: After attached character is declared as an attacker, choose a character controlled by the defending player. If you win the challenge by 4 or more total STR, discard that character from play. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Chella, Daughter of Cheyk
rules_text:
Stealth. Deadly.
Immune to opponent’s location effects.
flavor_text: "Braver to leave the man alive, with a chance to cleanse his shame by winning back his ear," explained Chella, a small dark woman whose grisly neckware was hung with no less than forty-six dried, wrinkled ears.

name: Ser Kevan Lannister
rules_text: Limited Response: After Ser Kevan Lannister enters or leaves play, choose a [Lannister] or neutral location in your discard pile and put it into play. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)
flavor_text: Card designed by the 2012 AGoT LCG Chinese Champion, Bing Ouyang

name: Enemy of the Queen
rules_text:
Attached character does not stand during the standing phase.
Discard Enemy of the Queen if attached character’s controller wins an [Intrigue] challenge against you by 4 or more total STR.
flavor_text: She is not dead... but before I am done with her, I promise you, she will be singing to the Stranger, begging for his kiss.

name: Ghost Hill Elite
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you reveal a plot card, each opponent must choose and discard 1 card from his or her hand, if able. Then, Ghost Hill Elite claims 1 power if any locations or attachments were discarded by this effect. (Limit once per round.)

name: Prince's Attendant
rules_text: Any Phase: Kill Prince’s Attendant (cannot be saved) to reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard 1 and add the other to your hand.
flavor_text:
“Do you have a better way?” Quentyn asked him.
“I do. It's just now come to me.”

name: Hotah's Axe
rules_text:
Setup.
Limited Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, choose a character. That character loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase. Then, if that character has no challenge icons, kill it. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Ser Jason Mallister
rules_text:
Deadly.
Dominance: Choose and kill a character with printed cost 3 or lower controlled by an opponent who has not declared a [Millitary] challenge against you this round. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Raventree Hall
rules_text:
Immune to events.
While a character you control is defending alone, it gets +1 STR and gains renown.

name: Dosh Khaleen
rules_text: Limited Response: After an attachment leaves play, stand 1 influence providing card to draw 1 card. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Vaes Dothrak
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Limited.
During [Intrigue] challenges, the Claim value on your revealed plot card is increased by 1.
flavor_text: In this place, the crones of the dosh khaleen had decreed, all Dothraki were one blood, one khalasar, one herd. -GoT

name: Greenseer's Raven
rules_text:
No attachments. Stealth.
Response: Discard Greenseer’s Raven from your hand to cancel the ‘when revealed’ effects of a just revealed plot card with one or more Traits.

name: Aloof and Apart
rules_text:
Reduce the cost of the first character with printed cost 4 or higher you play each round by 2.
Characters you control with printed cost 4 or higher gain prized 1 while leaving play, and cannot be returned to your hand by your card effects or to pay costs.

name: Siege Preparations
rules_text: Military Battle. Intrigue Gambit. Power Struggle. You cannot initiate more than 1 challenge this round.

name: Naming the Heir
rules_text: Castle. After this plot is placed in your used pile, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a non-Army character with printed cost 4 or higher, and put it into play. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Brienne of Tarth
rules_text:
Brienne of Tarth is considered to have the Knight trait.
Limited Response: After Brienne of Tarth kneels, each opponent may move 1 power to your House card from a card he or she controls. Any opponent who does not cannot play event cards this round. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Offer of a Peach
rules_text:
House Baratheon only.
Limited Response: After you win dominance, choose up to X standing characters to claim 1 power each. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Warrior of Note
rules_text: Deadly. Renown.
flavor_text: "Aye. I'll take my axe and stand on that drawbridge, and let them come try me. One at a time, two, three, it makes no matter. None will pass the moat while I still draw breath." -Lorren, CoK

name: Thunderer
rules_text: Limited Response: After an opponent reveals a plot card, kneel Thunderer to choose an opponent and discard the top card of his or her deck. If that card is a character or location, draw 1 card. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: âˆž Command the Winds
rules_text:
Deathbound.
Any Phase: Choose a [Greyjoy] character. That character gets +1 STR until the end of the phase.
Dominance: Kneel a Warship location to return Command the Winds from your dead pile to your hand.

name: Ulf Son of Umar
rules_text: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to give Ulf Son of Umar any keyword or crest printed on another character in play until the end of the phase.

name: Moon Brother Harriers
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Challenges: Pay 1 gold to give each participating Clansman character you control +1 STR until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

name: Vale Encampment
rules_text: Marshalling: Discard Vale Encampment (cannot be saved) to reduce the cost of the next Clansman card you play this phase by 1. When you play that card, draw 1 card.

name: Tyene Sand
rules_text: Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, set the Claim value on your revealed plot card to 2 until the end of the phase. (While set, the value cannot be raised or lowered.)

name: The Red Mountains
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel The Red Mountains to choose a [Martell] character with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character gains the Sand Snake trait.

name: A Secret Mission
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Challenges: Kill a Sand Snake character you control to choose and return up to 3 [Shadow] cards to Shadows.

name: Tytos Blackwood
rules_text:
Stealth.
Immune to opponent’s events.
Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, move 1 power from the attacker player’s House card to your own.

name: Raventree Elite
rules_text:
No attachments. Stealth.
Each House Tully character you control gains “immune to opponent’s triggered effects” while it is participating in a challenge.

name: Seagard
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Seagard to choose a defending character you control. That character gets +2 STR and gains deadly until the end of the challenge. If you win the challenge, stand Seagard.

name: Khal Drogo
rules_text:
Deadly.
If you win a challenge in which Khal Drogo attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, the losing player must choose and kill 1 character he or she controls, randomly discard 1 card from his or her hand, and move 1 power from his or her house card to yours.

name: Irri
rules_text: If Irri would be killed, you may instead attach her to a [Targaryen] character as a Handmaiden attachment with the text, “Attached character gains a [Power] icon, and does not kneel to attack during [Power] challenges.”

name: Mya Stone
rules_text: While there is at least 1 Castle plot card revealed, Mya Stone gains: “Opponent’s characters with printed cost 3 or lower cannot be declared alone as attackers.”

name: The Eyrie
rules_text:
Immune to plot card effects.
Response: Kneel The Eyrie to save a non-Army character with printed cost 4 or higher from being killed or discarded from play. Then, discard all power on that character.

name: Taken Captive
rules_text: Castle. After this plot is placed in your used pile, choose an opponent’s character with printed cost 3 or lower. Take control of that character until a new plot is placed in your used pile.

name: Fallen from Favor
rules_text: Castle. After this plot is placed in your used pile,choose 1 character you control, and return it to the bottom of its owner’s deck (cannot be saved).

name: Ser Bryce Caron
rules_text:
Joust.
Challenges: Choose a Rainbow Guard character. That character gains renown until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Storm's End Freerider
rules_text: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to stand Storm’s End Freerider.
flavor_text: They belong to Stannis now, she realized, even if they do not know it themselves yet.

name: Euron Crow's Eye
rules_text: While Euron Crow’s Eye is attacking alone, opponents cannot declare defenders.
