flavor_text: Better to be scorned by Balon the Brave than beloved of Euron Crow's Eye.

name: Silence Crewman
rules_text:
Stealth.
At the end of any challenge phase in which Silence Crewman was not declared as an attacker, kill it and discard the top 2 cards of each opponent’s deck.

name: Gunthor Son of Gurn
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Limited Response: After you win a challenge in which Gunthor Son of Gurn participated, draw cards, ignoring the draw cap, until the losing opponent does not have more cards in hand than you. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Ser Ilyn Payne
rules_text: Dominance: Kneel Ser Ilyn Payne to choose and kill a kneeling character with printed cost 3 or lower.
flavor_text: “He does so love his work...” -Varys

name: Battle of the Green Fork
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single [Combat] challenge with normal claim. During this epic phase, each unique Clansman and Mercenary character gains melee. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase.)

name: Nymeria Sand
rules_text: Limited Response: After a Sand Snake character you control is killed, choose and kill a character with an equal or lower printed cost. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: An Opening Gambit
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After you lose a challenge, choose a participating Sand Snake character you control to claim 1 power. Then, if this was the first challenge initiated this phase, stand that character and draw 1 card.

name: Red Mountain Keep
rules_text: Dominance: Kneel Red Mountain Keep to shuffle a Sand Snake character from your dead pile back into your deck.

name: Maester Vyman
rules_text: Limited Response: After you win a challenge in which at least 1 House Tully character participated, reveal the top card of your deck and add it to your hand. (Limit one limited response per round.)

name: Ser Desmond Grell
rules_text: Challenges: Choose a House Tully character. That character gains deadly until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Blackfish's Vanguard
rules_text:
No attachments.
Renown. Deadly.
X is the number of House Tully characters you control. (X is initiative.)
[+X Initiative]

name: Rakharo
rules_text:
Stealth.
Challenges: Choose a Dothraki character. That character gains stealth until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Jhiqui
rules_text: If Jhiqui would be killed, you may instead attach her to a [Targaryen] character as a Handmaiden attachment with the text, “Attached character gains an [Intrigue] icon and does not kneel to attack during [Intrigue] challenges.”

name: Vaes Tolorro
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Limited.
During [Combat] challenges, the Claim value on your revealed plot card is increased by 1.
flavor_text: "This city is dead, Khaleesi. Nameless and godless we found it, the gates broken, only wind and flies moving through the streets." -Rakharo, CoK

name: Vale Informant
rules_text:
Stealth.
Vale Informant gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.

name: The Moon Door
rules_text: Dominance: Kneel The Moon Door and kneel a unique House Arryn character to choose and kill a character with printed cost 3 or lower.
flavor_text: How many men had the snot-nosed little wretch sent through that door already? -GoT

name: Holding Council
rules_text: Castle. After this plot is placed in your used pile, put a card with printed cost 1 or lower into play from your hand.

name: The Withering Cold
rules_text: Prized 3. All players skip the standing phase this round.
flavor_text: Card designed by 2013 AGoT LCG North American Champion, Steven Simoni

name: Ser Emmon Cuy
rules_text: During [Power] challenges in which you control at least 1 attacking Rainbow Guard character, raise the Claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.
flavor_text: "You'll die for this." -CoK

name: Camp Follower
rules_text: Camp Follower gets +1 STR for each Knight character in play.
flavor_text: The life of a soldier was not without certain compensations. Wherever you have a camp, you are certain to have camp followers. -GoT

name: Renly's Pavilion
rules_text: Response: After you reveal a plot card, kneel Renly’s Pavilion to claim 1 power for your House. Then, if it is summer, add 1 gold token from the treasury to your gold pool.
flavor_text: The candles within Renly's pavilion made the shimmering silken walls seem to glow, transforming the great tent into a magical castle alive with emerald light. -CoK

name: Iron Fleet Pillager
rules_text: Response: After you win a challenge in which Iron Fleet Pillager participated, discard the top card of the losing opponent’s deck. If that card is a location or attachment, you may put it into play under your control.

name: Salt and Iron
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only. Play only if you have won 2 or more unopposed challenges this phase.
Challenges: Choose and discard 1 character and 1 location, each with printed cost 3 or lower, from play.

name: The Mountain Clan Horde
rules_text:
No attachments.
Reduce the cost to play The Mountain Clan Horde by 1 for each Clansman character you control.
Any Phase: Discard a card from hand to stand or kneel another Clansman character. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Clan Scout
flavor_text: “...and if truth be told, I think the clans will find us no matter what we do. Their eyes are all around us.” -Tyrion

name: Obella Sand
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: After another Sand Snake character you control is killed, put Obella Sand into Shadows from your dead pile.

name: Doran's Solar
rules_text: Limited Response: After 1 or more cards are discarded from your hand, kneel Doran’s Solar to draw 2 cards. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)
flavor_text: Not until the doors of his solar were safely closed behind them did he wheel his chair about to face the women.

name: A Hidden Game
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Limited Response: After you lose a challenge, kill a Sand Snake character you control to choose a character. Until the end of the game, that character gains prized 1 and loses all instances of all challenge icons. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Alayne Stone
rules_text:
House Stark only.
If you control Sansa Stark, discard Alayne Stone from play.
Response: After Alayne Stone enters play, choose a Castle plot card in your used pile. Reveal it as your new plot card.

name: Volley of Arrows
rules_text: Challenges: Choose a participating [Stark] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of non-participating characters you control. If you have a Military Battle plot card revealed and you win the challenge, claim 1 power for that character.

name: Aggo
rules_text:
Deadly.
Any Phase: Attach a [Targaryen] or neutral Weapon attachment from your discard pile to a Dothraki character you control. (Limit once per round.)

name: Lesser Ko
rules_text: Challenges: Discard a card from your hand to give Lesser Ko deadly until the end of the phase.
flavor_text: “Ko Pono left first, naming himself Khal Pono, and many followed him. Jhaqo was not long to do the same.” -Ser Jorah Mormont

name: Horse Gate
rules_text:
House Targaryen only. Limited.
During [Power] challenges, the claim value on your revealed plot card is increased by 1.
flavor_text: Dany could not have said why the city needed a gate when it had no walls...and no buildings that she could see. Yet there it stood, immense and beautiful, the great horses framing the distant purple mountain beyond.

name: Lysa Arryn
rules_text: Response: Kneel Lysa Arryn to cancel a triggered effect with any form of the word “plot” or “non-plot” in its text.
flavor_text: “I will not be made mock of. You have had your little jape, Imp. I trust you enjoyed it.”

name: Petyr Baelish
rules_text:
Stealth.
If you control Littlefinger, discard Petyr Baelish from play.
Limited Response: Kneel Petyr Baelish to cancel the effects of an event card just played. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Lyn Corbray
rules_text:
Stealth.
Each of your non-Army characters with printed cost 4 or higher gets +2 STR.

name: Knights Declarant
rules_text:
No attachments. Renown.
Reduce the cost to play Knights Declarant by 2 for each plot card in your used pile.
flavor_text: “...every knight in the Vale will pledge his sword to win you back your birthright.” -Petyr Baelish

name: A Time for Wolves
rules_text: When revealed, search your deck for a neutral or in-House Creature card with printed cost 3 or lower reveal it, and add it to your hand. If it is a Direwolf, you may put it into play instead. Then, shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Card designed by 2012 AGoT LCG North American Champion, Dan Seefeldt

name: Ser Parmen Crane
rules_text:
Immune to events.
At the beginning of the dominance phase, stand each Rainbow Guard character you control.
flavor_text: "My brother is young and strong, and he has a vast host around him, and these rainbow knights of his." - Stannis Baratheon

name: Bitterbridge Encampment
rules_text: Limited Response: After you play a Knight character, kneel Bitterbridge Encampment to search your deck for another Knight character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: In Renly's Name
rules_text:
Attach to an opponent's character.
Response: After attached character is declared as an attacker against you, claim 3 power for your House.

name: Iron Islands Reaver
rules_text: If an effect would discard 1 or more cards from an opponent’s deck that has no cards remaining in it, that opponent must choose and discard 1 card at his or her command, instead.

name: Kettledrum
rules_text:
Setup.
[Greyjoy] character only.
Attached character gets +1 STR and gains intimidate.

name: Reborn from the Sea
rules_text:
House Greyjoy only.
Response: After you win dominance, choose a non-Army [Greyjoy] character in your dead pile and put it into play.

name: Milk Snakes
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Stealth.
Response: After you win a challenge in which Milk Snakes participated, choose a Clansman card in your discard pile and return it to your hand.

name: Sign of the Red Hand
rules_text:
Attach to your House card.
If you are not running an agenda, Sign of the Red Hand gains: "Increase your draw cap by 1.”
[+1 Income]

name: Dorea Sand
rules_text: Response: After a Sand Snake character you control is killed, Dorea Sand claims 1 power. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
flavor_text: “If you should die, must El and Obella seek vengeance for you, then Dorea and Loree for them?” -Ellaria Sand

name: Water Gardens Sentry
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel Water Gardens Sentry to have it participate in the current challenge as a defender. If you win the challenge, return Water Gardens Sentry to your hand.

name: House Tully Footman
rules_text: If you control a unique House Tully character, House Tully Footman does not kneel to defend.
flavor_text: They were all her father's bannermen, lords of the Trident. -CoK

name: Winterfell Heart Tree
rules_text:
Limited.
Marshalling: Kneel Winterfell Heart Tree to reduce the cost of the next [Stark] character you play this phase by 1.

name: Lay Waste
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Response: After you win a [Combat] challenge in which you control at least 1 participating unique character, choose and discard from play 1 location controlled by the losing opponent. (Limit 1 per challenge.)

name: Jhogo
rules_text: Limited Response: After you win a challenge in which Jhogo and at least 2 other Dothraki characters participated as attackers, discard Jhogo to claim X power for your House. X is the number of cards in the losing opponent’s hand. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Braided Warrior
rules_text: Response: After Braided Warrior comes into play, search your deck for an attachment and pay its printed gold cost to put it into play attached to a card you control. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Eastern Market
rules_text:
Limited.
Marshalling: Discard Eastern Market from play to reduce the costs of the next 3 Dothraki or Mercenary characters you play this phase by 1 each.

name: Bronze Yohn Royce
rules_text:
Renown.
Response: After a Castle plot card is placed in your used pile, choose and discard 1 power from a character.

name: Robert Arryn
rules_text: Response: After a Castle plot card is moved to your used pile, Robert Arryn claims 2 power. (Limit once per round.)
flavor_text: “Let my porridge fly!”

name: The Bloody Gate
rules_text: Marshalling: Kneel The Bloody Gate to reduce the cost of the next 2 cards with printed cost 4 or higher you play this phase by 2 each.

name: Kings of Mountain and Vale
rules_text: Castle. After this plot is placed in your used pile, draw 1 card and discard 1 card at random from each opponent’s hand.

name: Ser Guyard Morrigen
rules_text:
Stealth.
Response: After you win a challenge in which at least 1 Rainbow Guard character participated, stand Ser Guyard Morrigen. Then, Ser Guyard Morrigen gains a [Power] icon until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Margaery's Favor
rules_text:
Rainbow Guard character or Renly Baratheon only.
Response: After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, draw 1 card.
flavor_text: “Margaery Tyrell brings fifty thousand swords and all the strength of Highgarden.” –Littlefinger

name: The Stag and Rose
rules_text: Response: After you win a [Power] challenge by 4 or more total STR, move 1 power from an opponent’s card to a [Baratheon] character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each power on it.
flavor_text: The crowned stag decorated the king's green velvet tunic as well, worked in gold thread upon his chest; the Baratheon sigil in the colors of Highgarden. -CoK

name: Iron King's Guard
rules_text:
No attachments except Weapon.
Increase the cost to play the first character played each round by 2.

name: Iron Islands Shipwright
rules_text: While Iron Islands Shipwright is standing, cards cannot be moved out of opponents’ discard and dead piles.

name: Orkmont Port
rules_text: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, claim 1 power for your House.
flavor_text: A great number of longships, fifty or sixty at the least, stood out to sea or lay beached on the pebbled shore to the north. -CoK

name: The Giant's Lance
rules_text:
House Lannister only.
Kneeling characters get -1 STR.
flavor_text: ...a mountain that even mountains looked up to, its head lost in icy mists three and a half miles above the valley floor. -GoT

name: Feed it to the Goats
rules_text: Challenges: Kneel X Clansman characters (to a maximum of 3) to choose and kneel X non-Lady characters.
flavor_text: "Little boyman," Shagga roared, "will you mock my axe after I chop off your manhood and feed it to the goats?"

name: Ransack
rules_text: Response: After you win dominance, kneel X [Lannister] characters (minimum of 1) to choose and discard a location with printed cost X or lower.
flavor_text: “They burnt us out,” a farmer beside him said. “Come riding in the dark, up from the south, and fired the fields and the houses alike...”

name: Loreza Sand
rules_text: Response: After a Sand Snake character you control is killed, draw 1 card.

name: A False Hunt
rules_text:
House Martell only.
Response: Kill a Sand Snake character you control to cancel a card effect that would search any part of, or reveal 1 or more cards from, a player’s deck. Then, choose an opponent to discard 1 card at random from his or her hand.

name: Northern Patriarch
rules_text:
House Stark only.
Northern Patriarch is immune to opponent’s plot effects while it has 1 or more power on it.
If there are no other copies of Northern Patriarch in play, in order to play an event an opponent must move 1 power from a card he or she controls to Northern Patriarch.
flavor_text: Card designed by 2012 AGoT LCG World Champion, Derek Shoemaker In Memory of Guy Gray

name: Palisades
rules_text: During the first challenge initiated against you each round, treat all non-Army characters as if their printed text boxes were blank (except for Traits).

name: New Khalasar
rules_text:
No attachments. Renown.
Limited Response: After you win a [Power] challenge in which New Khalasar participated by 4 or more total STR, kill each participating character on the opposing side. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

name: Dothraki Sea
rules_text:
No attachments.
If you have won initiative this round, each of your characters with one or more attachments gets +1 STR and gains: “cannot be discarded by opponents’ card effects.”

name: Bloody Arakh
rules_text:
Dothraki character only.
Attached character gets +1 STR.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, opponents’ characters without attachments lose all keywords.

name: Lothor Brune
rules_text: While there is at least 1 Castle plot card revealed, Lothor Brune does not kneel to attack or defend.
flavor_text: Sober, he was a quiet man, but a strong one.

name: Mord
rules_text:
You may spend gold on Mord as if it were in your gold pool.
Response: After you win dominance, choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower. Shuffle that character into its owner’s deck unless its controller moves 1 gold from his or her gold pool to Mord.

name: Sky Cell
rules_text:
Attach to a character with printed cost 3 or lower.
Attached character’s controller must select his or her plot card (when revealing a new plot) at random.
Attached character gains: “Marshalling: Kill this character (cannot be saved).”
flavor_text: The blue is calling...

name: As High As Honor
rules_text: Your defending characters gain renown.
